name: Duquesa Suites Barcelona
description:
Set the centre of Barcelona, 400 metres from Picasso Museum and Barceloneta Metro Station, Duquesa Suites Barcelona features a year-round outdoor plunge pool, sun terrace and free WiFi. It is housed in a building from the 18th century with the Speciality Monument status.

Rooms at this hotel come with 1 extra large double bed, a sofa bed and a bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and capsule coffee machine.

Please note that the hotel reserves the right to pre-authorise credit cards prior to arrival. When booking more than 3 rooms, different policies and additional charges may apply. Buffet breakfast is served at Hotel Duquesa de Cardona. Local City Tax pending to be paid at Front Desk.

Plaza Reial is 500 metres from Duquesa Suites Barcelona, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Duquesa Suites Barcelona.

name: Sonder Casa Luz
description:
Set in Barcelona, Sonder Casa Luz offers a terrace, breakfast and complimentary housekeeping. Guests can enjoy the near contemporary art museum MACBA, La Boqueria market and Rambla del Raval.

An on-site restaurant is also available.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Passeig de Gracia, Casa Batllo and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sonder l Casa Luz.

name: Valencia 2
description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Valencia 2 provides accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is situated 1.9 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 1.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and 1.9 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is less than 1 km from Casa Batllo, and within 1.1 km of the city centre.

Towels and bed linen are provided in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include La Pedrera, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Valencia 2.

name: Fuster Apartments by Aspasios
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 75m²
description:
Fuster Apartments are just 150 metres from Diagonal Avenue and 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya. These stylish apartments are set in a Modernist building dating from 1905.

Fuster Apartments boast high ceilings and mosaic floors. Lounges include a plasma TV, DVD and CD player and sofa, while kitchens have a washing machine, dishwasher, oven and microwave. Some apartments also have balconies. Free Wi-Fi and air conditioning are included, and towels, bed linen and a hairdryer are provided.

There are several bars and restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk. Passeig de Gràcia, with its Gaudí buildings and exclusive shops, is 650 metres away.

The Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ walk from the Fuster Apartments. You can reach Ciutadella Park and Las Ramblas by foot in 20 minutes.

The properties are set 5 minutes’ walk from both Girona and Verdaguer Metro Stations. Nord Bus Station is 1.4 km away

name: BarcelonaForRent The Central Place
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Offering views of Casa Batlló, BarcelonaForRent The Central Places is located centrally, in between Paseo de Gracia and La Rambla. A balcony and free WiFi are available at the air-conditioned apartments.

Living rooms feature simple décor and a bright interior, as well as a flat-screen TV with Netflix, sofa bed and iPod dock. Complete with a dishwasher, kitchens come with an oven and a coffee machine.

BarcelonaForRent The Central Places offers modern bedrooms with parquet floors and single beds. Each private bathroom has a shower, and towels and linen are provided.

The apartments are surrounded by shops and restaurants. Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station is 250 metres away and offers transport to Sagrada Familia and La Barceloneta Beach in under 20 minutes. Barcelona-El Prat Airport is a 15-minute drive.

name: Barcelonaforrent Urban Town Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Set in Barcelona's Gracia District, Barcelonaforrent Urban Town Suites offers air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Lesseps Metro Station is a 10-minute walk from the apartment.

The bright apartments feature modern décor and includes a seating area with a sofa bed, DVD player and iPod dock. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, dishwasher and microwave. A washing machine is also available.

There is a double room, a twin room and a bathroom with a shower. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The apartment offers bicycle and car rental and there is shuttle service to the airport for a surcharge.

Guests will find a variety of restaurants and bars within 5 minutes' walk from the apartment. Paseo de Gracia, with high-end shops and Gaudi's La Pedrera, is 15 minutes away by metro. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 3.5 km away.

name: Vincci Bit
description:
Vincci Bit is located just 10 minutes walk from Mar Bella beach. Situated a 7-minute walk from El Maresme Forum Metro Station, it features a sauna, a gym and a rooftop swimming pool with city views.

The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and à la carte meals, including gluten-free products. There is also a lounge, bar and room service available.

The air-conditioned rooms at Vincci Bit are bright and comfortable and feature a flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and a minibar. The private bathrooms include a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is also available.

There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops within a few minutes walk from the hotel. Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away.

The International Convention Centre (CCIB) is a 9-minute walk from Vincci Bit. The historic centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 15-minutes by metro or tram.

name: Vincci Maritimo
description:
Vincci Marítimo is located 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and the CCIB Convention Centre. It offers bright, stylish rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi throughout.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Marítimo feature modern décor, with parquet floors and relaxing images of the sea. They come with a pillow menu and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer. Rooms offer views of the charming Japanese Zen garden or Diagonal Mar Park.

The hotel’s Jardí de Mar Restaurant serves Mediterranean food using fresh ingredients. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The Ikebana Lounge Bar offers snacks, tapas and cocktails which can be enjoyed on the terrace.

The hotel’s reception is open 24 hours a day, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Laundry and car rental services are also available from the front desk.

The Vincci Marítimo is just 500 metres from Mar Bella Beach. Selva de Mar Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel, connecting you with the city centre in 15 minutes.

name: RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles
description:
RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles is set in the centre of Barcelona’s old town, a few metres from Las Ramblas. This stylish hotel offers free WiFi and rooms with satellite TV.

 RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles features contemporary design and modern rooms decorated elegantly. Each room has air conditioning, a minibar and a desk.

 RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles is ideally situated for visiting Barcelona’s main attractions. There are several restaurants, bars and cafés in the nearby Gothic Quarter and the famous Boquería Market is less than 100 metres away.

Barcelona Port is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the city’s cathedral is one kilometre away. Liceu Metro Station and Liceu Theatre are a 1-minute walk from the  RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles.

name: The Streets Apartments Rambla
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
The Streets Apartments Rambla provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. Featuring a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

At the apartment complex, all units have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. The units include a wardrobe.

Sightseeing tours are available near the property.

Popular points of interest near The Streets Apartments Rambla include Sant Sebastian Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Hostal Boqueria
description:
Situated on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, this guest house is less than 200 metres from Liceu Metro Station. It offers simple, comfortable rooms and has free Wi-Fi access available throughout.

The Hostal Boquería’s functional rooms feature air conditioning and cable TV, as well as heating and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Rooms with views of the Ramblas are subject to availability.

The Boquería has a 24-hour reception. Guests can also make use of its luggage storage.

The central location makes visiting Barcelona’s sights easy. The Boquería Market is just across the Ramblas. Barcelona Cathedral and the surrounding Gothic Quarter are within 5 minutes’ walk of Hostal Boqueria.

name: Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento
description:
Set on Tibidabo Hill, the 5-star Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento offers views over Barcelona and the Mediterranean Sea. Guests enjoy free access to the Spa.

Rooms at La Florida feature free Wi-Fi access and 37-inch interactive plasma TVs. The bathrooms come with l’Occitane amenities, a bathtub and shower. Some also have a private balcony.

Guests can admire the views from the La Florida’s panoramic terraces and gardens. The Spa by L'Occitane includes a stainless steel swimming pool, both indoor and outdoor. A hot tub, sauna, pressure showers and a range of fitness equipment are also available.

The hotel’s restaurant serves gourmet Catalan, Spanish and Mediterranean dishes. There are also 2 bars.

name: Nice apartment BCN two rooms wifi
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom
description:
Nice apartment BCN two rooms wifi has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.5 km of Casa Batllo and 1.9 km of Passeig de Gracia. The property is around 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.7 km from Park Güell. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1.1 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The property offers garden views.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Nice apartment BCN two rooms wifi.

name: Hostal Las Flores Ramblas
description:
This central guest house is on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, beside Liceu Metro Station, and 50 metres from La Boqueria Market. It offers air-conditioned rooms, with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs.

Public parking is available near the Hostal Las Flores Ramblas, but the great location means the city’s main tourist sites can be visited on foot.

Barcelona Cathedral is a 5-minute walk away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.

Las Flores has a 24-hour front desk, allowing you to make the most of central Barcelona’s lively night life. There is also a tour desk, and luggage storage is possible.

name: Golden Hotel Barcelona
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia, Golden Hotel Barcelona is a sustainable property with the Biosphere certificate. It provides a rooftop terrace with outdoor swimming pool, jacuzzi and bar. 1.5 km from Port Olympic, the property is also 1.7 km from Sagarda Familia and 1.9 km away from Picasso Museum. There is a gym, a restaurant and a shared lounge.

 All guests staying at the Golden Hotel Barcelona get 1 free entry for person and stay to the spa at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpic@ Suites complex (subject to availability and with prior reservation), located 450 meters away.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Speaking Spanish, Catalan, German and English at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

name: Suite Home Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 100m²
description:
Situated on tree-lined Gaudí Avenue, Suite Home Barcelona is just 250 m from the Sagrada Familia cathedral. Some apartments offer views of Barcelona’s famous monument. Some apartments offer views of Barcelona’s famous monument. All apartments are fully-equipped and air-conditioned. Free Wi-fi is available.

The stylish apartments have parquet flooring and contemporary furniture. The spacious living and dining area is equipped with a flat-screen TV, and CD player. A free safe is also provided.

The kitchen features an electric hob, oven, dishwasher and microwave. A washing machine and ironing facilities are also included.

Suite Home’s luxury apartments are within walking distance of several cafés, restaurants and supermarkets.

name: Vincci Mae
description:
Set beside Barcelona's Francesc Macià Square, Vincci Mae features a terrace with a plunge pool and fantastic views of Diagonal Avenue and Tibidabo Mountain.

Vincci Mae boasts an on-site restaurant and bar, it also has a 24-hour front desk and offers free WiFi throughout the property.  An assorted buffet breakfast is offered everyday.

Stylish rooms feature a simple and bright décor, air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, kettle, and minibar. The fancy private bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries ,and a hairdryer.

Casa Batlló is 1.6 km from Vincci Mae, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km away. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes in public transport.

name: Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites
description:
This minimalist hotel is situated in the Poble Nou district of Barcelona, 15 minutes’ by foot from Bogatell Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool surrounded by wooden decking and loungers.

The suites at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites feature monochrome decoration and a flat-screen TV. They also include air conditioning and a modern bathroom.

The Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites complex offers a stylish café-bar and restaurant. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine from the á la carte and daily menus. In summer meals can be enjoyed on the terrace by the pool.

Guests have access to the hotel's large spa for an additional cost. It includes an indoor treatment pool, Finnish sauna, Turkish baths, jacuzzis, hot tubs, several types of shower and an ice fountain. There is also a gym.

Barcelona Port is 15 minutes' walk away and Bogatell Metro Station is 100 metres from the hotel. Guests can walk to the lively Villa Olimpica area in 5 minutes.

All rooms include 1 complimentary access per person per stay to the hotel spa (subject to availability and upon reservation).

name: Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou
description:
This modern hotel has 250 spacious and fully equipped rooms, a Snack-Bar open 24 hours where clients can enjoy a buffet breakfast, as well as light meals for lunch and dinner. It also has vending machines and private paid parking. All its facilities are perfectly adapted and accessible for people with reduced mobility.
It is a hotel with free and unlimited high-speed Wi-Fi in the common areas. Wi-Fi internet is available in the rooms at an extra cost.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou is a pet-friendly hotel that will be happy to offer you and your pet the best experience.
It is located in the traditional Poblenou neighborhood, within streets full of restaurants, bars and shops. One of the most charming neighborhoods in the city, and 600 meters from the Bogatell beach. Barcelona city center can be reached in 10 minutes by metro and Barcelona’s Port Olímpic, with its vibrant night life, is just a 20-minute walk away.
This is considered the most innovative neighborhood in the city. It´s in the heart of the 22@ District and concentrates a multitude of technology and R+D companies. Therefore, thanks to its location and facilities, it is also a perfect accommodation for business trips.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou offers all you need to have the best experience in Barcelona city.

name: Vincci Gala
description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, Vincci Gala hotel offers luxurious rooms in a protected 19th-century palace. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The orginal façade, floor and central staircase of this unique hotel have all been preserved, creating a balance of traditional arquitecture and modern design.

The air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries, and bath or shower. The rooms also come with a free laptop safe, extra large beds, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, and a minibar.

A restaurant and snack bar are available on-site, and the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. Laundry and car rental services are available at a surcharge, and the property can provide tourist information.

Vincci Gala hotel is located opposite Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya Square.  There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the surroundings, and you can reach Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes by metro.

name: Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only
description:
Situated 150 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Mar Bella Beach, Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers sauna and gym, and a free WiFi zone. Each air-conditioned room features international satellite TV.

The hotel features a terrace with sea views and a seasonal infinity pool with hydromassage beds and seats. You can rent Balinese beds and sun loungers. There is also a seasonal snack bar, which is open from June to September.

Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers bright, functional rooms, many with views of the city or sea. They include a minibar, a free safe and a private bathroom with amenities.

The hotel’s Canela restaurant serves à la carte Mediterranean meals, and a varied breakfast buffet is available each morning. There are also many bars and restaurants on the nearby seafront promenade.

Regular bus services to central Barcelona stop outside the Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only, while Poble Nou Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away. The CCIB Conference Centre and Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre are just 1 km from the hotel.

name: Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel
description:
Set in 25,000 square metres of beautiful gardens and offering fantastic views of Barcelona, Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel is a luxury hotel set on Diagonal Avenue.

With unique experiences that will make this accommodation a benchmark in the Catalan capital, with access to the Palau de Congressos de Catalunya, the gardens of Torre Melina, and signature restaurants such as Erre Errechu and a cocktail bar by Erik Lorincz.

Spacious, air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries.

The Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel is 15 minutes walk from FC Barcelona Camp Nou stadium. Zona Universitaria Metro Stop is 450 metres away, connecting you with the city centre in under 20 minutes.

name: The White Flats Les Corts
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Welcome to The White Flats Les Corts, an exceptional accommodation in the heart of the charming Les Corts neighborhood in Barcelona!

These exclusive 2 or 3-bedroom apartments have been meticulously designed to offer you an experience of maximum comfort and style. Every corner has been carefully decorated with a modern and sophisticated touch, creating a cozy atmosphere that will make you feel at home. Additionally, its spaces are fully equipped with all the necessary amenities to provide you with an ideal stay. From the fully equipped kitchen to the extremely comfortable beds to offer you an optimal experience.

Despite not being in the city center, its location is unbeatable. Just a 5-minute walk away, you will find the Les Corts metro stop, allowing you to easily explore all the wonders that Barcelona has to offer. And if you're a football enthusiast, you'll be delighted to know that we are very close to the iconic Camp Nou stadium, home of the legendary FC Barcelona. In the surroundings, you will discover a wide range of services and amenities that will enrich your experience. From supermarkets where you can stock up to high-quality restaurants, charming cafes, and many shops.

The White Flats Les Corts goal's is to provide you with a truly memorable experience during your visit to Barcelona. An attentive team will always be ready to assist you with anything you need, ensuring that every moment of your stay is exceptional. You are invited to enjoy this accommodation, where they will welcome you with open arms. The White Flats Les Corts look forward to hosting you!

name: Serennia Cest Apartamentos Arc de Triomf
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
These modern apartments are located 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf. Each air-conditioned apartment includes a flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The apartments at Arc de Triomf Apartments feature parquet floors and light wood furniture. The modern kitchen has an oven, hob, washing machine and dishwasher.

There are plenty of bars, restaurants and supermarkets within a 2-minute walk of the apartments.

Arc de Triomf Apartments are just 200 metres from Estació del Nord Bus Station, and you can walk to Plaza Catalunya in 15 minutes. Ciutadela Park is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Lodging Apartments City Center-Eixample
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in a same building in the Eixample District, Lodging Apartments Eixample offers air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is a 4-minute walking away.

Each apartment features a living room with a flat-screen cable TV; and a fully equipped kitchen or kitchenette. There is a washing machine, and cleaning products are also provided.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the apartments; and you can find fresh produces at a market located 600 metres away.

Lodging Apartments Eixample is well connected by public transport; the closest metro stations are Tetuan and Verdaguer, both 500 metres from apartments. Barcelona North Bus Station is within 10 minutes’ walk of Lodging Apartments Eixample.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in a same building. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

name: Centric Apartments Paseo de Gracia
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Centric Apartments Paseo de Gracia provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. With quiet street views, this accommodation offers a balcony. In good weather, guests are welcome to sit outside.

Certain units in the apartment complex have private entrance and are equipped with desk and wardrobe. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. At the apartment complex, every unit includes a private bathroom and bed linen.

There is a snack bar and bar.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Centric Apartments Paseo de Gracia.

name: Montserrat Apartments by gaiarooms
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom
description:
Offering city views, Montserrat Apartments by gaiarooms is an accommodation located in Barcelona, 1.6 km from La Pedrera and 2 km from Casa Batllo. The air-conditioned accommodation is 200 metres from Sagrada Familia. The apartment features family rooms.

Certain units in the apartment complex have private entrance and are equipped with desk and wardrobe. With a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms are equipped with a terrace.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Montserrat Apartments by gaiarooms.

name: ICON Bcn
description:
This boutique hotel is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia. It offers a free bicycle use, free WiFi

Each room at the ICON Bcn by Petit Palace features modern décor, a flat-screen TV and a shower.

Guests will find a bar and a restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine and reception is open 24 hours a day. The hotel also offers a scooter hire service, subject to availability.

ICON Bcn by Petit Palace is just 7 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana. Urquinaona and Paseo de Gracia Metro are less than 5 minutes’ walk away. Gaudi's La Pedrera is 750 metres away, and you can walk to Ciutadella Park in 15 minutes.

name: Enjoy Apartments Borrell
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Enjoy Apartments Borrell offers air-conditioned apartments with free WiFi, located within 15 minutes’ walk of both Plaza España and Plaza Universidad. MACBA Museum and the Raval District are 1 km away.

Each apartment at Borrell has a living-dining area with a sofa, a TV and a dining area with a dining table. The kitchen is completed with a dishwasher and kitchenware; while the bathroom includes a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There are plenty of bars and shops within a 5-minute walk of the apartments, and trendy restaurants can be found at the Sant Antoni neighbourhood, 500 metres away.

Enjoy Apartments Borrell is also well connected by public transport. The closest metro station is Urgell, 6 minutes’ walk away.

name: Apartments Barcelona & Home Deco Centro
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 140m²
description:
Apartments Barcelona & Home Deco Centro offers comfortable apartments in different locations within the historical centre of Barcelona. It features balconies overlooking the city, elegant decor and free Wi-Fi.

Featuring a private balcony all air-conditioned apartments come with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Some provide a fully equipped kitchen with fridge and dishwasher, as well as a large living room with dining area. The bathrooms come with a shower or a bath. Some units have outdoor furniture and a dryer.

Apartments Barcelona & Home Deco Centro is approximately 1 km from the touristic ring of the city centre and the famous Sagrada Familia. La Rambla is within 1.5 km, while Plaça Catalunya is just a 10-minute walk away. Barcelona Airport is at a distance of 15 km.

name: You Stylish City Center Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 125m²
description:
Located next to Plaza Catalunya Station, You Stylish City Center Apartments offers modern apartments with air conditioning and free WiFi. These luxury apartments are, and just a 1-minute walk from Las Ramblas.

Each apartment is spacious and bright, with heating and elegant contemporary décor. The modern kitchens include a ceramic hob, dishwasher and kitchenware.

Guests have access to a 24-hour concierge service.

There are numerous restaurants and shops within a 2-minute walk, including El Corte Inglés supermarket. The You Stylish tour desk provides visitor information, and there is a Tourist Office just 150 metres away. There is a swimming pool and gym nearby available for guests at an extra cost.

Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop only 50 metres from the apartments. Plaza Catalunya Station offers direct Metro links to all areas of Barcelona, as well as trains to the Pyrenees and the Costa Brava.

name: Casa Vilaró Park Guell
description_short: Entire villa • 4 bedrooms • 2 living rooms • 4 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 500m²
description:
This stylish villa is located next to Gaudi’s Park Guell. Set in intimate gardens, it offers a seasonal outdoor pool, a sun terrace and free WiFi.

Casa Vilaró is set in a listed building, the first Rationalist building to be built in Spain. Its air-conditioned rooms feature contemporary décor and garden views. All 4 bedrooms have a flat-screen TV and an en suite bathroom with hairdryer and slippers. Bed linen and towels are included.

Offering views of Barcelona, the villa includes a shared, covered and furnished terrace, table tennis and a basketball court. There is a shared library with a fireplace, a shared dining room and a shared kitchen equipped with an oven, microwave, dishwasher, washer-dryer, and complimentary coffee, marmalade, oil, and milk.

Numerous bars, restaurants and shops are a short walk away. The centre of the Bohemian Gracia area, with its pleasant squares, is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Casa Vilaró is 600 metres from Vallcarca Metro Station and 9 minutes’ walk from Lesseps Metro Station. You can reach Plaza Cataluña Square and La Rambla by metro in around 15 minutes.

name: Lodging Apartments Forum 15 - Barcelona Forum apartment with sea view
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 98m²
description:
Offering a garden and sea view, Lodging Apartments Forum 15 - Barcelona Forum apartment with sea view is located in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Forum Beach and 1.3 km from Llevant. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.7 km from Platja del Litoral.

Featuring a Blu-ray player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a bidet. The unit is air conditioned and includes a terrace with an outdoor dining area as well as a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The property offers city views.

Port Olimpic is 4.5 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Lodging Apartments Forum 15 - Barcelona Forum apartment with sea view.

name: Four Petals Barcelona Boutique Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Four Petals Barcelona Boutique Apartments features accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. This sustainable apartment is located 2.3 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach. The apartment has family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Four Petals Barcelona Boutique Apartments.

name: BarcelonaForRent Tucson Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms
description:
BarcelonaForRent Tucson Suites is within walking distance of Gaudi’s masterpiece Sagrada Familia. It offers free WiFi; and some apartments have access to a rooftop private terrace.

The modern kitchen at the Tucson Suites, equipped with a dishwasher, ceramic hobs and kitchenware; opens onto a living-dining room featuring brick walls and traditional Catalan vaulted ceilings. There is a washing machine, a dryer and cleaning products are provided.

Numerous bars, restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found within 2 minutes’ walk.

Well connected by public transport, you can reach Barcelona City Centre and fashionable Passeig de Gracia within 15 minutes by metro.

name: Barcelonaforrent The Claris Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Barcelonaforrent The Claris Suites offers apartments with air conditioning and free WiFi in central Barcelona, 300 metres from Gaudi's La Pedrera.

Offering a balcony, each modern apartment combines chic and modernist decoration and has a flat-screen TV, speakers with Bluetooth connectivity, iPod dock. There is a full kitchen with a dishwasher, microwave and Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are included. You can enjoy a city view from the apartment.

There are plenty of shops, bars and restaurants in the surroundings, and Diagonal Metro is 550 metres away.

You can walk to Plaça Catalunya Square in 12 minutes, and Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia is 1.5 km away.

name: BarcelonaForRent Vila Olimpica Pool Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 120m²
description:
These spacious, air-conditioned apartments are set just 10 minutes’ walk from Vila Olímpica Beach. They are within 200 metres of Ciutadella Metro Station and a large shopping centre.

All accommodation at BarcelonaForRent Vila Olimpica Pool Suites has simple, modern décor. The living area has a sofa bed and a TV, and the kitchenette comes with an oven, coffee maker, fridge and a washing machine.

Shops, bars and cafés can be found around the Olympic Port, just 10 minutes’ walk from BarcelonaForRent Vila Olimpica Pool Suites. Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the Borne district are just 2 Metro stops from Ciutadella Station.

The apartments are less than 300 metres from Ciutadella Park, where there is also a tram stop. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 15 minutes by bus. Private parking is available on request for an extra fee.

name: Barcelonaforrent Alessandra Central Ramblas Apartment
description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Sant Sebastian Beach and Sant Miquel Beach, Barcelonaforrent Alessandra Central Ramblas Apartment offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and coffee machine. This apartment provides accommodation with a balcony. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surroundings. A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Barcelonaforrent Alessandra Central Ramblas Apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 11 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Ramblas Internacional
description:
Hotel Ramblas Internacional is set right on the famous Las Ramblas, 50 metres from Liceu Metro Station and close to La Boquería Market.
Each of the soundproofed rooms is individually decorated and has plenty of natural light. Most rooms offer views of central Barcelona and some look onto Las Ramblas.

Hotel Ramblas Internacional serves a daily breakfast.

Located just 150 metres from Liceu Theatre, the hotel has easy access to Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the city’s cathedral is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Pensión Villanueva
description:
Centrally located in one of the most charming areas of the historic center of  Barcelona, Pension Villanueva is located 100 metres from la Rambla. It offers comfortable accommodation with city views and free WiFi.

All rooms Pension Villanueva are soundproofed, and guests have access to either a shared bathroom or a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony and some have views of the Rambla or of Plaça Reial Square.

Other facilities offered include luggage storage.

Pension Villanueva is 900 metres  from Plaça Catalunya is surrounded by shops, restaurants, and café bars. Camp Nou is 4.5 km away and the beaches of Barceloneta are a 5-minute drive from the property. Barcelona Airport is at a distance of 12 km.

name: AC Hotel Barcelona Fórum by Marriott
description:
AC Hotel Barcelona Forum is located opposite Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre, at the end of Avenida Diagonal. It offers a rooftop pool and modern rooms with Mediterranean Sea views. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

All stylish rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and minibar. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer.

The Suite Bar offers healthy Mediterranean food, including tapas and bluefin tuna. Room service is available 24 hours a day, and there is a safe in reception.

AC Hotel Barcelona Forum is 500 metres from Maresme Metro Station. From here you can reach Passeig de Gràcia in central Barcelona in 15 minutes. Barcelona Airport is 19 km away.

name: Eurohotel Diagonal Port
description:
Just 350 metres from Mar Bella Beach, Eurohotel Diagonal Port offers Mediterranean Sea views from its setting in Barcelona’s Poble Nou district.

Rooms at this hotel are spacious and feature contemporary design. All come with air conditioning, satellite TV. Free wired internet access is also available.

Facilities at Eurohotel Diagonal Port include a continental breakfast.

Eurohotel Diagonal Port is located 7 minutes’ walk from Poblenou Metro Station, which is just 5 stops from central Barcelona. The hotel is just over 2 km from Ciutadella Park and the Forum venue is a 20-minute walk away.

The hotel offers easy access to the 22@ financial district, close to Barcelona International Convention Centre and shops. There is a Metro station and buses stop within 5 minutes' walk of the hotel.

name: Hotel Viladomat by Silken
description:
Conveniently located less than 10 minutes’ walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station, Hotel Viladomat by Silken is located in Barcelona. This property features free WiFi and an on-site bar.

Each room at this property is air conditioned and has satellite TV, safe, desk, and minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

Hotel Viladomat by Silken has a 24-hour front desk and offers a ticket service. A shuttle to the airport is available for an extra charge, and there is luggage storage on site.

Plaza Catalunya and Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas are 20 minutes away by foot. The friendly staff are happy to provide information on the city and its main points of interest. Sants Station is 1 km away from Hotel Viladomat by Silken, with direct links to Barcelona Airport.

name: NH Barcelona Entenza
description:
NH Barcelona Entenza is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Station and high-speed AVE Station. La Fira Exhibition Centre is 1.5 km away. All air-conditioned rooms are spacious, soundproofed and offer free Wi-Fi.

Rooms in the NH Barcelona Entenza Hotel are bright and modern with wooden floors. They feature satellite TV, minibar and a fully equipped bathroom with hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel and breakfast in the room is available. One of Barcelona’s main streets, Diagonal Avenue, is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, with many restaurants and shops.

The NH Barcelona Entenza is in a quiet area but is well-connected to the city centre by Metro. Entença Metro Station is 200 metres away. FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium is 3 stops away by Metro.

name: Hostal Benidorm
description:
Situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, Hostal Benidorm offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Liceu Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

Each room at the Benidorm Hostal features simple décor and tiled floors. All rooms have central heating and a private bathroom.

Drinks and snacks are available from vending machines in the Benidorm’s reception area. Staff at the front desk can provide information about the city and arrange car or bicycle rental.

Hostal Benidorm is located just outside the historic Gothic Quarter. Gaudi’s Palau Güell is 100 metres away, while the Boqueria Market is within 400 metres. Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 25 minutes’ walk or a 10-minute bus.

name: Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via
description:
This spacious and modern hotel is located in Eixample district, built in 2004, the Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via, features wide-open public spaces covered in marble.

Rooms include flat-screen TV, Wifi, safebox, desk, minibar, private bathrooms with toiletries.

A good location for tourism, you can easily walk to the Gothic Quarter and Ramblas, or up to the attractions of Montjuic. The city’s major business districts are also nearby.

Rooms include satellite TV, free Wi-Fi access, air conditioning and a bathroom with free toiletries.

Parking is available on site at an additional cost.

name: Catalonia Atenas
description:
Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath.

The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge with complimentary water, and satellite TV.

The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen. There is a snack bar and guests can enjoy stunning city views from the pool, set on the 11th floor.

The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.

The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 200 metres from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

name: Hotel Condal
description:
Set 50 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station, Hotel Condal offers rooms with free WiFi and private bathrooms. Opened in 1850, this hotel in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter offers air conditioned or heated accommodation, depending on the season.

The Condal’s rooms have simple décor with tiled floors. Each room has a flat-screen TV.

A continental breakfast is served in Hotel Condal’s café-bar. There is a varied selection of restaurants in the streets surrounding the hotel.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, including the MACBA Museum and Barcelona Cathedral, which can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. The Condal is less than 1 km from Port Vell Marina.

name: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia
description:
Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia is located just 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s famous Sagrada Familia. It has a rooftop sun terrace with panoramic views of Barcelona and rooms with free Wi-Fi.

All modern, outward-facing rooms at theLeonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia are equipped with air conditioning and heating. They have a flat-screen TV and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia serves a daily buffet breakfast, and gluten-free meals are available on prior request. In summer, breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace. There are also vending machines with snacks and drinks.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Clot Metro Station is 200 metres away, allowing you to reach the city centre in 10 minutes.

name: The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Llevant, The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a shared lounge and a business centre, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a terrace and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.

All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a seating area. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels.

Speaking Catalan, Czech, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is 1.6 km from The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou, while Mar Bella Beach is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Serhs Carlit
description:
Hotel Serhs Carlit is located in Barcelona, 900 metres from the iconic Sagrada Família Basilica and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms, all with free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV.

The Serhs Carlit is a 10-minute walk from Arc de Triomf, with Ciutadella Park and the trendy Born district just beyond. You can walk to the Agbar Tower in 15 minutes.

Tetuan Metro Station is just 200 metres away, just 1 stop away from Passeig de Gràcia. Estació del Nord Bus Station is 750 metres away.

The hotel has a café-bar serving a daily buffet breakfast, as well as snacks and drinks throughout the day. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, as well as offering restaurant recommendations.

name: BYPILLOW Wander
description:
Set just 100 metres from La Rambla in central Barcelona, BYPILLOW Wander offers modern rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. Drassanes Metro Station is just 50 metres away.

Located on the 4th floor, all rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and shower. They are heated, air-conditioned and include a flat-screen TV.

You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants and bars in the area. Barcelona’s Port Vell is just 350 metres from BYPILLOW Wander and the Maritime Museum is 150 metres away.

Barcelona Beach can be reached in a 15-minute bus ride. Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk from the property and buses to the airport leave from there.

name: Generator Barcelona
description:
Generator Barcelona is located 500 metres from the fashionable Passeig de Gracia Avenue. The hostel offers a 24-hour reception, free private lockers in shared dormitories and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Diagonal and Verdaguer metro stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from Generator Barcelona. The Gràcia district, which has plenty of boutique shops and bars, is only 200 metres away.

Both private rooms and dormitories have air conditioning and heating, as well as individual power sockets and reading lamps for each bed. Female-only dormitories include hairdryers and other amenities.

They also feature an en suite bathroom, a sink and a mirror. Bed linen is included, while towels can be rented at the reception. Dormitories are available for guests over 18 years old.

Guests can have a daily breakfast for an extra cost. Generator Barcelona also has a communal lounge and a luggage storage service.

name: Som Nit Triomf
description:
Centrally located, Som Nit Triomf features rooms with free WiFi and private bathroom. It is 800 metres from Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya as well as from Barcelona North Bus Station.

Rooms are fitted with traditional Catalan Modernist tiles and they all have a wardrobe. Some rooms have a balcony with city views. A kettle and ironing facilities are available on prior request at reception.

There is a plenty of restaurants, shops and trendy bars in the surrounding area and a 24-hour supermarket can be found 200 metres away.

Som Nit Triomf is located between the Eixample and Borne District, 450 metres from Arc de Triomf and Urquinaona Metro Stations.  You can walk to fashionable Passeig de Gracia in 10 minutes and the tree-lined Passeig de Companys connected to Ciutadella Park is just 150 metres away.

name: APTBCN Super Balmes Guest House
description:
Super Balmes Guest House is located in Barcelona city center, 2 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya Square. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

The Guest House offers private rooms in shared apartments located in different building of the same central area.

They all come with a flat-screen TV and have a shared or private bathroom. Bed linen and towels are included. All apartments have a fully equipped kitchen for guests’ use and a shared lounge with sofas.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within walking distances. Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located within 10-minute walk.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different rooms and apartments located in the Barcelona City Center area. Please select a date and click on the room type to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

name: Central and Basic Solarium HOSTEL
description:
A 5-minute walk from Las Ramblas and Drassanes Metro Station, Pensión Solárium is set in Barcelona’s Ciutat Vella district. It has a lounge and a small terrace, where free Wi-Fi is available.

Pensión Solárium has simple, modern décor. Its rooms have either private or shared bathroom facilities.

The Pensión is within 10 minutes’ walk of a range of cafes and bars. The Raval and nearby Gothic Quarter offer a selection of popular restaurants.

Barcelona’s old Port is 500 metres away, while the beaches around Barceloneta are a 20-minute bus journey from the Solárium. Airport buses leave from Plaza de Catalunya, 2 Metro stops from Drassanes Station.

name: Hotel Concordia Barcelona
description:
Hotel Concordia Barcelona is situated 800 metres from Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. It features a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub, cocktail bar and solarium.

The Hotel Concordia Barcelona’s bright, spacious rooms feature contemporary décor and air conditioning.  Each room includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with a range of amenities.

The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant  Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. There is also a café and cocktail bar open daily. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and electrical cars charging station is available.

Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport buses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away.

Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

name: Room Mate Carla
description:
Room Mate Carla is set 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, and 5-minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s La Pedrera in Barcelona’s Eixample District. It features free WiFi and colourful, stylish rooms.

Decorated with lively prints, the air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom.

Room Mate Carla features a modern bar offering a range of cocktails. You will also find a terrace and meeting rooms on site.

The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Sagrada Familia Cathedral. Verdaguer and Diagonal Metro Stations are 500 metres away and offer easy access to Las Ramblas and Sants Train Station.

name: Casa Gracia
description:
Casa Gràcia is a modern hostel at the top of Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia, 300 metres from Gaudí’s La Pedrera. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi in all areas.

Shared and private rooms are available, as well as apartments. Facilities at Casa Gràcia include a communal terrace, lounge, kitchen, dining area and a 24-hour front desk.

The hostel arranges daily walking tours of the city.

Casa Gràcia is situated just metres from Avinguda Diagonal and within 300 metres of Diagonal Metro Station, which offers access to the Sagrada Familia.

Passeig de Gràcia is full of exclusive shops, restaurants and bars. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló is within a 10-minute walk,  as well as the popular Gràcia neighbourhood. There are a number of beautiful Modernist buildings in the area.

name: Allegro Barcelona
description:
Allegro Barcelona is a futuristic design hotel, situated 100 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station. Its stylish rooms include free Wi-Fi, digital radio and LCD TV with satellite channels.

Each room at Allegro Barcelona features elegant white décor with colourful touches. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with an electronic safe. Bathrooms include a hairdryer and toiletries.

A continental breakfast buffet is served until 10:30 each day at Allegro Barcelona. Numerous tapas bars and pavement cafés can be found on Rambla de Catalunya, a 5-minute walk away.

Other facilities include portable WiFi for no charge.

The famous Gaudi buildings and designer shops of Passeig de Gracia are just 500 metres from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk away. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Barcelona, recommend excursions and arrange airport transfers.

name: Mosaic Barcelona by Ona
description:
Located in a historic building in the heart of Rambla Catalunya, Mosaic Barcelona by Ona is situated in Barcelona, 10 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya and 5 minutes' walk from Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned, and features a flat-screen TV and modern décor. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. The hotel also offers car hire.

Due to its central location, several bars and restaurants can be found nearby.

The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Mosaic Barcelona by Ona.

name: NH Barcelona Stadium
description:
Overlooking Camp Nou Stadium and Diagonal Avenue, the modern NH Barcelona Stadium offers free WiFi, a gym and seasonal rooftop pool. The air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and a pillow menu.

NH Barcelona Stadium Hotel’s seasonal sun terrace offers wonderful views across Barcelona to Montjuic. It also has sun loungers.

The hotel’s restaurant, Acanto, offers a varied buffet breakfast, as well as an á la carte lunch menu. The lobby café is open until midnight every day. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

Les Corts Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk away and offers a direct link to Barcelona’s historic centre. Diagonal Avenue can be reached in 10 minutes on foot, and Sants Station is 1.5 km away.

Barcelona's Fira Congress Centre is a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport can also be reached in 10 minutes by car.

name: Àmfores Boutique Guest House
description:
Set within 1.2 km of Santa Maria del Mar and 1.1 km of Picasso Museum, Àmfores Boutique Guest House provides rooms in Barcelona. Located around 850 m from Tivoli Theatre, the guest house with free WiFi is also 750 m away from La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is situated in the Ciutat Vella district.

All guest rooms in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room comes with a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Àmfores Boutique Guest House is set in a building of medieval origin, located next to the Palau de la Música and the city centre.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Speaking Catalan and English, staff are ready to help at the reception.

Plaça Catalunya is 800 m from Àmfores Boutique Guest House. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from the guest house.

name: Oriente Atiram
description:
The Atiram Oriente is located on Las Ramblas, between the Liceu Theatre and the Columbus Monument. Set in a 19th-century building, this hotel features a restaurant, terrace and free Wi-Fi.

All rooms have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Each has simple, contemporary décor with heating and air conditioning.

The hotel’s pretty restaurant serves buffet cuisine and a daily continental breakfast. There is a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. The Atiram Oriente Barcelona also has a café on the Ramblas, close to many shops and restaurants.

The famous Boquería Market and Gothic Quarter are just a few minutes’ walk from the Hotel Atiram Oriente. Barcelona’s Port Vell is less than 500 metres away and Liceu Metro Station is 1 minute walk from the hotel.

name: Room Mate Anna
description:
Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a solarium, Room Mate Anna is set in Barcelona City Centre. The hotel features cutting-edge and modern design as well as personalized service. The hotel serves a daily hot and cold buffet breakfast until midday.

Each stylish, air-conditioned room comes with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day as well as a balcony with views over Casa Batlló. Extras include a wide variety of free toiletries, a hairdryer and safe box.

Other facilities include a portable WiFi and meeting and conference rooms.

On the eigth floor of the hotel the bar Terraza de Anna by Vida Mona offers views over the city, cocktails and mediterranean tapas.
 The restaurant Vibra Speakeasy, inspired by the style of 1920, offers live music, food and cocktails from that time.

The Room Mate Anna is set in the heart of L'Eixample, just 100 metres from Casa Batlló. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and cultural spots. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas
description:
Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas is situated in the centre of Barcelona’s Old Town, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It features a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool.

The hotel offers simple, attractive décor and rooms are spacious. Each has air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities.

The Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas serves a daily, buffet breakfast. There are several bars, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the property.

Guests can make use of computers with internet access, available in the hotel reception area. Staff at the tour desk can provide information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions and arrange car rental.

The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral and the city’s Gothic Quarter. The Old Port is around 700 metres from the hotel, whilst Liceu Metro is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Transit
description:
Hotel Transit is just 3 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants, the city’s main AVE Train Station. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

Rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, central heating and central air conditioning. Some rooms overlook an interior patio. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, shower, and hairdryer.

There are vending machines on-site for coffee, drinks and snacks. Several bars and restaurants can be found a short walk from the Transit Hotel.

You can reach Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla in 10 minutes by bus or Metro, and Sants Estació Metro Station is 250 metres away. Plaza Espanya and the Magic Fountain are 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
description:
Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and restaurant in Barcelona. This 4-star hotel features free WiFi and a bar. Certain units at the property feature a balcony with a city view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel every room includes bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Llevant is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel.

name: Capri by Fraser Barcelona
description:
This motorcycle-friendly hotel is 3 Metro stops from Plaza Catalunya and 15 minutes’ walk from the Barcelona’s beaches. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers chic air-conditioned and spacious suites and apartments with a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. There is a fully-equipped kitchenette, a work desk and a safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The property has a free self-service laundry room open 24 hours a day and a gym.

For guests coming by motorcycle, Capri by Fraser offers free indoor parking with direct elevator to the rooms and a “pit stop” service including complete toolkit for small repairs and chain lubricant, free suede, helmet visor cleaner, battery charger and compressor to check the pressure level of tyres.

Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers a buffet breakfast every day and a set menu at lunch time during week days. Room service is also available.

The hotel has a 24-hour front desk.

name: Catalonia Albeniz
description:
Catalonia Albeniz offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is situated 150 metres from Clot Train Station, and a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia Church.

The property has a gym and an outdoor pool. You can also use the luggage storage facility on site at the Albeniz.

The varied buffet breakfast at the Catalonia Albeniz includes typical local dishes, such as potato omelette and bread with tomato.

The Albeniz offers bright, modern rooms with simple décor and wooden floors. Each room includes a minibar and a marble bathroom with a hair dryer, plus a safe. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Catalonia Albeniz is just 700 metres from the shops and restaurants of Glòries Shopping Centre, while Encants Flea Market is a 5-minute walk away. Metro services and direct airport trains are available from nearby Clot Station.

name: Hotel America Barcelona
description:
Situated in the charming Enric Granados Boulevard, 500 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia, this stylish hotel offers a gym, sauna and rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views.

America Barcelona’s rooms are bright and airy, decorated with soft colours and wooden flooring. Each one has a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine, and some courtesy capsules are provided on arrival. The private bathroom comes with a rain shower, bathrobes and slippers.

Hotel America Barcelona serves a daily buffet breakfast including fresh pastries and fruit and offers a relaxed café-bar in the lobby. A range of drinks and cocktails can be enjoyed on the seasonal terrace, overlooking the city.

Guests are welcome to enjoy free 24-hour access to the modern gym equipped with sauna as well as a free welcome drink including cava, sparkling water or natural juice.

Plaça Catalunya and the Gothic Quarter are just a 15-minute walk from the America Barcelona. Diagonal Metro station is only 400 metres away.

name: Apart-Suites Hostemplo
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 32m²
description:
Apart-Suites Hostemplo offers stylish apartments and suites set in 2 beautiful Modernist buildings, 250 metres from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia. This soundproofed accommodation features free Wi-Fi and a DVD player.

The property offers contemporary décor with wooden floors. The apartments come with air conditioning and heating, as well as a private balcony. Most have views of Sagrada Família. Most of the apartments have a washing machine.

A buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local produce and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily at Hotel Hostemplo, located 150 meters from the property.

The junior suite features a fridge, microwave and kettle, and it has a TV. Located on the 5th floor, it offers views of Sagrada Família.

In 5 minutes you can walk to Sagrada Família Market, as well as Gaudí Avenue, where there are many restaurants, bars and shops. Barcelona's open-top bus tour route also stops just 3 minutes' walk from the property.

Apart-Suites Hostemplo is situated just metres from Avinguda Diagonal and just 3 minutes' walk from Sagrada Família Metro Station. Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are a 10-minute walk away on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, in the city centre.

name: BYPILLOW House
description:
BYPILLOW House offers air-conditioned rooms with balcony and free WiFi and private parking. The property is 300 metres from Maragall Metro Station connected to famous Sagrada Familia and o the popular sandy Barceloneta Beach in Barcelona.

Fitted with wooden floor, bright rooms have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries and bath or shower. Suites come with 2 separate areas with 2 double beds.

Buses to the city centre leave from a bus station located 200 metres away. Plaza Catalunya is 30 minutes by public transports and you can reach fashionable Passeig de Gracia in 20 minutes by metro.

name: Blanc Guest House
description:
Blanc Guest House is 8 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers an attractive terrace and smart rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV.

The rooms at Blanc Guest House are decorated in white, with parquet floors and white furniture. Each one comes with air conditioning, heating and a fan, and some have a private bathroom.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Car rental is also available from the front desk.

The Blanc is 8 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station, connecting you with the rest of the city with ease. Plaza Catalunya is just 2 stops away.

name: Wilson Boutique Hotel
description:
Wilson Boutique Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal, 12 minutes’ walk from La Pedrera in Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers free Wi-Fi, stylish décor and a rooftop terrace with impressive city views.

The Wilson Boutique Hotel has soundproofed rooms with chic, contemporary design. All rooms are bright with large windows. Each has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

The hotel is within walking distance of Plaza de Catalunya which features a range of shops and restaurants.

The Wilson Boutique has excellent transport links. Many buses, including the sightseeing bus, stop opposite the hotel.

The hotel offers free use of the PC and printer in the lobby. There is also a tour desk, where guests can receive information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions, including Gaudí’s Casa Batlló which is around 20 minutes’ walk from the Wilson. Diagonal Metro Station is 750 metres away.

name: Zenit Borrell
description:
Zenit Borrell is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, 15 minutes’ walk from the stylish Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers modern, soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

The Marés restaurant offers Mediterranean and international cuisine, and has an elegant outdoor terrace. There is also a bar with a large TV screen.

All rooms at the Zenit Borrell have air conditioning and a minibar. The private bathrooms come equipped with a hairdryer.

The tour desk can provide useful information on Barcelona and the surrounding area. The hotel is 12 minutes from Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas by metro, while the Hospital Clinic Metro Station and hospital are 200 metres way from the hotel.

name: Hotel Nouvel
description:
Offering air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Nouvel is located on a pedestrianised street just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas.

The hotel features ornate ceilings, cast bronze and crystal lamps, and marble floors, in the style of its 19th-century building.

All rooms come with a flat-screen TV, double-glazed windows and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. A safe is available to rent.

The hotel’s La Lluna Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Vending machines with snacks, ice, and drinks, are also available.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can help you arrange car hire, a laundry service and tickets for shows. You will also find luggage storage and a reading room with two computers.

Portal de Angel shopping street is just 2 minutes’ walk away, while Barcelona Cathedral and the Gothic Quarter are a 10-minute walk from Hotel Nouvel.

name: Youth Hostel - Central and Basic Universitat
description:
Set in the lively Ciutat Vella District, next to the MACBA Museum, it is 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Universitat Square.

Decorated with bright colours, all the rooms come with single beds which can be joined together and some have a private bathroom with shower. Free toiletries are also provided.

Central & Basic Universitat is surrounded by a wide range of shops and supermarkets. You can find some of the trendiest restaurants and bars of the city in a 5-minute walk.

The Ramblas and Boquería Market are 800 metres away and you can walk to Plaça Catalunya Square in about 10 minutes’ walk. El Prat Barcelona Airport is 30 minutes by public transport. Regular buses leave from a bus stop located just 800 metres away.

name: Apartments Sata Sagrada Familia Area
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
These apartments are located in a quiet area of Barcelona’s Gràcia district, just 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s impressive Sagrada Família Basilica. They feature free Wi-Fi and a washing machine.

The air-conditioned apartments at Apartaments Sata Sagrada Familia Area feature tiled floors and modern décor. The lounge has a TV and a sofa, and the kitchen includes a microwave, hob and toaster.

Apartamentos Sata Sagrada Familia Area are within 15 minutes walk of Parc Güell and the amazing Hospital Sant Pau. Located 5 minutes’ walk away, Joanic Metro Station connects you with Passeig de Gràcia in just 3 minutes.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the same building. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

name: Hotel Serhs del Port
description:
Set on Paral-lel Avenue, this modern design hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas and Barcelona Port. Its stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi and a satellite TV.

Hotel Serhs del Port´s modern rooms offer a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Montjuïc Hill is within a 10-minute walk of Hotel Serhs del Port. A funicular train connects Montjuïc with Paral-lel Metro Station, located 500 metres from the hotel.

Direct Metro services also connect Paral-lel to Plaça Catalunya Square, Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudí’s famous Parc Guëll. Hotel Serhs del Port´s tour desk can provide information about the city.

name: Barceló Sants
description:
Situated above Barcelona Sants Train Station, Barceló Sants offers a subtle outer space theme throughout. Minimalist rooms feature free Wi-Fi, rain showers, and large windows with city views.

Air-conditioned rooms feature modern décor and designer furniture. Each has an iPod dock, flat-screen TV, and tea and coffee making facilities. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

This design hotel includes a fitness centre.

The hotel has 2 restaurants. Oxygen Restaurant serves a healthy buffet and Hydrogen Restaurant offers more avant-garde cuisine. The hotel's Orbital Bar serves a selection of cocktails, gins and vodkas. You can also try typical tapas in the many nearby bars and restaurants.

Sants Train and Metro Station offers direct access to Barcelona Airport, and the historic city centre, 3.5 km away. There are also high-speed AVE services to Madrid and international trains.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge and the hotel has a Wi-Fi zone.

name: Ilunion Auditori
description:
Situated 10 minutes' walk from the Arc de Triomf Metro and Train Station, the Ilunion Auditori features a rooftop swimming pool 3 m wide by 5 m long and gym. Free WiFi is available throughout.

All modern rooms at the Auditori have wooden floors, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a safe. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

The Ilunion Auditori serves a daily breakfast and offers à- la-carte dishes made with seasonal products. There is also a special menu for celiac and food intolerant guests. Room service is available during limited hours, and a snack bar is open during the evening. A range of restaurants and bars can be found in the nearby areas of the Eixample, Born and Gothic Quarter.

Guests can enjoy a work out at the gym, which is equipped with cardiovascular equipment. The seasonal rooftop pool, which is surrounded by sun loungers, offers the ideal place for relaxation with stunning views over the city.

Free internet access is available at the computers in the reception area. The famous Barcelona Auditorium is a 5-minute walk away, while the the Sagrada Familia and the Ciutadella Park are 1.5 km away. Underground private parking is available on site for an additional charge.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

name: Room Mate Gerard
description:
Room Mate Gerard in Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre.

It boasts a sun terrace and location, set in the Eixample district, near attractions such as Tivoli Theatre and within 700 metres of Portal de l'Angel.

At the hotel all rooms offer a simple yet elegant décor. They come with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Air-conditioning is featured, and certain rooms include a balcony. All units include a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Other facilities include portable WiFi.

Plaça Catalunya is a 9-minute walk from the accommodation. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Ako Suites Hotel
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Ako Suites Hotel offers stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi and modern kitchenettes. It is located a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Square.

The Ako Suites have a sleek minimalist design and are decorated in light colours. A flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed can be found in each air-conditioned apartment.

Kitchenettes include a ceramic hob and a microwave. The elegant bathrooms have a bath or shower. Towels and amenities are also provided.

Ako Suites Hotel is located just 300 metres from Universitat Metro Station and a 5-minute walk from an airport bus stop. Staff at the 24-hour reception is happy to provide information about the city.

name: Boutique Hostemplo Sagrada Familia
description:
Offering free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Boutique Hostemplo is located on a pedestrian street just 100 metres from Barcelona's Sagrada Familia. The hotel has a friendly and very peaceful atmosphere.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a kettle in the room. Every room comes with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find a hairdryer and toiletries.

The surroundings are full of bars, restaurants and shops, like the F.C. Barcelona Museum. Las Glorias Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away. Gaudí’s Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes' walk away. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located 2 minutes' walk away, connects you with the city centre in 7 minutes, offering easy access to Plaza Catalunya, the Ramblas and the beach.

You can buy discounted tickets for the tourist bus, which stops 100 metres from the hotel.

The buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local products and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily in our café from 08:00 to 10:30.

name: BYPILLOW Mothern
description:
Situated just outside Barcelona’s central Plaza Catalunya Square, BYPILLLOW  Mothern  offers bright, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. Buses to Barcelona Airport stop 100 metres away.

BYPILLLOW Mothern is situated next to Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, 600 metres from Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and a 5-minute walk from the Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter. Metro and regional train services stop at Catalunya Station, just 50 metres away.

 Set in a restored 19th century building, BYPILLLOW Mothern features simple and modern décor throughout. It has a 24-hour reception with a tour desk and ticket service.

You can work from the comfortable coworking space or terrace, or having a buffet breakfast in the dining room. You can also find a wide range of cafés, tapas bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets.

name: Hotel Oasis
description:
Hotel Oasis is located just 250 metres from França Railway Station and 100 metres from Barcelona’s Born district. The modern, air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and private bathrooms with hairdryer.

The hotel features a seasonal terrace with a seasonal outdoor pool. The hotel's Oasis café-bar offers a range of hot drinks and cocktails throughout the day.

The beach and bars of Barceloneta are just 200 metres away, while Santa Maria del Mar Church is 4 minutes’ walk away. Oasis is 50 metres from Barceloneta Metro Station, and 300 metres from Ciutadella Park.

Please be aware that the type of bed is always subject to availability.

name: Colors
description:
This modern hotel offers free wired internet access and colourful rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The beautiful Laberint d’Horta Park is around a 15-minute walk away.

Colors is situated in a quiet residential area, just 350 metres from Valldaura Metro Station. Direct trains connect to Barcelona city centre in around 15 minutes. Free parking can also be found nearby.

Colors is located next to Can Cortada, one of Barcelona’s most popular restaurants. The hotel also has a coffee bar, where you can enjoy a breakfast buffet and light meals.

Rooms at the hotel offer a functional design and simple, stylish décor. Each room is air-conditioned and includes a safe.

name: Acacia Suite
