description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Acacia Suite is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, just 50 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station. It offers air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and a shared roof terrace.

The modern apartments feature a lounge with carpeted floors, sofas and a TV. The kitchenette includes an electric hob and a microwave. Bed linen and towels are changed daily.

The Acacia serves a daily continental breakfast directly at the apartments. The aparthotel also has a free business centre. Board games are also available for guests’ use.

The Acacia offers discounts on Barcelona’s popular tourist bus. The city’s financial district is 800 metres away, and you can reach Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in 3 minutes by metro.

name: Barceló Raval
description:
Set in Barcelona’s vibrant Raval district, this design hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a roof terrace with pool and panoramic views. Some rooms include a Nespresso coffee machine.

Each bright, air-conditioned room at the Barceló Raval features a large plasma-screen TV with more than 70 channels. Rooms have a minibar and a modern bathroom.

Hotel Barceló Raval’s B-Lounge serves creative Mediterranean food, tapas and cocktails in stylish surroundings. You can also enjoy a drink on the outdoor terrace.

The Raval Barceló is only a 5-minute walk from the MACBA Modern Art Gallery. Liceu Metro Station, Las Ramblas and the famous Boqueria Market are all just 400 metres away.

name: Sunotel Club Central
description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub on its terrace, Sunotel Club Central is set in Barcelona’s elegant Eixample neighbourhood.

Each modern air-conditioned room has free, high-speed WiFi, a TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower and hairdryer.

Sunotel Club Central features a cosy bar, serving snacks and drinks. There is also room service available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, and free bicycles are available upon request and subject to availability.

Passeig de Gracia, with its Gaudi monuments and designer shops, is a 10-minute walk from Sunotel Club Central. The famous Las Ramblas Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya are a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away, and you can catch an airport bus in Plaza Catalunya.

name: Occidental Diagonal 414
description:
Attractively set in the centre of Barcelona, Occidental Diagonal 414 features air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Boasting room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, rooms come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms come with a safety deposit box, while certain rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near Occidental Diagonal 414 include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Sercotel Caspe
description:
This design hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station and Estació del Nord Bus Station.  It has a gym, and offers free Wi-Fi and free bottled water.

Rooms at the Sercotel Caspe are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They feature satellite TV, a minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The Sercotel Caspe has an outdoor terrace, an attractive restaurant and a café-bar. Room service is also available.

The hotel is a short walk from Gaudí's buildings on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is approximately 20 minutes' walk away.

There is a tour desk and 24-hour reception. Car hire is available and there is on-site parking for an extra charge.

name: Caledonian
description:
The Caledonian has an ideal setting on Barcelona's Gran Vía, just 5 minutes' walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Its rooms include free Wi-Fi internet access.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Caledonian feature simple, attractive décor with wooden floors. Each has a minibar and some rooms offer views of Gran Vía.

The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in its dining room. There is a good selection of restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk of the Caledonian.

Universitat Metro Station is just 100 metres from the hotel and connects guests to sights such as Gaudí’s La Perdrera and the Sagrada Familia within 15 minutes.

Guests can make use of services such as the 24-hour front desk and express check-in and check-out. The hotel also has luggage storage.

name: Zenit Barcelona
description:
Zenit Barcelona is 250 metres from Plaza Francesc Macià on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue. This modern hotel offers stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, with free Wi-Fi and a pillow menu.

The Zenit is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló can be found. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a further 15 minutes’ walk away.

Rooms at the Zenit Barcelona feature satellite TV and a safe and minibar. There is a work desk and a kettle with free tea and coffee set; the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Zenit Hotel’s restaurant offers gourmet Spanish and international cuisine. A special gluten-free breakfast and children's menus are available, and packed lunches and room service can be requested.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. A laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service is offered. Parking is available 10 minutes' walk away, for an extra cost.

name: Room Mate Pau
description:
Room Mate Pau is set 50 metres from the emblematic Plaza Catalunya. It offers a stylish décor and a terrace and bright, contemporary rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Room Mate Pau feature chic decor and air conditioning. All include a plasma TV with USB port for laptop connection, a minibar, safe and a modern private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily, which you can enjoy at the property's shared terrace. Events can be catered for and various bars, restaurants and shops are within 2 minutes’ walk.

Other facilities include meeting and conference rooms.

Room Mate Pau is 2 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas and Passeig de Gracia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudí monuments. Urquinaona Metro station is 150 metres away, 2 stops from Barceloneta and its beach.

The hotel can help book tickets and activities and is 250 metres from Catalunya Metro and FGC Train Station.

name: Amra Barcelona Gran Via
description:
Featuring free WiFi, Amra Barcelona Gran Via is located in Barcelona, within a 10-minute walk of Plaza Catalunya and Arc de Triomf. This guest house offers a shared terrace and garden.

Each air conditioned room at this guest house has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, free safe, and work desk, plus a minibar and coffee machine. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

The property also offers a ticket service and  parking for an extra charge. Guests can make use of our chill-out sun terrace.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and grocery shops within a 5-minute walk from Amra Barcelona Gran Vía. Plaza Catalunya is 750 metres from the property, and Gaudi's Sagrada Familia is just 2 metro stops away.

name: Ilunion Bel-Art
description:
Attractively situated in the Horta-Guinardó district of Barcelona, Ilunion Bel-Art is situated 1 km from Sagrada Familia, 2.7 km from La Pedrera and 1.8 km from Park Güell. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Ilunion Bel-Art rooms include bed linen and towels.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

Casa Batllo is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Ilunion Bel-Art.

name: Isabella's House
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Featuring a bar and views of city, Isabella's House is a sustainable aparthotel set in Barcelona, 3 km from La Pedrera. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel features family rooms.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a a bath or shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a fridge, a stovetop, and kitchenware. At the aparthotel, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the neighbourhood.

Sants Railway Station is 3 km from the aparthotel, while Camp Nou is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Isabella's House.

name: Circa 1905
description:
This small hotel occupies the first floor of a modernist building, just 50 metres from central Barcelona’s famous shopping street, Passeig de Gràcia. It offers elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Air-conditioned rooms at Circa 1905 include a blend of classic and modern features. There is a balcony and private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a breakfast of local produce. Free tea and coffee are offered 24 hours a day.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is just 100 metres away, while you can walk to Casa Batlló in under 5 minutes.

name: Hesperia Barcelona Presidente
description:
Set on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, the Hesperia Barcelona Presidente offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. There is a gym and a terrace offering city views.

This hotel has views of the city.

The Hesperia Barcelona Presidente is close to a shopping area, and the main sightseeing bus stops just 50 metres from the hotel. The popular Illa shopping centre is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Diagonal Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, and offers a direct link to Plaza Catalunya. Gaudi’s La Pedrera and fashionable Passeig de Gracia can be reached in about 15 minutes on foot.

name: Sunotel Central
description:
Featuring a rooftop swimming pool and hot tub with views of Barcelona, Sunotel Central is set in the centre of Barcelona, just 10 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya.

Modern rooms at Sunotel Central include free high-speed WiFi, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities.

Universitat Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel. The Ramblas, famous for its street performers, can be reached in 10 minutes by foot.

In the morning guests can enjoy a varied, fresh and healthy full buffet breakfast.

The hotel’s 24-hour reception offers a ticket booking service and luggage storage. There are computers in the lobby which guests can use for free. Meeting rooms are also available.

name: Barcelona Apartment Aramunt
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Aramunt Apartments offers modern, stylish studios 10 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station. It features free Wi-Fi, and a terrace with sun loungers and a small swimming pool of 5,5 metres by 1.

Aramunt offers bright, well-equipped studios for 2 to 4 people, They have air conditioning, a kitchenette with a washer dryer and a dishwasher, a dining area, and a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed. The bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

The property is just a few minutes' walk from numerous tourist attractions. On the nearby Passeig de Gràcia you will find world-famous examples of Modernist architecture, such as Casa Batlló and La Pedrera.

The cultural heart of the Catalan capital, around Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, is just a 10-minute stroll away.

As a guest of the Aramunt Apartments you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum. Pay public parking can be found next to the property and buses to Barceloneta's beaches stop outside.

name: Ilunion Les Corts Spa
description:
Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Ilunion Les Corts Spa every room comes with bed linen and towels.

A gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Camp Nou is less than 1 km from Ilunion Les Corts Spa, while Sants Railway Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Plaza España, from where the shuttles leave to the Montjuic field.

name: Aparthotel Allada 3*
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 25m²
description:
Situated in a pedestrianised street in the neighbourhood of Borne, Aparthotel Allada 3* offers a tranquil atmosphere due to the scarcity of street noise and the sound-proofing of the building.

Aparthotel Allada 3* is situated in a picturesque, historical area that has maintained the façades and arches of the 17th century, whilst incorporating the modern architecture of the 21st century. The apartments and studios have been designed to offer the greatest comfort and functionality during your stay. All also benefit from ample natural light throughout the day.

The Borne district is full of winding streets that form a labyrinth, allowing you to find some of the most intriguing areas in the old city. Close to the apartments, you will find the church of Saint Mary, the city gardens, the Picasso museum, the chocolate museum, the Cathedral, the market of Saint Catherine as well as many other sites of interest. In addition, you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

name: Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona
description:
Situated 400 metres from Las Ramblas, Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona offers a rooftop terrace with city and sea views. The rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The hotel has a courtyard, where you can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Each open-plan room has air conditioning.

Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona have a 24-hour reception, where staff can arrange restaurant bookings, tickets for shows or guided tours of Barcelona. Free city maps are also available.

The hotel is located at the bottom of the lively Raval district, just 700 metres from Barcelona Port. Drassanes and Paral•lel Metro Stations are both within 300 metres.

name: Guitart Grand Passage
description_short: Private suite
description:
This modern hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned suites with a separate seating area, private balcony, free WiFi and 2 TVs. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

There are several restaurants within a 5-minute walk from Guitard Grand Passage. Also, the hotel is only 500 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.

There are good transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, located around 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: Feelathome Casa Bertrand
description:
Set in Barcelona, 800 metres from Plaça Catalunya, Feelathome Casa Bertrand offers concierge services and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is close to Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The property is 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia, and within 700 metres of the city centre.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, the units at Feelathome Casa Bertrand have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation every room includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Feelathome Casa Bertrand include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Casa Batllo and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Catalonia Barcelona 505
description:
Catalonia Barcelona 505 offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi area. From El Putxet Train Station, 400 metres away, you can reach the centre in 15 minutes.

The hotel is close to important medical centres, such as the Teknon Clinic, Sant Jordi Clinic, Dexeus and Barraquer. It is also next to the Blue Tram, which takes you to the cable car for Tibidabo.

Air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV, a safe and minibar. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The restaurant C50&5 offers international cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available.

You can hire a car from the 24-hour front desk. On-site parking is offered for an additional charge, and the hotel has easy access to the B20 Motorway.

name: Hotel Nuevo Triunfo
description:
Located beside Barcelona’s Montjuic Hill, Nuevo Triunfo is a 3-minute walk from Parallel Metro Station and 10 minutes from the Rambla. It offers a free Wi-Fi zone and 24-hour reception.

Featuring tiled floors and flat-screen satellite TV, air-conditioned rooms come with a seating area and work desk. The private bathroom is equipped with amenities.

A continental breakfast is available in the Hotel Nuevo Triunfo. There are vending machines for drinks.

Luggage storage is offered and you can hire a car from the tour desk.

Maremagnum Shopping Centre and the Marina are 15 minutes’ walk away. Barceloneta Beach is 10 minutes away by bus.

name: Ilunion Almirante
description:
Located between the Gothic Quarter and the fashionable Born district, this stylish hotel has a fitness centre and free WiFi in all areas.

Barcelona Cathedral is just 200 metres from the Ilunion Almirante, and guests can walk to the famous Las Ramblas in less than 10 minutes. Jaume I Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel.

Rooms feature wooden furniture and an en suite bathroom with marble finishes. They all include a large flat-screen TV with satellite channels, safe and minibar.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

The Ilunion Almirante features a stylish breakfast room where an à-la-carte breakfast is served daily. Room service is available during limited hours.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

name: BYPILLOW Ramblas
description:
BYPILLOW Ramblas is a modern guest house conveniently located in the famous Ramblas in Barcelona, 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and the port.

The Wax Museum and the airport bus stop are next to this guest house. The nearest metro station is Drassanes, located only 100 metres away. There is a wide range of monuments, bars and shops within walking distance.

The air-conditioned rooms at BYPILLOW Ramblas come with a TV and private bathroom with shower.

The multilingual staff will be happy to provide tourist information and free local maps. Free WiFi and luggage storage are also offered.

name: ABAL554 - Azotea exclusiva del centro de la ciudad
description:
Right in the heart of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia, ABAL554 - Azotea exclusiva del centro de la ciudad offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as kitchenware and coffee machine. With city views, this accommodation features a terrace. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, a microwave, a washing machine, a toaster and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from ABAL554 - Azotea exclusiva del centro de la ciudad.

name: Flor Parks
description:
Featuring a roof terrace and free Wi-Fi, Flor Parks is set on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, beside Liceu Metro Station. Located 200 metres from La Boqueria Market, it offers soundproofed rooms.

The Flor Parks' air-conditioned rooms have a balcony, satellite TV and a minibar. Their private bathrooms have hairdryers and some have hydromassage baths.

Set menu and à la carte dishes are served at the Hotel Flor’s restaurant. A continental breakfast is available. There is also a snack bar and café.

The hotel’s central location makes it perfect for exploring the city’s Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral is just 10 minutes’ walk away. The Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are less than 1 km from the Flor Parks.

name: Hotel Serhs Rivoli Rambla
description:
Situated on the famous Ramblas, Hotel Serhs Rivoli Rambla has a beautiful interior courtyard and a terrace from where you can enjoy views over the Gothic Quarter while you sip an espresso.

 Return here for lunch and enjoy views over the urban gardens which date back to the Romantic era.

The Hotel Serhs Rivoli Rambla is a celebration of the Art Deco style which has become a signature of this Catalan city. Enjoy theatrical interiors which combine classic style with avant garde features such as clever lighting and contemporary furniture. Sit in the interior patio of the Rivoli Ramblas where you can enjoy the cool surroundings and murals painted on the walls.

The 128 Rambla Restaurant serves a wide selection of Mediterranean and international cuisine. The varied and appealing buffet breakfast is a great way to help prepare you for the day ahead.

name: Hotel Inglés
description:
Hotel Inglés is located right next to the Ramblas and Boquería market, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Catalunya. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

Air-conditioned rooms at the Inglés are simple and comfortable. They come with a private bathroom and some rooms have a private balcony.

A breakfast is served every morning in a restaurant located next to the hotel.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. You can also hire a car and store your luggage at the front desk.

The Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium, is 10 minutes’ walk from the Hotel Inglés. The characterful streets of the Gothic Quarter are on the doorstep, and you can walk to the trendy Born area in around 5 minutes.

name: Lugaris Rambla Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Lugaris Rambla Apartments is 300 metres from Bogatell Beach, in Barcelona’s Rambla del Poble Nou. Located in a quiet neighbourhood, each modern apartment offers an LCD TV, free Wi-Fi and a Nespresso coffee machine.

Lugaris is next to Poble Nou Park, and a short walk from Llacuna and Poble Nou Metro Stations. It is also a 2-minute walk from a bus stop. Barcelona Cathedral and Town Hall are just 5 Metro stops away. Many public bus services to the historic city centre also pass nearby.

Each air-conditioned apartment has a balcony with city views. The well-equipped kitchens have a ceramic hob, an oven and a washer-dryer. Bed linen and towels are provided, and weekly cleaning is included.

Other facilities include a tour desk, babysitting and shuttle service. Guests can make use of our car or bike rental.

The Lugaris building has a private security service and a 24-hour customer emergency service line. The nearby reception offers a tour desk and car rental. Airport transfers are available on prior request and for an extra charge.

name: Feelathome Poblenou Beach Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
These modern apartments are in the Poblenou area of Barcelona, 500 metres from the beach. Free Wi-Fi is available in rooms and in public areas. The CCIB Convention Centre is within walking distance.

Poblenou Metro is 200 metres away and a 20-minute ride takes you to the city centre. There is easy access to the Gaudí buildings on Passeig de Gracia.

The apartments located in 2 separate buildings, 210 metres apart. All of them have a private kitchen complete with a washing machine, dishwasher, and oven. There is also a living room with a flat-screen TV.  Some apartments have a private terrace or balcony, and a communal terrace is available on the top floor.

Private parking is available at an extra cost. Non-smoking and family apartments are available.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the Poble Nou area in Barcelona. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

name: NH Collection Barcelona Constanza
description:
Offering a rooftop pool and terrace,  NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has modern rooms with satellite TV. It is located next to L’Illa Shopping Centre on Diagonal Avenue, 15 minutes' walk from Sants Train Station.

The elegant, modern rooms at the Constanza feature a Nespresso machine, flat-screen TV, and pillow menu, while the bathroom includes a rain shower and a professional hairdryer. Free WiFi is included.

Guests can use the spa for an extra cost. The gym is available free of charge. Room service is available 24 hours.

The hotel's Antiox healthy buffet breakfast features antioxidant dishes made with ecological produce.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. María Cristina Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, connecting you with the Fira Exhibition Centre in under 10 minutes.

name: ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique
description:
ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique is set in an impressive historic building, next to Barcelona’s Universitat Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and bright, air-conditioned rooms, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla.

Rooms feature wooden floors and have a safe and minibar. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique offers a buffet breakfast each morning. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. Due to its central location, there are many bars and restaurants within a short walk.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique has a 24-hour front desk, and a public parking is available nearby for an additional charge. The Airport Bus stops opposite in Plaza Universitat.

name: Ola Living Born
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 24m²
description:
Ola Living Born offers accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. It is set 1.4 km from Somorrostro Beach and features a lift. The property is close to popular attractions like Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Reial and Picasso Museum.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a terrace. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Ola Living Born.

name: Feelathome Plaza Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Feelathome Plaza Apartments offers apartments with free Wi-Fi and heating. The apartments are 100 metres from Hostafrancs Metro Station and 650 metres from Plaza Espanya and Barcelona Fira Congress Centre.

Featuring stylish décor, all the apartments include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a DVD player. Most of the apartments have a balcony or terrace. Every apartment has access to a communal rooftop terrace with views of the area.

Each apartment has a dining area and a kitchen equipped with a washing machine, oven and coffee machine. The bathrooms come with a shower and bed linen and towels are provided.

Guests will find restaurants and shops within 3 minutes' walk from the property. The apartments are 3 km from Plaza Catalunya Square and Barcelona city centre. Sants Train Station is a 10-minute walk from the property.

name: Catalonia Avinyo
description:
Situated 200 metres from Las Ramblas in central Barcelona, Catalonia Avinyo features a rooftop pool and gym. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are decorated in a modern, minimalist style with large wall photos. They include a minibar, safe and telephone. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. The modern bathrooms have a shower and a hairdryer.

Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Catalonia Avinyo. The Liceu and Jaume I Metro Stations are just 300 metres away and Barcelona Cathedral is 4 minutes' walk away.

The Avinyo’s central location means there are many shops, bars and restaurants close to the hotel. Bicycle and car hire can be arranged at the tour desk.

name: Exe Cristal Palace
description:
The Exe Cristal Palace is very well located next to the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia, the main shopping area and most important places of interest in Barcelona. All rooms at the Exe Cristal Palace have air conditioning, a safe, satellite TV, a minibar, a desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries.

Exe Cristal Palace rooms have a safe and a minibar and feature wooden floors. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

Exe Cristal Palace has a 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and on-site parking is available for an additional charge. The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast, including a healthy corner option.

The buffet breakfast includes a wide variety of dishes and an area with juices and coffees.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Casa Batlló.

name: 1881 Barcelona Gran Rosellon Hotel
description:
Featuring free WiFi, a restaurant and a seasonal outdoor pool, 1881 Barcelona Gran Rosellon Hotel offers accommodation in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Diagonal Metro Station.

The hotel has a sun terrace and a fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Some have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Every room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries.

La Pedrera is 600 metres from Bcn Urban Gran Rosellon, while the trendy Passeig de Gràcia Street is 8 minutes' walk away. Plaça Catalunya is 1.7 km from the property and Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away. Private parking is available on site.

name: Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants offers stylish air-conditioned accommodation, just a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. Free high-speed WiFi is available.

Each bright apartment and studio has a well-equipped kitchenette and flat-screen satellite TV.

All the Pierre & Vacances apartments and studios have functional modern décor and street views. Kitchen facilities include a fridge, microwave and dishwasher. A safe is available at an extra cost.

Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants is situated in the lively Sants neighbourhood, home to a wide range of shops, bars and cafés.

Just 200 metres away, Badal Metro Station connects with Sants Train Station in under 10 minutes. Collblanc metro station with direct trains to Barcelona Airport and Europa Fira is 500 metres away.

name: Catalonia Rigoletto
description:
The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 500 metres from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs.

The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a minibar and safety deposit box.

A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work.

Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 1.5 km from the Rigoletto.

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Camp Nou is 2.9 km away and Boqueria Market is 4 km from the hotel.

At Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira offers a terrace.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2 km from the hotel, while Montjuïc is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 8 km from Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira.

name: Occidental Barcelona 1929
description:
Occidental Barcelona 1929 features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Occidental Barcelona 1929 all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Sants Railway Station is less than 1 km from Occidental Barcelona 1929, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Chic & Basic Velvet
description:
Boasting 1950s décor, this modern hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen satellite TV. Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya is 8 minutes’ walk away.

The rooms at the Chic & Basic Velvet have parquet floors and smart décor. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in the dining room; and guests can enjoy a drink at the honesty bar which has direct access to terrace.

There is a variety of restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk.

Chic & Basic Velvet is just 10 minutes’ walk from the Fira Convention Centre and the airport bus stop. Montjüic, with the Joan Miró Museum and Magic Fountain, is also a 10-minute walk away

name: Ilunion Barcelona
description:
Located 10 minutes away from Bogatell Beach in the 22 district, the modern Ilunion Barcelona features a rooftop swimming pool, sun terrace, and a gym. The CCIB Conference Centre is 2 km away. Free WiFi is available.

Rooms at Ilunion Barcelona feature air conditioning, a desk and a TV. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safe and minibar are provided. Superior rooms also feature a furnished terrace with sea or city views.

This hotel is officially adapted for disabled guests. It has rooms adapted for people with reduced mobility or hearing/visual impairment, available upon request.

Ilunion Barcelona's restaurant serves breakfast and also offers an à la carte menu. The hotel has a bar and provides room service. A menu for guests with specific dietary requirements is also available.

Just a few minutes walk from the hotel is Rambla de Poblenou and Bogatell Beach, which are home to a wide variety of shops, bars and restaurants. The shopping centre is a 4-minute drive away and the Diagonal Mar shopping centre is an 8-minute drive away.

Ilunion Barcelona has pleasant, renovated common areas and free internet access. Private underground parking is available for an extra cost.

Llacuna and Poble Nou Metro Station is located less than 300 metres from the hotel. The bus stop of the line number 6 is located 50 metres from the hotel.

Gran Via is 15 minutes away by bus. There is a tourist bus stop near the hotel. Barcelona-El Prat airport is located 20 km away, with quick access to the Ronda Litoral.

name: Dalia Ramblas
description:
Set 50 metres from the Ramblas, in the Raval district, Dalia Ramblas features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Well served by public transport, it offers 24-hour reception and free luggage storage.

Featuring a modern and functional décor, rooms come with a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and a desk. All have a private bathroom with bath or shower. Free toiletries and hairdryer are provided.

Dalia Ramblas is set in the lively city centre. There are plenty of bars and restaurants in the surrounding area.

Next to the Gothic Quarter, Dalia Ramblas is 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and from Barcelona Cathedral. You can also reach the bustling Plaza Reial Square in a 5-minute walk.

Barcelona Airport is 12 km away from the hotel. Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 800 metres away.

name: Hostal Balkonis
description:
Located in central Barcelona, Hostal Balkonis guest house offers a terrace, free Wi-Fi throughout. Sant Antoni Metro Station is just 80 metres away.

This property offers functional and modern rooms with a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries each. They all feature heating, air conditioning, flat-screen TV and a radio. Some have a balcony with garden and city views.

You can hire bicycles on site, allowing you to explore more of the city.

You will find bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets and the closest supermarket is just 30 metres away.

A 12-minute walk will take you to Barcelona’s La Rambla and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km away. Plaza de España, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport is 20 minutes’ walk from Hostal Balkonis.

name: Alba Hotel
description:
This hotel is set in the heart of the cosmopolitan city of Barcelona, just a short distance from Las Ramblas and within walking distance of attractions such as the Liceu opera house and Plaça Catalunya.

The Hotel Alba is located in Barcelona’s old town, and its beautiful façade is listed for its artistic interest. Inside, relax in a spacious en suite bedroom with balcony and air conditioning.

Stroll down the colourful Ramblas to the seafront, or enjoy cava and tapas in the famous Boqueria food market. Just a short walk away, the narrow streets of the Gothic Quarter are full of shops, bars and restaurants.

The Alba boasts convenient public transport links, with Liceu metro station only 300 metres away. From here you can travel quickly and conveniently to attractions including the Fira de Barcelona and Gaudi’s incredible Parc Güell.

name: Habitat Apartments Hot Jazz
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 62m²
description:
Featuring a terrace and views of quiet street, Habitat Apartments Hot Jazz is a sustainable aparthotel located in Barcelona, 3 km from La Pedrera. It is set 3.5 km from Casa Batllo and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 1.1 km away.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a microwave, a toaster, and a fridge. At the aparthotel, all units have bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the aparthotel.

Park Güell is 3.9 km from Habitat Apartments Hot Jazz, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Hostal Sol y K
description:
Hostal Sol y K is set in Barcelona, 200 metres from Plaza Reial and 400 metres from La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona. Hostal Sol y K features free WiFi .

Rooms come with a private or shared bathroom.

You will find a tour desk at the property.

Picasso Museum is 500 metres from Hostal Sol y K, while Portal de l'Angel is 700 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

name: Lugaris Beach Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 52m²
description:
Lugaris Beach Apartments is situated less than 200 metres from Bogatell Beach in the quiet neighbourhood of Poble Nou.

The Lugaris Beach Apartments apartments feature contemporary design, floor-to-ceiling windows and free high-speed internet access. The private kitchen is equipped with an oven, Nespresso machine, and fridge. Each apartment also has a living room, flat-screen TV with international channels and washer-dryer. A welcome pack with basics such as coffee, tea, milk, sugar, salt and oil is included.

Facilities at the Lugaris Beach Apartments include a tour desk, babysitting and shuttle service, which is available upon request and for an additional cost. Bed linen and towels are provided and guests can make use of car and bike rental.

Parking is available at an extra charge and beach towels can also be rented.

The apartments are a 5-minute walk from Poblenou Metro Station and 2 minutes’ walk from Poblenou Park. The area offers plenty of bars, restaurants, and a shopping centre. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in central Barcelona can be reached in around 20 minutes by metro.

name: Amra Barcelona Caspe
description:
Centrally located in Barcelona, Hostal Amra is a modern guest house only 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It offers free WiFi throughout.

The Amra features a Minimalist design and has a tour desk with ticket service. There is a terrace and coffee is available for guests. Bike and car rental  and luggage storage are offered.

All rooms have air conditioning and come with high-end mattresses, a TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony with views of the garden and the city.

Passeig de Grácia is 5 minutes’ walk away and plenty of places of cultural interest like Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within a short walk away. Parking is possible nearby for a surcharge.

name: Catalonia Born
description:
Set in a 19th-century building in Barcelona’s El Born district, Catalonia Born offers a rooftop pool, an attractive central courtyard and free Wi-Fi. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The classic rooms at Catalonia Born Hotel come with an elegant marble bathroom. They also include a satellite TV and centrally controlled heating or air conditioning, depending on the season.

A buffet breakfast is served, and the snack bar is open for lunch and dinner. There is also a bar in the lobby.

Located minutes from França Train Station, the hotel is well-connected to the rest of the city and its surroundings. Car rental is also available from the tour desk.

name: Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool offers accommodation in Barcelona. Plaça Catalunya is located just 10 minutes walking from the property.

All units are air-conditioned and have a seating area. There is also a dining area and a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher and oven. A microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool also includes an outdoor pool, and free WiFi is available.

Portal de l'Angel is 1.2 km from Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 12 km from Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool.

name: B&B Boutique Ca La Maria
description:
Set next to Rambla Catalunya Street, Ca La Maria Barcelona is centrally located in Barcelona. The bed & breakfast offers rooms in a stylish apartment with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning.

Featuring high ceilings and modern décor, each room has a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a shower and some of them also include a bathtub.

Guests have access to a large wooden sun terrace, including a garden and a covered area with a dining table. There is also a spacious shared lounge. A breakfast buffet is available, as well as a bar where guests can get drinks and snacks.

Gaudi’s Pedrera Building is only 5 minutes’ walk from the bed & breakfast. There is a large variety of bars and restaurants in the area. Guests can find Diagonal Metro Station 300 metres from the property and Plaça Catalunya is 2 metro stops away.

name: Twentytu Hostel Barcelona
description:
This modern, eco-friendly hostel offers a terrace with city views and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. It is set 10 minutes’ walk from Nova Icaría Beach and the Olympic Port.

Rooms at Twentytu Hostel Barcelona are shared or private with a maximum of 4 beds and an en-suite bathroom. All include individual lockers and sheets. Towels can be rented at reception.

There is a communal kitchen, a chill-out lounge and dining areas. Various bars and shops are within 5 minutes’ walk and Razzmatazz nightclub is 200 metres away.

The property organises events, guided tours and activities and bike rental is available. Ciutadella Park is 10 minutes’ walk away and L’Auditori Theatre and Catalan National Theatre are 5 minutes’ walk away.

Twentytu Hostel Barcelona is 5 minutes’ walk from Marina Metro Station, 3 stops from Plaza Catalunya. Nord Bus Station is 10 minutes’ walk away.

For reservations of more than three nights or more than 7 people, special charges will apply, for this the hotel will contact you personally

name: Ciudad Condal Hostal - Paseo de Gracia
description:
Ciudad Condal Hostal - Paseo de Gracia provides accommodation located in the neighbourhood of the city of Barcelona. The rooms are distributed on the main floor of an architectural house, catalogued by City Heritage Casa Àngel Batlló on Calle Mallorca 255, between the famous Passeig de Gràcia and the vibrant Rambla de Catalunya.

All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, heating, private bathroom, window, flat screen TV, desk, safe, trunk, hair dryer, basic amenities and free Wi-Fi. Due to the architectural characteristics of the building, all the rooms are different, each one of them designed in a clean and functional way, adapting to each space.

The property offers single, double, superior double, triple, and suite/family rooms for up to 4 pax, some of them with a view of the street with a balcony or to the famous interior gardens of the architectural plan of the Ensanche district of Barcelona Plà Cerdà and others are interior rooms.

There is a range of cafés and restaurants on Passeig de Gràcia and in the nearby area of Gràcia.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within 200 metres of the property. Diagonal Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away and is just 2 stops from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas.

name: Mar Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 3 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 100m²
description:
Mar Apartments is a beachfront apartment in Barcelona, offering guests a sustainable accommodation with scenic sea views. The air-conditioned accommodation is 600 metres from Bogatell Beach. The apartment has family rooms.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a terrace. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Nova Icaria Beach, Mar Bella Beach and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Mar Apartments.

name: Pestana Arena Barcelona
description:
Pestana Arena Barcelona is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya and Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a gym, sauna and modern, air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet access.

Some rooms offers free use of the Maritimo Meeting Room, up to 12 people, for private meetings.

Pestana Arena Barcelona is just 3 minutes’ walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and you can walk to Sants Station in 8 minutes. You can get to the Rambla in 5 minutes from Plaza Espanya Metro.

Rooms feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Each one has work desk, a pillow menu and an LCD TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food and has a terrace. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs.

name: Feelathome Center Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Feelathome Center Apartments offers a selection of quality apartments located in different areas of central Barcelona. Please check the room information to see the exact address of each apartment as well as pictures and descriptions

All  partments are located within 20 minutes’ walk of Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square. Most are in the stylish Eixample district.

Each apartment has a TV in the living room, and many also have a sofa bed. They have modern kitchens and bathrooms and most have parquet floors.

Every apartment is located close to a Metro Station which gives you access to the main tourist sights in under 15 minutes.

name: Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 44m²
description:
Featuring air conditioning, Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz is set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Sagrada Familia. Park Güell is 2.1 km away.

The accommodation is fitted with a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchenette, fitted with an oven and microwave. A toaster and refrigerator are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer in each unit. Towels are featured.

La Pedrera is 2.2 km from Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Melia Barcelona Sky 4* Sup
description:
One of Barcelona’s tallest buildings, this design hotel offers spectacular views over the city and sea. Melia Barcelona Sky features an outdoor swimming pool. Treatments are available at the Serena SPA Wellness and free access is offered to the gym.

Each spacious room at Melia Barcelona Sky includes a 32-inch plasma-screen TV and offers city views. The stylish bathrooms come with a rain shower.

You can enjoy a cocktail on the 24th floor, at the Skyline 24 Panoramic Terrace, which offers views over the city.

El Merkado Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine, and you can enjoy a cocktail on its terrace. WiFi is free in all areas.

Located in the lively area of Poblenou, Melia Barcelona Sky is just 200 metres from Poble Nou Metro Station. The Forum and the International Convention Centre are within a 15-minute walk. The Mar Bella beach is only 10 minutes' walk of the hotel.

name: El Avenida Palace
description:
El Avenida Palace Hotel is set on Barcelona’s Gran Via, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. Its grand interior features an impressive staircase and marble columns.

Many famous guests have stayed at the Hotel Avenida Palace, including the Beatles in 1965.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and carpeted or parquet floors. Rooms are soundproofed and have a minibar, work desk and a safe.

The hotel's panoramic rooftop terrace offers views over the city, a sun deck and a swimming pool. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour front desk and both free WiFi and room service are available.

name: Barcelona Apartment Milà
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Barcelona Apartment Milà is centrally located, 7 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Joanic Metro Station. Each apartment is air conditioned and features free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV.

Apartments have one or two bedrooms and some have a sofa bed in the living room. All have a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The well-equipped kitchen includes a dishwasher and washing machine.

The Sagrada Familia is a 20-minute walk from the apartments. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes by Metro.

name: Catalonia Portal de l'Angel
description:
Housed in a traditional 19th-century building, this hotel is located between Plaza de Catalunya and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool surrounded by painted murals.

The Catalonia Portal de l'Angel maintains much of its original design. It features comfortable rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and coffee and tea facilities. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 11:00 at Catalonia Portal de l'Angel.

The famous Las Ramblas is less than 200 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral is 100 metres from the hotel. The Portal de l'Angel is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Metro and Railway Station.

name: Hostal Girona
description:
Hostal Girona is located in the historic heart of Barcelona, a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Plaça Catalunya. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Hostal Girona is a small and modern guest house with a lift. All rooms are air conditioned and have a TV. Some rooms are en suite and others have a shared bathroom.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within walking distance. Private parking is possible nearby, at a daily cost.

The guest house occupies a historic, 19th-century building. The building was part of the Quadrat d’Or. This block was designed by the father of the Eixample neighbourhood, Ildefons Cerdà.

name: BcnStop Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 27m²
description:
Less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, BcnStop Sagrada Familia is a sustainable property set in Barcelona and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. There is a private entrance at the aparthotel for the convenience of those who stay. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available close by. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the aparthotel.

La Pedrera is 2.8 km from BcnStop Sagrada Familia, while Casa Batllo is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Moderno
description:
Hotel Moderno has a central location, on a side street just 20 metres from Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi access throughout.

All rooms at the Moderno are heated, air conditioned and soundproofed. There is also cable TV, a fridge and a private bathroom with toiletries.

The hotel is just a short walk from the Boquería Market on La Rambla. Plaza de Catalunya and the city’s cathedral are just a few minutes’ walk away.

The hotel’s City Tour offer is ideal for exploring the city. There is also a ticket service. The 3 computers in the lobby can be used for free.

The Moderno has a 24-hour front desk and offers express check-in and check-out.

name: Catalunya
description:
Hotel Catalunya offers free Wi-Fi and is centrally located in Barcelona’s Gothic centre, just off La Rambla, 50 metres from Plaça Catalunya. It offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV.

All rooms at the Catalunya come with a fridge and a safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. Breakfast is served in a café 25 metres from the hotel.

Barcelona Cathedral is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Hotel. The famous Gaudi buildings of Passeig de Gracia are only 500 metres away.

The hotel is near Plaça Catalunya Train and Metro Station. The airport and sightseeing buses also stop in this central square.

Hotel Catalunya’s tour desk can provide recommendations and book tickets. Car hire is available, and the 24-hour reception offers express check-out and luggage storage.

name: Silken Ramblas
description:
This stylish hotel has an excellent central location, 50 metres from Barcelona’s Las Ramblas and just 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya. It offers a rooftop pool, sauna and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at the Silken Ramblas are stylish, and are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. There is central heating and air conditioning according to the season. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

The Silken has a restaurant and bar. Room service is available. There is a also a pleasant terrace.

The Silken has a tour desk and the sightseeing bus stops nearby in Plaza Catalunya.

name: The Conica Deluxe Bed&Breakfast
description:
Set in the Eixample district in Barcelona, 500 metres from La Pedrera, The Conica Deluxe Bed&Breakfast features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property.

Flat-screen satellite TV, as well as an iPod docking station are offered. Some rooms have a seating area where you can relax, while others include views of the garden or city. All rooms come with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

You will find concierge service at the property.

Plaça Catalunya is 1.4 km from The Conica Deluxe Bed&Breakfast, while Sagrada Familia is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Barcelona Apartment Gran de Gràcia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 44m²
description:
Situated in the charming Gràcia district, these elegant design apartments offer a balcony and a stylish kitchen with a ceramic hob, dishwasher and washing machine. Fontana Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned Gran de Gracia apartments feature sleek contemporary décor. Each one has a lounge with a flat-screen TV and 2 sofa beds. The modern bathrooms include a shower.

A variety of supermarkets, cafés and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Gran de Gracia apartments. The surrounding streets are full of quirky boutiques and lively bars.

Gaudí’s Casa Vicenç is just 150 metres from the apartments, while Parc Güell is a 20-minute walk away. You can walk to Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in around 15 minutes.

name: Ocean Drive Barcelona
description:
Ocean Drive Barcelona features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a selection of international cuisine in the in-house restaurant.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Ocean Drive Barcelona also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation.

Guests will have free access to Urquinaona Holmes Place Gym, 800 metres from the hotel. Ocean Drive Barcelona offers a terrace.

Casa Batllo is 300 metres from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Fisa Rentals Gran Via Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Fisa Rentals Gran Via Apartments are stylish apartments set 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. They have free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV.

Each spacious Fisa Rentals apartment offers contemporary décor and chic wooden floors. All apartments are air conditioned, but there is one bedroom that doesn't have air conditioning. All the apartments have a spacious seating area with satellite TV. The well-equipped kitchens also have a washing machine.

The apartments have easy access to the centre of Barcelona and are within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of shops, bars and restaurants.

Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard is 300 metres away and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera can be reached in 15 minutes, by foot. Passeig de Gràcia and Urquinaona Metro Stations are around 200 metres away.

name: Ola Living Calabria
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Conveniently located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Ola Living Calabria is situated 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.4 km from Boqueria Market. It is set less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and offers a lift. Tivoli Theatre is 2.9 km away and Palau Sant Jordi is 3.2 km from the apartment.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a toaster. The units have a coffee machine, a TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms also offer a terrace. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Cathedral of Barcelona and Montjuïc. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Ola Living Calabria.

name: Aspasios Rambla Catalunya Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
These chic apartments are set on Barcelona’s stylish Rambla de Catalunya, 150 metres from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Apartments at Aspasios Rambla Catalunya Suites feature contemporary decor, a sofa bed, and plasma TV while kitchens have a dishwasher, washing machine, tumble drier and Nespresso coffee maker.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk and Plaza Catalunya is 400 metres away.

Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter are 10 minutes’ walk away and Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batllo are within 5 minutes’ walk.

The Aspasios Rambla Catalunya apartments are 3 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro and Train Station, with direct trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the Eixample area. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

name: Catalonia Diagonal Centro
description:
Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 300 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodation next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app

Only 300 metres away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area.

Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble en suite bathroom. Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection.

A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

name: Ola Living Vidreria
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 33m²
description:
These apartments can be found in Barcelona's Born area, close to the Picasso Museum. They have free Wi-Fi.

The apartments have heating and air conditioning.

Bedrooms have an en-suite bathroom with a shower. The kitchen has a fridge, microwave and hob. There's a terrace.

Bicycle rental is available.

Staff at reception can organise your trip to Barcelona. Barceloneta with its seafront bars and restaurants is just a 10-minute away from the property. The Ramblas is also nearby.

name: Hotel Cortes Rambla
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, Hotel Cortes Rambla features views of the city. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a terrace. At Hotel Cortes Rambla rooms include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plaça Catalunya, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Hotel Cortes Rambla.

name: ME Barcelona
description:
Conveniently located in the centre of Barcelona, ME Barcelona offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation features nightclub and a tour desk.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. ME Barcelona provides some units with city views, and each room comes with a coffee machine. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near ME Barcelona include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Habitat Apartments Barcelona Balconies
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 89m²
description:
Habitat Apartments Barcelona Balconies is 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s La Pedrera and from fashionable Passeig de Gracia. Diagonal Metro Station is 450 metres away and free WiFi is provided.

Housed in a modernist traditional Modernist building, the apartment comes with modern furnishing and parquet flooring. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, a dishwasher and kitchenware; while the bright living room comes with sofas and a flat-screen TV, and opens onto a balcony with city views.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the apartment.

A 10-minute train ride will take you to central Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas; Provença Train station is just 3 minutes’ walk away.

name: Hotel Gran Derby Suites, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
description_short: Private suite
description:
This lovely red-brick building is perfectly situated in a quiet area of Barcelona, and boasts an outdoor swimming pool and a fantastic collection of lithographs by Picasso, Dalí, Tàpies and others.

Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Gran Derby Suites features flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer.

These two separate spaces allow guests to comfortably host visitors, hold meetings or work in their sophisticated rooms.

Sit back and relax around the outdoor swimming pool, where you will enjoy views of the pretty gardens.

The tour desk/ticket service and free wired internet make it easy to plan your days in Barcelona.

Take a short metro journey into the city centre, or enjoy the tourist bus, which stops right next to the Gran Derby.

You can also stroll along to the fashionable Avinguda Diagonal. Here you will find the huge L'Illa shopping centre, and a succession of stylish boutiques.

Hotel Gran Derby shares with Hotel Derby the Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and the cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.

name: Suites Avenue
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 54m²
description:
Set in a striking, contemporary building on Passeig de Gràcia and facing Gaudí’s La Pedrera, Suites Avenue offers stylish accommodation. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and sauna.

Each of the Avenue’s apartments has simple, chic décor with parquet floors and leather sofas. All apartments have a large kitchen with an oven, fridge and dishwasher. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The property has a concierge service, which guests can use to arrange excursions, beauty treatments and babysitting.

The apartments are a 5-minute walk from a selection of upmarket shops and close to a range of cafés and restaurants.

Casa Batlló is 5 minutes’ walk from the apartments, while Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over 1 km away. Diagonal Metro Station is a 2-minute walk from the Suites.

name: Hotel SOFIA Barcelona, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
description:
Hotel Sofia Barcelona is set on Barcelona's Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. It features free WiFi throughout, on-site restaurants and stunning city views. Guests have free access to a bright, modern 24-hour gym with a variety of equipment.

Designer rooms at Sofia offer home automation technology, a 49-inch Smart TV, a safe, and air conditioning. Their private bathroom includes Natura Bissé amenities, bathrobes and slippers.

The hotel offers several gastronomic spaces, including SOFIA Be So restaurant serving traditional dishes, and Impar Restaurant, which serves fresh Mediterranean dishes prepared with international culinary techniques. It also features a spacious outdoor terrace.

Guests will also find a sophisticated book cafe, Philosofia, which serves confectionery and fresh pastries, to eat in or take away.

Sofia Oasis Wellness & Spa houses more than 1000 m² space for well-being, including water circuits, saunas and steam baths. You can relax with one of the range of treatments available onsite and coordinated by expert therapists.

Sofia Barcelona, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt is 400 metres from Maria Cristina Metro Station and the central Plaza España Square is 3 metro stops away. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 15 minutes away on foot

We only accept dogs up to 18 kg in weight, with a maximum of one per room. We do not accept any other pets

For pets.
Dogs classified as dangerous breeds are not allowed.
Pets must comply with current health regulations.
They must be supervised by an adult at all times and steady on a leash when going through public areas.
€100 will be charged for deep cleaning of the room at the time of departure. (Service dogs are exempt from said fee)
€25 per pet per day will be charged in addition to the room rate.

name: Sensation Sagrada Familia
description:
Within 2 minutes’ walk of Gaudí’s Sagrada Família, these bright modern apartments feature a shared rooftop sun terrace and a small outdoor swimming pool with views of the city’s famous Basilica.

Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments feature a balcony and a living room with parquet floors and floor-to-ceiling windows. The modern kitchen is equipped with a hob, oven, coffee maker and dishwasher.

All Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments have free Wi-Fi. There is also a gym and sauna in the same building which can be used free of charge.

There are several cafés, bars and restaurants on the tree-lined Avinguda Gaudí Avenue, just 250 metres away. There are plenty of shops and supermarkets within walking distance, including Mercat Sagrada Família food market, 5 minutes’ walk away.

Sagrada Família metro station, with lines 2 and 5, is just 1 minute walk from the apartments. Line 2 will take visitors to the city centre in 15 minutes. The number 92 bus goes to Gaudí’s Parc Güell, and Barcelona's El Prat Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia is located in central Barcelona, 50 metres from the well-know Passeig de Gràcia Avenue. Casa Batlló and La Pedrera Modernist buildings are 5 minutes’ walk away.

The stylish and bright apartments at Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia can have 1 to 3 bedrooms, and duplex apartments with terrace are also available.

Featuring modern décor, all air-conditioned apartments are equipped with an open-plan kitchen with ceramic hob, microwave, dishwasher and kitchenware. There is also a living room with a 32-inch flat-screen TV and sofa bed.

Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia is well communicated to the city’s main tourist places, having the metro station 300 metres away.  Passeig de Gràcia is known for being the most important shopping street in Barcelona. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located just 10 minutes' walk away.

name: Hotel Vilamarí
description:
Hotel Vilamarí is set 250 metres from Plaza de Espanya Metro Station and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. This hotel features a terrace and a small gym with Turkish Bath.

The Vilamarí’s rooms have simple, elegant décor and dark wood furniture. Each room includes flat-screen satellite TV. The stylish bathrooms come with amenities and a hairdryer. The hotel features centrally controlled air conditioned or heating depending on the season.

Barcelona’s MNAC Art Museum and the Magic Fountains are within a 10-minute walk of the hotel. Las Arenas Shopping Centre is just 200 metres away. Barcelona Port is a 15-minute metro ride away and Barcelona Beach can be reached in 35 minutes.

name: The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky
description:
The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky is located in Barcelona’s Poblenou district. This stylish hotel offers a range of luxury services, including 1 on-site restaurant and free spa access.

The Serena SPA Wellness includes a sauna, Turkish baths, bithermal shower and a heated pool with whirlpool. Guests also have access to a discount on massages.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms at The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky feature free WiFi, a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a coffee maker and a minibar. Each one has a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower, bathrobe and slippers.

There is a restaurant serving Mediterranean dishes, and guests have the option of a buffet breakfast with views over Barcelona. The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky has a poolside bar.

On the 24th floor of the hotel The Level at Meliá Barcelona Sky you can enjoy a cocktail or premium drinks at the Skyline 24 which offers views over the city.

The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky offers a personalised reception with flexible check-out times, as well as helping to arrange tickets for trips, shows and car hire.

Poblenou Metro Station is 450 metres from the hotel, and you can walk to the seafront in around 15 minutes. Torre Agbar Tower is 1 km away.

name: Som Nit Born
description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi and air conditioning, Som Nit Born is located in the Born district of Barcelona. Just 10 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach, the guest house is also 500 metres away from the Picasso Museum.

The soundproofed rooms at Som Nit Born come with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom including a shower. There is a free luggage storage service and a safety deposit box is also available.

A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found in a 1-minute walk through the Born district.

This 19th-century Neoclassical building was chosen to feature in the first ever photograph taken in Spain. Picasso also lived here.

La Rambla Street, Port Vell Harbor and Barrio Gotico District can be reached within 10 minutes’ walk as Som Nit is located in the heart of Barcelona. You can catch the Sightseeing Bus 200 metres from the guest house and Barceloneta Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away.

name: DestinationBCN Universitat Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
These apartments are located 5 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya. DestinationBCN Apartment Suites in Barcelona offers air-conditioned apartments featuring designer furniture and fully-equipped kitchens.

Each apartment has its own individual identity and striking original feature in combination with a stylish décor. Some have bay windows and private furnished terraces. All of the apartments feature free Wi-Fi and Swiss-made mattress.

Their kitchens include an oven and dishwasher, and are stocked with herbs, spices and coffee. In the lounge there are sofas, flat-screen satellite TV  Some of the bathrooms feature rain showers or bath tubs.

Their location in the centre of Barcelona makes reaching all corners of the city very easy. The nearby Gothic and Raval districts are full of shops, restaurants and bars of all types.

name: Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa- Adults Only
description:
The area around the Hotel Axel Barcelona is known as the Gay-xample because of its lively gay scene. The staff has knowledge of the local gay scene, and the hotel is hetero-friendly too.

Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, this design hotel is close to Passeig de Gràcia's exclusive boutiques. The Axel Hotel’s 500m² Spa Centre includes a hydromassage pool and saunas, and the modern rooms have flat-screen satellite TVs.

The Axel’s Sky Bar features a large swimming pool, a terrace with a hot tub and a cocktail bar. Here you will find parties, art exhibitions and shows.

The Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa offers easy access to the Ramblas, the Picasso Museum and Gothic Quarter. The hotel occupies an attractive 19th-century building.

name: Catalonia Barcelona Plaza
description:
Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi.

The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport.

All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer.
