Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail.

Do you already know the  Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner.

The Filigrana restaurant specialises in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business centre with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

name: Barcelona City North Hostal
description:
The Barcelona City North Hostal offers value-for-money accommodation and free Wi-Fi. It is in the quiet Sarrià-Sant Gervasi area of Barcelona, with good access by car to the airport.

The rooms at the Barcelona City North are clean, heated and air conditioned. All come with a private bathroom, a TV and a kettle.

Guests at Barcelona City North Hostal have access to a common area with a microwave and fridge.

The hostel is within walking distance of the popular Gràcia neighbourhood and the Modernist buildings of the Eixample.

Nearby Lesseps Metro Station offers easy access to Vallcarca and the Parc Güell. Plaça Catalunya is only 3 stops away.

name: Hotel El Palace Barcelona
description_short: Private suite
description:
Hotel El Palace Barcelona is located in Eixample District, close to the Ramblas, the main shopping area and Barcelona’s main tourist attractions. It offers a Mayan-style luxury spa. A limousine service with a chauffeur is available on request.

Opened in 1919, this hotel features a neo-classical façade and stylish air-conditioned rooms with classic decor. Each room is spacious and comes with satellite TV, desk, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers.

There are 2 restaurants: L'Éclair, located at the hall, and the Winter Garden Restaurant, set at the Roof Terrace; guests can also enjoy a cocktail at the Bluesman Cocktail Bar.

Hotel El Palace Barcelona has a Mayan-style spa with a Temazcal Sauna. Other facilities at this hotel include both fitness and business center and an outdoor pool.

Third person sharing in room is available for Superior room, Junior Suite and Superior Suite.

Staff at Hotel El Palace Barcelona can provide information about the area. Passeig de Gràcia Metro and Railway Station as well as Urquinaona Metro station are less than 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are approximately 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: Catalonia Square 4* Sup
description:
Featuring an outdoor pool and a fitness centre, Catalonia Square is located in Barcelona’s historic centre. The 4-star hotel is only 100 metres from Plaça Catalunya and offers free Wi-Fi

Each air-conditioned room has wooden floors and modern décor and comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, minibar and a battery charger for iPhone/iPad. Featuring a hairdryer, private bathrooms also include free toiletries and towels. Private pool and terrace are available in some rooms. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Guests can enjoy drinks, snacks and traditional tapas at Catalonia Square Bar. The breakfast is served until 12:00. Room service is also available.

La Rambla and the Gothic District are only 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Within 300 metres, guests can find the metro stations of Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya and Urquinaona, offering connection to most parts of Barcelona.

name: La França Travellers Adults Only
description:
Offering free private parking and free WiFi, La França Travellers is located next to Montjiuic, 10-minute walk from Plaza de España and Fira de Barcelona. 24-hour reception is available.

This adults-only guesthouse boasts modern décor and air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV. All have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All suites have a spa bath and some have a round bed.

Bars, restaurants and several dining options can be found in the surrounding streets.

Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 500 metres away.

name: Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B
description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B is a recently renovated accommodation, which offers allergy-free rooms. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation features luggage storage space, a housekeeping service and organising tours for guests.

All units feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. Units are equipped with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities and champagne are available every morning at the bed and breakfast. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like walking tours. The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B.

name: Suites Center Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 58m²
description:
These stylish apartments are on Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia, in the heart of the Eixample. Each comes with free Wi-Fi, plasma-screen satellite TVs and a modern kitchen.

Suites Center Barcelona offers apartments with DVD and CD player, washing machine and a kettle. They feature full heating and air conditioning, soundproofing and a bathroom with shower.

Private parking is available at Suites Center Barcelona. There is also 24-hour reception.

The Suites are only 20 metres from the Modernist Casa Fuster, a short walk from the popular Gràcia neighbourhood. Diagonal Metro Station is 200 metres away and offers direct access to Plaça Catalunya and the Rambla.

name: Hotel Constanza
description:
Located 7 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, Hotel Constanza has a fantastic rooftop terrace (open from May to October) with views over Barcelona. It offers a 24-hour reception and rooms with smart décor and satellite TV.

Staff at the Constanza Hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. You can also hire a bicycle or car from reception.

The Constanza is 7 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana, a spectacular Modernist auditorium. Casa Batllo & la Pedrera are at 10-12 minutes walking distance form the Hotel. Urquinaona Metro Station & Plaza Catalunya Metro station are under 5 minutes’ walk away, connecting you with the rest of the city.

name: Habitat Apartments ADN
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 120 metres from Hostafrancs Metro Station, Habitat Apartments ADN offers air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

The apartments feature modern décor and include a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. Each also has a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher, washing machine, and hob.

The apartments have 1 or 2 bedrooms, as well as a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Toiletries, towels, and bed linen are provided.

Arenas Shopping Centre is 600 metres from the property and it includes a big supermarket and a number of rooftop restaurants with panoramic views of the city. Sants Train Station, where you can catch a train to the airport, is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Casa Fuster G.L Monumento
description:
This iconic, Modernist building is located at the head of Barcelona’s chic Passeig de Gracia Avenue. It has a sauna and gym, and a roof terrace with a pool and excellent views.

The luxurious Casa Fuster is a monument in itself, built in 1908 by the Modernist architect, Lluis Domènech i Montaner, and has the status of Speciality Monument. His work, including the hotel, is a designated UNESCO World Heritage Site.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms at Casa Fuster G.L Monumento feature satellite TV and a minibar. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms have a hydro-massage bath.

The Casa Fuster Hotel has a stylish restaurant, which serves Mediterranean cuisine. Room service is available, and there is a jazz bar and rooftop chill-out bar.

There is a concierge service and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

name: Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup
description:
Set just off Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, 3 minutes’ walk from central Plaza Catalunya, Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup  features a seasonal outdoor pool with a south-facing terrace, a poolside snack bar and a chill-out area.

Housed in a modernist building, all bright and spacious rooms come with a flat-screen satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast App, free WiFi and tea and coffee facilities. Some have a private terrace with a private pool. Room service is available.

The spa at Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup features a relaxation area. It includes a sauna, a steam bath and a hot tub. Massage and beauty treatments are also available.

The hotel’s restaurant, Pelai Restaurant, offers Catalan market cuisine. Dishes cooked on a coal stove are available at the Pelai terrace, a rooftop terrace with a chill-out area with panoramic city views. A buffet breakfast is offered every morning and, on weekends, it is available until 11:00.

In the summer months, the terrace is open until 00:00 and has a summer menu, as well as cocktails and milkshakes.

name: Catalonia Catedral
description:
The Catalonia Catedral is set in a traditional Modernist building, just 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers free use of Smartphones, Wi-Fi access, a rooftop seasonal pool and a Japanese-style terrace and garden.

The Catedral has stylish rooms, which have contemporary décor. Each has a flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app, air conditioning, a minibar, a Nespresso machine. A smartphone is available for guests during their stay free of charge.

The hotel’s Ascent Restaurant by Eboca serves Mediterrean cuisine and offers views of the nearby Palacio Pignatelli Art Gallery. There is also a bar in the hotel lobby where guests can use the computers with internet access and printers for free.

The Catalonia Catedral is around 10 minutes’ walk from landmarks such as Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya Square. Barcelona’s Old Port and Marina are less than one kilometre away. Jaume I Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away.

name: Sant Jordi Hostels Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 80m²
description:
Registration number AJ000517

Sant Jordi Hostels Sagrada Familia is located just moments from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia Church. It offers dorm rooms, private rooms and apartment-style accommodation. Free WiFi access in available most areas.

Featuring skateboard-themed décor and an indoor mini-ramp, the hostel offers a shared guest kitchen and lounge, as well as a stylish lobby with computer facilities.

All dormitory rooms and triple rooms are located in the hostel area, and have heating, air-conditioning and individual lockers and shelves with a reading light and plug.

All private double and single rooms are located upstairs from the hostel in the apartment-style area, and include air conditioner. Guests in this area have use of a shared kitchen and living room.

Sant Jordi Hostel is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Pau Metro Station, giving easy access to all parts of the city.

When booking more than 10 beds, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

We are currently experiencing some issues processing payments with cards issued outside of the EEA. In this eventuality, SJH may require additional information about the payment method in order to guarantee the security of transactions and to be able to confirm your reservation.

name: ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento
description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Park Güell, ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a garden.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento every room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a hammam.

La Pedrera is 3.3 km from ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento, while Casa Batllo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Habitat Apartments Bailén
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Habitat Apartments Bailén is a modern apartment located in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Arc de Triomf and 280 metres from Tetuan Square. Free WiFi access is available.

The stylish, bright apartment features a furnished balcony and a living room with sofa bed, flat-screen TV and DVD player. The fully equipped kitchenette includes a dishwasher, while the bathroom has a hairdryer and a shower.

Bed linen and towels are included. There is a double bedroom and a twin bedroom.

Habitat Apartments Bailén is situated in a private building with lift. Transportation to El Prat Airport, located 18 km away, can be provided for an extra cost.

City sights like Barcelona Zoo or Ciutadella Park are within a 15-minute walk away.

name: Fisa Rentals Ramblas Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 38m²
description:
Fisa Rentals Ramblas Apartments is located in central Barcelona, just 250 metres from Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas. It offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Fisa Rentals apartments feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one comes with a DVD player, and the kitchen includes a hob, microwave, washing machine and dishwasher.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are about 15 minutes’ walk from the apartments. La Boquería Market and the spectacular Palau de la Música Catalana are within a 10-minute walk. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya.

name: Barceloneta Suites Apartments Market
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 32m²
description:
Set in Barcelona within 600 metres of Barceloneta Beach and 600 metres of Somorrostro Beach, Barceloneta Suites Apartments Market offers accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. The property features quiet street views and is 700 metres from Sant Miquel Beach and 2.7 km from Mar Bella Beach. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, an oven, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. Units are equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views. At the apartment complex, the units have bed linen and towels.

Guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Barceloneta Suites Apartments Market.

name: Grums Hotel & Spa
description:
The modern Hotel Grums is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Barcelona’s port, ferry terminal and cruise terminal. The Ramblas are 600 metres away, and Parallel Metro Station 300 metres away.

Hotel Grums Barcelona offers elegant, bright and spacious rooms with themed design décor and panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

All our rooms have free RITUALS Cosmetics amenities.

The Hotel Grums Barcelona features a wellness spa which is not included in the room rate and can be accessed for a small surcharge. Guests can relax in the hot tub, Finnish sauna or steam bath. A selection of massage and treatments are also available at an extra cost.

name: Sonder La Casa del Sol
description:
A 10-minute walk from La Pedrera, Sonder l La Casa del Sol is situated in Barcelona and features rooms with free WiFi. Well set in the Gràcia district, this hotel offers rooms with balcony.

The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with free-to-air channels. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Sonder l La Casa del Sol offers a beautiful sun terrace.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Catalan.

Casa Batllo is 1.3 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Sonder l La Casa del Sol.

name: You Stylish Beach Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Some of these stylish apartments have  Mediterranean Sea views and free WiFi.

Decorated in light colours, the bright air-conditioned You Stylish Beach apartments feature private bathrooms, fully equipped kitchens and dining areas with a balcony. A flat-screen TV and a DVD player can be found in the living room.

Some apartments have access to a shared outdoor swimming pool and terrace.

Avinguda Diagonal Avenue and Selva de Mar Metro Station are both less than 600 metres from the apartments. Barcelona’s historic Gothic Quarter is just 6 metro stops away.

name: Vasanta powered by Sonder
description:
Sonder l Vasanta is set in a 20th century neo-classical building, 200 metres from Urquinaona Metro Station. It offers chic, soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and in some cases, a balcony or terrace.

Air-conditioned rooms feature modern design and include a flat-screen TV  and a private bathroom.

The Vasanta is a 4 minute walk from Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres away from Plaza Catalunya.

You can walk to Barcelona Cathedral, Las Ramblas and the Gothic and Born districts within 8 minutes. Hotel Vasanta is 20 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia.

name: Le Palacete powered by Sonder
description_short: Private suite • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 31m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona, in the Gracia district, 1 km from Park Güell, Sonder l Le Palacete features an interior garden and courtyard.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a seating area and a private terrace. You will find a coffee machine in the room. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Sonder l Le Palacete features free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers contact-free check-in and 24/7 virtual support which limits in-person interaction.

Sagrada Familia is 1.3 km from Sonder l Le Palacete, while La Pedrera is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sonder l Le Palacete.

name: Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Gran Vía Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Eric Vökel Gran Via Suites are boutique apartments set in central Barcelona, 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Espanya Square. These chic apartments offer free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned apartment at Eric Vökel has attractive, contemporary décor. All accommodation has a well-equipped kitchenette and a spacious living area with a flat-screen TV.

There are several bars and cafés within 100 metres of the Suites. Set on Gran Via Avenue, the apartments have easy access to a range of supermarkets and shops.

The Vökel is just 20 minutes’ walk from Montjuïc Mountain and Catalunya’s National Art Museum. The famous Las Ramblas and the surrounding Gothic Quarter can be reached in 10 minutes, by Metro.

name: BcnStop Parc Güell
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Set 350 metres from Park Güell in Barcelona's quiet Gracia district, BcnStop Parc Güell apartments have air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Vallcarca Metro Station is just 220 metres away.

The BcnStop Parc Güell apartments are heated and have a fully equipped kitchen, TV and either one or two bathrooms. Apartments with a private balcony or terrace available for a small surcharge.

Towels, bed linen and soap are included at BcnStop Parc Güell.
At reception you can request a laundry service and tourist information.

You can reach Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas, the heart of Barcelona, in just 10 minutes by metro. There is a bus stop opposite the apartments, and there is private parking just 40 metres away that can also be reserved in advance for a small surcharge.

name: BcnStop Parc Güell
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Set 350 metres from Park Güell in Barcelona's quiet Gracia district, BcnStop Parc Güell apartments have air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Vallcarca Metro Station is just 220 metres away.

The BcnStop Parc Güell apartments are heated and have a fully equipped kitchen, TV and either one or two bathrooms. Apartments with a private balcony or terrace available for a small surcharge.

Towels, bed linen and soap are included at BcnStop Parc Güell.
At reception you can request a laundry service and tourist information.

You can reach Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas, the heart of Barcelona, in just 10 minutes by metro. There is a bus stop opposite the apartments, and there is private parking just 40 metres away that can also be reserved in advance for a small surcharge.

name: Aparthotel Rambla108
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 27m²
description:
Apartments Ramblas108 offers modern apartments situated right on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, in the heart of the city centre. Each air-conditioned apartment has free WiFi and most have a private balcony overlooking Las Ramblas.

The stylish Apartments Ramblas108 apartments have a living area with an LCD TV and a well-equipped kitchen area with a microwave, coffee maker and some have a washing machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Apartments Ramblas108 is set on the edge of the Gothic Quarter, just opposite the vibrant Boqueria Market and Liceu Metro Station. Buses to Barcelona Airport stop in Plaça Catalunya Square, a 3-minute walk away.

name: Valencia 2
description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Valencia 2 provides accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is situated 1.9 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 1.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and 1.9 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is less than 1 km from Casa Batllo, and within 1.1 km of the city centre.

Towels and bed linen are provided in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include La Pedrera, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Valencia 2.

name: Stay U-nique Apartments Rambla Catalunya
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Rambla Catalunya offers air-conditioned apartments in Barcelona with 1 or 2 bedrooms. They are all around 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia Station and 500 metres from La Pedrera. Free WiFi access is available.

Each apartment has a living room with a flat-screen satellite TV. There is a full kitchen with a washing machine, fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided. Some apartments have a balcony.

Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas are a 5-minute walk from the apartments. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

name: Fontanella By BCN URBAN Rooms
description:
Fontanella By BCN URBAN Rooms is a recently renovated guest house in the centre of Barcelona, 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach. The accommodation offers a lift, full-day security and currency exchange for guests.

With a private bathroom, units at the guest house also have free WiFi, while selected rooms also offer a balcony. At the guest house, some units are soundproof.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Fontanella By BCN URBAN Rooms include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Espais Blaus Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Just 400 metres from Joanic Metro Station, these stylish apartments offer free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a kitchenette with a washer-dryer, oven and dishwasher. The building features a rooftop sun terrace.

Each bright, air-conditioned apartment has a spacious living-dining area with a sofa bed. All of them have a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There is a small supermarket directly below the apartments, and L’Abaceria Central food market is just 250 metres away. You can find many shops, bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk.

Espais Blaus Apartments are situated in a quiet area of the popular Gràcia district. Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudi’s La Pedrera are just a 15-minute walk away.

name: APBCN Eixample Center
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Featuring free WiFi, APBCN Eixample Center is located in Barcelona. This property is set 200 metres from Tetuan Metro Station and a 15-minute walk from the famous Sagrada Familia.

All air-conditioned apartments at this property provide you with a flat-screen TV and dining table, while the kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, oven, coffee machine, and microwave. You can enjoy views of the city from the private balcony.

The private bathroom comes with a shower and a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided, and a washer and dryer are available.

You can find a grocery shop, and various restaurants and bars within a 10-minute walk of APBCN Eixample Center. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas Boulevard are 1.3 km from the property, and Passeig de Gracia, famous for its designer shops, can be reached in 15 minutes on foot.

name: Apartments Barcelona Sagrada
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Apartments Barcelona Sagrada has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Bogatell Beach, 600 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2.1 km from La Pedrera. It is situated 2.3 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apartments Barcelona Sagrada.

name: Happy People Gaudi Sant Pau Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 55m²
description:
Happy People Sagrada Familia Apartments offers air-conditioned apartments and studios with free WiFi. Accommodation is 5 minutes’ walk from Camp de l’Arpa Metro Station.

Both studios and apartments feature a living-dining room with air conditioning, a sofa, and a flat-screen TV, and a kitchenette including a microwave, dishwasher and fridge. Some rooms have ceiling fans. The modern bathroom has a hairdryer, and towels and bed linen are provided.

Several bars, restaurants and supermarkets can be found within 5 minutes’ walk. The property offers tours around the city, and airport shuttle service, available on request and for a surcharge.

Located in a residential area of the Eixample District, the property is 15 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia. You can reach Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas in 30 minutes by public transport. Sant Pau Hospital, a spectacular example of modernist architecture, can be reached in 5 minutes on foot.

name: AinB Picasso-Corders Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
These studio apartments are located next to the Picasso Museum, Santa Caterina Market and in the heart of the bohemian Born and Gothic Quarter. They offer free Wi-Fi.

Apartments in Barcelona Corders are housed in a refurbished building, with a private lift to each apartment. Each stylish studio is decorated in light colours, using traditional materials such as stone and wood. Each studio has a small kitchen corner with a fridge and a hob or microwave.

The local district of the Born has a wealth of bars, restaurants and nightlife from which to choose. From the Corders apartments you can also walk to Las Ramblas, Barcelona Port and Barcelona Beach.

name: Molino Fresh
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Molino Fresh is a self-catering accommodation located in the heart of Barcelona. Cafeterias and tapas bars are 70 metres away. La Rambla, Barceloneta and its port are 1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment includes a seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV and heating. The kitchen is equipped with a stove, oven and microwave. There are 2 bathrooms with a  shower.

Plaça Catalunya is 2 km away. Molino Fresh is 15 km from Barcelona El Prat Airport.

name: Boat Accommodations Barcelona
description_short: Mobile home • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Boat Accommodations Barcelona offers air-conditioned accommodation in boats located in Port Forum in Barcelona. Private parking is available on site.

Each boat has free WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen, a seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower.

Platja del Litoral is less than 1 km from Boat Accommodations Barcelona, while Llevant is a 13-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 21 km from the accommodation.

name: BARCELONA GOTIC Guesthouse
description:
Set in a 19-th century building, right in Barcelona’s old town, BARCELONA GOTIC Guesthouse is just 2 minutes’ walk from the Ramblas and 15 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta beach.

Rooms have private or shared bathroom. This guest house also features a communal lounge with TV and a 24-hour reception. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and Wi-Fi is available in rooms at an extra cost.

GuestHouse Barelona Gotic is situated in the charming Gothic District. The surrounding area is full of restaurants, lively bars and cafés. The main shopping District is within walking distance of the property.

Plaza Cataluña Square is 10 minutes’ walk away. Liceu or Jaume I Metro Stations are 5 minutes’ walk from the guest house.

name: Fewdays Barcelona Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Located at different locations near Plaza Catalunya, Fewdays Barcelona Apartments offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. They feature a fully equipped kitchen.

The bright apartments feature a modern, minimalistic décor and parquet floors. Each one has a lounge area with a TV and CD player, and a kitchen equipped with an oven, microwave and coffee machine. The bathrooms include a washer-dryer.

Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia is around 5 minutes’ walk away and offers a range of designer shops, as well as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera houses. Central Barcelona offers a wide selection of restaurants and bars.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, which is also connected via many metro and bus lines to the rest of the city. Parking is available nearby for an extra cost.

name: Tendency Apartments 7
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 48m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 600 metres from Diagonal Metro Station, Tendency Apartments 7 offers accommodation with air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

The apartments include a living area with a flat-screen TV and sofa. Each has a kitchen, complete with an oven, dishwasher, and washing machine.

Some apartments feature a private balcony or a furnished terrace. Each apartment has a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, and towels and bed linen are provided.

Given its central location, the property is within walking distance of a number of shops and restaurants, as well as many of Barcelona’s sights. You can reach both Sagrada Familia and Plaza Cataluña Square within 20 minutes on foot. Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, with Gaudi’s building and designer boutiques, is 500 metres away.

name: Radas
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Featuring free WiFi,  Radas is set in Barcelona, 500 metres from Montjuïc. Palau Sant Jordi is 1.3 km away and Fira Barcelona is a 13-minute walk away.

The apartment features a seating-dining area with a satellite flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. All units include a kitchen fitted with a dishwasher, electric kettle, ceramic hob and oven. A microwave, a toaster and refrigerator are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. Some apartments have a terrace, balcony or chill out area.

Radas offers two-bedroom and one-bedroom apartments. They are equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided. Each apartment has a climate control system.

Plaza Reial is 1.5 km from Radas, while Plaça Catalunya is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 11 km from Radas, which you can reach by public transport from a bus stop 500 metres from the property.

name: Ant Hostel Barcelona
description:
Located opposite Parc de la Ciutadella Park in central Barcelona, Ant Hostel Barcelona offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 500 metres away.

Rooms at this hostel feature air conditioning and parquet floors. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower. Guests can make use of the shared kitchen.

Ant Hostel Barcelona also offers luggage storage as well as lockers for check-in and check-out are chargeable

Barcelona's Born Neighborhood and its many bars and restaurants are in the surrounding streets.

Picasso Museum is a 10-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 2 km from Ant Hostel Barcelona. Plaza Catalunya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is 20 minutes’ walk, while Estación del Nord, with direct buses to Girona-Costa Brava Airport, is just 500 metres' walk.

name: Happy People Plaza España Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 95m²
description:
Located 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya Square, the air-conditioned apartments at Happy People Plaza España Apartments come with free Wi-Fi. The building has a rooftop chill-out terrace for all guests.

Bright and modern, the apartments feature a lounge with a flat-screen TV, and a kitchen with a dining area and microwave. Both apartments have 2 double rooms, 2 twin rooms and 2 bathrooms. Towels and bed linen are included.

Many restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surrounding area. Hostafrancs Metro Station is 300 metres from the apartments and you can reach Plaza Catalunya in a 10-minute metro ride.

Barcelona Sants Train Station is a 5-minute walk from Happy People Plaza España Apartments and trains to Barcelona Airport leave from there.

name: Casagrand Luxury Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 4 bedrooms • 3 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 200m²
description:
Situated 5-minute walk from Paseo de Gracia and 550 metres from Gaudi’s La Pedrera, Casagrand Luxury Suites offers apartments with free access to a rooftop terrace with a pool and a sauna.

All soundproofed apartments includes, a pillow menu and turndown service. They all have a flat-screen satellite TV in all bedrooms and in the living-dining room; and a bathroom including a bathrobe and free Molton Brown toiletries. Some apartments have a private terrace. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Guests have access to an on-site 24-hour gym and the staff at the reception will provide services and suggestions about surroundings.

A selection of restaurants, cafes and bars can be found in Rambla de Catalunya Boulevard, 200 metres away.

You can reach the Sagrada Familia within 30-minute walk, while the closest metro station is Diagonal Metro Station, 350 metres away.

name: Barcelona City Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 14m²
description:
These stylish apartments close to the Torre Agbar and Glòries Metro station have free Wi-Fi and fully equipped kitchens.

The Barcelona City Apartments offer flexible accommodation for up to 4 people. They have TV and DVD player, and the kitchens have microwave, fridge, hob and washing machine. The apartments also have an iron, towels, and bed linen.

Barcelona City Apartment can be found close to Plaça de les Glòries, a transport hub in Barcelona. You have easy access to several Metro, bus and tram routes. You are only 10 minutes’ walk from the beach.

name: Spot Smart Nomad
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Spot Smart Nomad is located in central Barcelona, 450 metres from Plaza Espanya and 100 metres from the Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers spacious and modern apartments with a private patio.

Located in Plaza Espanya is Las Arenas Shopping Centre, a converted bullring. You can also find the Magic Fountain at Montjüic, the Joan Miró Foundation and the National Museum of Catalunya. Many restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surrounding streets.

Spot Smart Nomad feature stylish, white décor. Each unit has a separate lounge area with a flat-screen TV. All suites are equipped with a safe, fridge and tea and coffee-making facilities.

The property serves a daily breakfast on request which includes fresh fruit. There is a bright lounge with sofas where you can relax.

Spot Smart Nomad is 1 minute’s walk from Rocafort Metro Station, taking you to Plaza Catalunya in less than 5 minutes. From there you can walk to Gaudí's Casa Batlló and La Pedrera within 10 minutes. Airport buses leave from Plaza Espanya, and you can walk to Sants Train Station in 15 minutes.

name: Gran Vía by The Streets
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Set 500 metres from Plaza España, No 439 - The Streets Apartments Barcelona features accommodation with modern design and free WiFi. All apartments are located within a 10-minute walk of Fira of Barcelona.

Each air-conditioned apartment is fitted with wooden flooring and provides a pleasant seating area with sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. It features a well-equipped kitchen including a dishwasher, microwave and coffee machine. The bathroom comes with shower and hairdryer.

The property is surrounded by a wide range of bars, shops and restaurant with traditional Spanish dishes.  Las Arenas Shopping Centre is also a 5-minute walk from the complex.

Rocafort Metro Station is just outside the door. There is also a bus stop just in front of the property which let you reach Plaza Cataluña and Las Ramblas within 5 minutes.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

name: LucasLand Apartments Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Set 2.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach, LucasLand Apartments Barcelona offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 3 km from Somorrostro Beach and offers a lift. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near LucasLand Apartments Barcelona include Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Barcelona City Centre Hostal
description:
The hostel’s privileged position in the heart of the Eixample district allows you to easily walk through Barcelona´s cultural heart, with streets such as La Rambla and Passeig de Gracia in the local area.

Once you have returned from a day’s sightseeing you will find drinks and snacks available on site. Breakfast is served daily.

name: El Palauet Royal Suites
description_short: Private suite • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 150m²
description:
Located in a Modernist building, El Palauet Royal Suites features a rooftop spa with spectacular city views. It offers elegant, modern suites with free Wi-Fi.

El Palauet Royal Suites’s spacious suites include 2 bedrooms with private bathrooms, a spacious living room and a fully-equipped kitchen including a hob, microwave, small fridge and a dishwasher. Some include a balcony. All suites come with 2 bottles of water and a platter of apples, replenished every day, as well as a 380 ml bottle of Spanish wine and Wallpaper guide to Barcelona.

This luxury hotel delivers breakfast to the rooms. Main restaurants and bars can be found on Barcelona’s elegant Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, where it intersects with Diagonal Avenue.

El Palauet Royal Suites offers a personal assistant service. A shuttle service is available at an additional cost and guests can rent cars at the hotel.

name: Rambla de Mar Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 85m²
description:
Rambla de Mar Apartments is designed to ensure you have a stay in Barcelona worthy of being remembered with your family or friends.

Newly renovated, well lit and equipped to make you feel at home, in Rambla de Mar you will get an excellent location and the freedom to organize your stay in the Catalan capital as it best suits you.

Let us share more with you: The spacious living room is equipped to spend the day to day with the greatest possible comfort, its kitchen will allow you to prepare from the simplest to the most sophisticated dish thanks to all its equipment, the rooms are designed for maximum relaxation and featuring a total of 2 private bathrooms per apartment.

Each spacious apartment at Rambla de Mar Apartments has free Wi-Fi, and a living room with a sofa bed, a TV and a dining area.

The entire common area is enabled for people with reduced mobility to move around. You will also have a common terrace/solarium for sunbathing.

The building is located next to the Ramblas, the Port Vell, the Palau Güell and the Liceo. The Cathedral and the Barceloneta beach can be reached on foot. The Drassanes stop on metro line 3 is less than a minute away; Plaça Catalunya is 2 metro stops away, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Espanya are 4 stops away and Sants station is 6 stops away (among others).

Check in is from 16:00h and check out is from 09:00h to 11:30h.

We are a Pet Friendly apartment.

name: AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Featuring air conditioning, AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments offers pet-friendly accommodation in Barcelona. Plaza Reial is 900 metres from the property.

Featuring a balcony, the accommodation comes with a dining area and seating area with a TV. All units include a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher and microwave. A toaster is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer in each unit. Towels and bed linen are featured.

AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments also some of the apartments include a terrace

Montjuïc is 1.1 km from AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km.

name: DO Plaça Reial powered by Sonder
description:
Set on Plaza Reial and just off Las Ramblas, DO Plaça Reial powered by Sonder features a spa, a rooftop pool and stylish rooms. Bars and cafés can be found in the square and in the surrounding Gothic Quarter.

Each spacious, air-conditioned room offers a free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a free minibar.

In the mornings, the DO Plaça Reial offers a paid breakfast. Creative Mediterranean cuisine and tapas dishes are also served in the restaurant.

The hotel spa features a sauna.

The famous Boquería Market is just 5-minute walk away. Barcelona Cathedral, Liceu Metro and Plaza Catalunya are within 1 km of the hotel.

name: Key Gracia Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 100m²
description:
Gracia Apartments offer various apartments, all located in Barcelona's trendy Gràcia district, 750 metres from Gaudí's iconic Sagrada Família Basilica. These modern, air-conditioned apartments feature free WiFi.

Each apartment has stylish décor with parquet floors, while some apartments have a private terrace. The lounge has a sofa and flat-screen TV, and the kitchen includes an oven, hob, microwave and washing machine. There are 2 bathrooms, one with a bath and the other with a shower. A hairdryer, towels and bed linen are provided. The address of each apartment is provided in the descriptions of each one.

Information about what to see and do in the surrounding area is available, and you can walk to Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 7 minutes.

Located 450 metres away, Joanic and Sagrada Família Metro Stations connect you with the rest of the city with ease.

name: Sarriá - Sant Gervasi
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 110m²
description:
Situated within the Sarrià-St. Gervasi district in Barcelona, Sarriá - Sant Gervasi has air conditioning, a terrace, and city views. With quiet street views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a lift and free WiFi.

Boasting a DVD player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a hot tub. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Sants Railway Station is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Sarriá - Sant Gervasi.

name: Victoria Diagonal Mar Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 3 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 120m²
description:
Offering a balcony and free WiFi, Victoria Diagonal Mar Barcelona is a self-catering accommodation located in Barcelona. The property is 1 km from the sea and 4 km from the Rambla and Placa de Catalunya.

The apartment features air conditioning, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 toilet and a seating area. There is a full kitchen with a dishwasher, washing machine and a microwave. A tumble dryer is also featured.

Victoria Diagonal Mar Barcelona is 4.5 km from from Maremagnum shopping centre and 4 km from Port Olympic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is located 18 km away. The property offers free parking.

name: Tendency Apartments 6
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Situated in central Barcelona, a 2-minute walk from Girona Metro Station, Tendency Apartments 6 offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and heating. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is a 17-minute walk away.

All apartments have a living area with a flat-screen TV, DVD player, and dining table. The private kitchen is equipped with a hob, microwave, and fridge. Kitchenware is provided in all apartments and some of them have a washing machine and dishwasher.

The apartments include modern furnishings and many of them have a small balcony with views of the city. Each apartment has a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower, and towels and bed linen are provided. A cot is available upon request.

There are bars and restaurant within a 10-minute walk of the apartments, and a 24-hour grocery shop is just around the corner. Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, famous for its high-end boutiques and Gaudì’s buildings, can be reached in 7 minutes on foot.

name: Tendency Apartments 9
description_short: Entire apartment • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 3 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 150m²
description:
Centrally located, just 3 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Metro and Train Station, these modern air-conditioned apartments offer 4 or 5 bedrooms. Each apartment features free WiFi and a balcony with garden views.

The spacious living rooms come with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. Private bathrooms have a shower. Each apartment offers a well-equipped kitchen, which includes a dishwasher and washing machine. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Thanks to its central location, you will find lots of shops, bars and restaurants in the immediate area. The famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló buildings on Passeig de Gracia are a 5-minute walk away.

name: Pool House Barcelona
description_short: Entire holiday home • 6 bedrooms • 1 living room • 3 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 300m²
description:
Offering a garden with an outdoor swimming pool and BBQ facilities, Pool House Barcelona is set on the foothills of Tibidabo, in Barcelona. This property has impressive city views and free Wi-Fi.

Pool House Barcelona can be rented as an entire house, or alternatively is it possible to rent just a room.

The modern house offers air-conditioned rooms with simple décor. Towels and bed linen are provided. There is a furnished terrace as well as a common area with a TV lounge, large dining area and shared kitchen.

Pool House Barcelona is a 10-minute walk from a variety of Catalan restaurants. Penitents Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk and Park Güell is a 20-minute walk away. Plaza Catalunya and the old town are 6 stops by metro. Barcelona Airport is 20 km from the property.

name: Tendency Apartments 5
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Located opposite the famous Casa Batlló, Tendency Apartments 5 offers modern apartments with air conditioning, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Most of the apartments overlook the famous Paseo de Gracia Boulevard.

Bright apartments feature a spacious living-dining room with a sofa bed; and a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, hobs, and kitchenware. All have a washing machine, and cleaning products are also provided.

There are plenty of places to eat out nearby, and a 24-hour supermarket is a 10-minute walk away.

Ideally located, apartments are 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and popular Las Ramblas. Regular airport trains leave from Passeig de Gracia Train Station located just 300 metres away.

name: Bright & Breezy
description:
Set in Barcelona, less than 1 km from La Pedrera and a 16-minute walk from Casa Batllo, Bright & Breezy offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is situated 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Tivoli Theatre and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Bright & Breezy.

name: Cosmo Suite Penthouse
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 3 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 200m²
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a rooftop pool, pool view and a balcony, Cosmo Suite Penthouse is located in Barcelona. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The property provides a 24-hour front desk.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 3 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Sants Railway Station is 600 metres from the apartment, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Cosmo Suite Penthouse.

name: Diagonal Mar Sailboat
description_short: Mobile home • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
A sustainable property, Diagonal Mar Sailboat is situated in Barcelona near Forum Beach, Platja del Litoral and Llevant. This beachfront property offers access to free WiFi and free private parking. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

Some units in the boat have private entrance and are fitted with wardrobe and dressing room. Each unit includes a private bathroom, while certain rooms are equipped with a terrace and others also boast a sea view. At the boat, all units come with bed linen and towels.

A children's playground is also available for guests at the boat.

Platja de la Mora is 2.2 km from Diagonal Mar Sailboat, while Mar Bella Beach is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

name: HoHomes - Luxury Palacete
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 2 living rooms • 4 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 300m²
description:
In a central area of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Casa Batllo and La Pedrera, HoHomes - Luxury Palacete offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a dishwasher and coffee machine. With inner courtyard views, this accommodation features a balcony. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a lift and currency exchange for guests.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and fruits. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available near the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from HoHomes - Luxury Palacete.

name: Praktik Garden
description:
Featuring a charming garden terrace, Praktik Garden is located 400 metres from Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. Fully reburbished in 2015, its chic rooms feature colourful mosaic floors, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

Girona Metro Station is just around the corner from the hotel. From there guests can reach the city’s Barceloneta Beach in 15 minutes. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

All rooms at the Praktik Garden are equipped with air conditioning and some rooms have balconies. The modern bathroom includes a shower.

Guests can relax in the hotel lounge or on the furnished garden terrace. The hotel provides vending machines for drinks 24-hours a day.

name: BoujeeStay Born Apartments & Studios
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 43m²
description:
BoujeeStay Born Apartments & Studios provides accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. It is located 1.8 km from Somorrostro Beach and offers a lift. The property is close to popular attractions like Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Reial and Picasso Museum.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a a bath or shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from BoujeeStay Born Apartments & Studios.

name: H La Paloma Adults Only
description:
The H La Paloma is located in the Raval neighborhood, just 200 meters from the Sant Antoni market.
 The rooms at H La Paloma feature modern and elegant decoration.
They feature a king-size bed, free Wi-Fi, Smart TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. It also has private parking and 24-hour room service.
The H La Paloma has the ideal location to visit the major centers of interest on foot, being 600 meters from the MACBA Museum of Modern Art and just a 5-minute walk from Paseo de Gracia, Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas.
The Sant Antoni and Universidad metro stations are just a few meters away.

name: SMLuxuryHouse
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 92m²
description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a private pool, SMLuxuryHouse is set in Barcelona. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The accommodation offers a lift, luggage storage space and organising tours for guests.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and garden views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Forum Beach, Platja del Litoral and Llevant. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from SMLuxuryHouse.

name: CAMP NOU & FiRA BUSINESS LOFTS
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 25m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, near Camp Nou and Sants Railway Station, CAMP NOU & FiRA BUSINESS LOFTS is a sustainable aparthotel that offers guests with greener choices throughout their stay. Among the facilities at this property are free shuttle service and full-day security, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace.

At the aparthotel, all units come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 3.2 km from the aparthotel, while Palau Sant Jordi is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from CAMP NOU & FiRA BUSINESS LOFTS.

name: Rosello 3
description:
Rosello 3 in Barcelona features accommodation with free WiFi, less than 1 km from Casa Batllo, a 16-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia and 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is around 1.9 km from Portal de l'Angel, 2.1 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is 1.4 km from the city centre and 500 metres from La Pedrera.

Towels and bed linen are offered in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Sagrada Familia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Rosello 3.

name: Tres Torres Atiram Hotels
description:
Hotel Tres Torres is located in Barcelona’s Sarrià district, just 350 metres from Tres Torres Metro Station, connecting you to Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 15 minutes. It offers attractive rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The modern rooms are air-conditioned and feature wooden floors. All have satellite TV, a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

A buffet breakfast is served in the Tres Torres' restaurant. There is a bar and room service is available.

The Tres Torres has a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge.

The hotel is located close Barcelona's L'Illa Shopping Centre.

name: SmartRoom Barcelona
description:
SmartRoom Barcelona is an eco-friendly economy hotel located in central Barcelona, 1 km from Sants Train Station. Decorated in a modern style, each room here will provide you with a flat-screen Smart TV with satellite channels. This hotel has been awarded the Green Key for their sustainable and environmental friendly business.

The air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi access. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Extras include a desk and bed linen.

A buffet breakfast is available daily. Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine with drinks and snacks. At SmartRoom Barcelona you will find a 24-hour front desk.

Plaza de Sants is 450 metres from SmartRoom Barcelona and Sants Train Station is 15 minutes' walk away. The hotel is 1.5 km from Camp Nou and Magic Fountain of Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes' drive away.

name: La Maison de Barcelone
description:
Offering free WiFi and garden views, La Maison de Barcelone is an accommodation located in the centre of Barcelona, just 600 metres from Casa Batllo and less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property features city views and is less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and a 3-minute walk from La Pedrera. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath. At the guest house, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Plaça Catalunya, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from La Maison de Barcelone, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Diagonal 1
description:
Diagonal 1 is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, a 14-minute walk from Casa Batllo and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is located 2.3 km from Portal de l'Angel, 2.5 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1 km away.

Towels and bed linen are featured in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Diagonal 1.

name: Hostal La Terrassa
description:
Situated within 1.9 km of Somorrostro Beach and 180 meters of Boqueria Market, Hostal La Terrassa features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Boasting a terrace, this property is set a short distance from Cathedral of Barcelona, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and ticket service for guests.

At the guest house, rooms come with a wardrobe.

Plaça Reial is 500 meters from Hostal La Terrassa, while Portal de l'Angel is 950 meters from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Apart céntrico con terraza en Gracia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Apart céntrico con terraza en Gracia features a terrace and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.6 km of Casa Batllo and 1.7 km of Sagrada Familia. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1.1 km away.

This air-conditioned apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apart céntrico con terraza en Gracia.

name: By Urquinaona Rooms
description:
Providing free WiFi throughout the property, By Urquinaona Rooms is located in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach and 2.6 km from Sant Miquel Beach. The property is around 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia and less than 1 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach.

Guest rooms at the hostel are equipped with a shared bathroom equipped with a shower.

Popular points of interest near By Urquinaona Rooms include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Praktik Èssens
description:
Boasting a terrace, Praktik Èssens is located in Barcelona and is 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The property is set 300 metres from Casa Batllo and 350 metres from Tivoli Theatre. The accommodation features free WiFi and an outdoor terrace, tea and coffee with free pastries corner and happy hour every day from 19:00 hours to 20:00 hours (free wines and snacks).

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while certain rooms at Praktik Èssens also feature a seating area. All rooms have a desk.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Praktik Èssens.

name: Praktik Rambla
description:
Situated on the central, tree-lined Rambla Catalunya, this boutique hotel is set in a stunning 19th-century palace. It maintains authentic features such as Baroque-style columns and colourful ceramic floors.

The chic rooms at the Praktik Rambla feature a minimalist design and come with air conditioning. They also include free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom, decorated with striking green tiles.

The hotel offers a terrace with comfortable sofas where guests can relax. From June to September, free fruit juice is served on the terrace from 16:00 to 20:00 every day.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 200 metres away from the Praktik Rambla. Barcelona’s famous Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away. The hotel is surrounded by restaurants, bars and shops.

name: ClassBedroom Barcelona Beach Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
These apartments without elevator access are located in the district of Barceloneta, surrounded by seafood restaurants and set beside the city’s sandy beaches.

ClassBedroom Barcelona Beach Apartments can accommodate 2 people per apartment.  They allow families and groups of friends to enjoy independent accommodation in the heart of The Catalan capital.

The apartment's location is near to train, metro and bus services, meaning that you can easily visit the many cultural sights of this inspiring city. Las Ramblas and the lively district of El Born are only a few minutes walk away.

This historic fishing district is also a short distance from the Olympic Port.

name: Abba Garden
description:
This modern hotel is situated on the northern edge of the city of Barcelona, near Avinguda Diagonal and Barcelona FC's famous stadium, Camp Nou. Guests have free access to the seasonal outdoor pool, the gym, and the wellness area that is equipped with sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

The exterior facing rooms feature a flat-screen TV, minibar, and a safe. The bathroom comes with free toiletries, bath, and hairdryer.

Stroll around the gardens of the Abba Garden Hotel. There is also a paddle court, so you can play a quick game.

Grab a bite to eat in the snack bar in the evening - complete with terrace.

Zona Universitaria Metro Station that takes you to the Barcelona city centre is a 10-minute walk away. Metro Line 9 is a 13-minute walk away and it takes you to the airport within 15 minutes and to La Fira within 30 minutes.

name: Aparthotel Mariano Cubi Barcelona
description_short: Private suite
description:
Aparthotel Mariano Cubi can be found just 200 metres from Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal and 15 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gracia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and some have a kitchenette.

All spacious rooms have wooden floors, satellite TV, and a desk.

The Aparthotel Mariano Cubi's tour desk can help guests plan their stay in Barcelona. There is also a free business centre with internet access.

The area has a wide range of shops. Fontana Metro station is about 500 metres away and Gràcia FGC Station is only 150 metres away. From there you can get to Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas. Gaudí's La Pedrera is about 20 minutes’ walk away.

name: Central Station Hostel Barcelona
description:
Central Station Hostel Barcelona offers basic accommodation in central Barcelona, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It offers a sun terrace, restaurant and free Wi-Fi throughout.

Central Station's rooms are simple and brightly decorated. They come with a small flat-screen TV and a fan. Some also have a private bathroom.

The hostel has 24-hour reception, where currency exchange and bicycle rental are available. There are also free drinks such as coffee or juice throughout the day.

Central Station Hostel Barcelona is 200 metres from Liceu Metro Station, providing access to the rest of the city. The port is 10 minutes’ walk away while Barceloneta Beach is 20 minutes’ away.

name: Sant Pau Terraces Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 27m²
description:
These bright modern apartments each have a furnished terrace with excellent views over the sea or Barcelona’s Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Sant Pau Terraces Apartments also come with free Wi-Fi.

Apartments have an integrated heating and cooling system. The living room includes a sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. There is a dining table and a kitchenette with a washing machine, fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and shower.

You will find lots of shops and restaurants along Avenida Gaudi, which starts next to the apartments. You can stroll along this avenue to the Sagrada Familia in 10 minutes. From Sant Pau/Dos de Maig Metro Station, 2 minutes’ walk away, you can reach central Barcelona in 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Brummell
description:
Hotel Brummell is a 20-room boutique hotel located a few steps from the Miró Foundation and The Grec theatre. Guests will benefit from free and unlimited yoga classes. A running club, for both guests and locals, is organized regularly.

The hotel features an outdoor pool, a garden and a sauna. T-training and boxing session are hosted at the well-being center The Loft.

All rooms boast modern furniture and artwork by young European designers. Each one is equipped with a safe, coffee and tea facilities and a yoga mat. The private bathroom has a rain shower, a high-powered hairdryer and free toiletries by MMLL. Suites have a private, furnished terrace with an outdoor bath.

Brummell Kitchen offers a seated buffet breakfast with homemade granola, local products and fresh orange juice. Guest will also have 24h/7 access to the our self service Honesty Bar, with a selection of drinks, tasty snacks and other delights.

You will also enjoy our on site restaurant Palo Cortao restaurant. A revisited taverna with twisted classic flavor and dishesm and a great wine menu.

Hotel Brummell is just a 15-minute walk from La Rambla and the closest metro station is Parallel Metro Station, 250 m away.

For guests who wish to explore the sights of Barcelona, Montjuïc is known for its parks and gardens and is within 10 minutes' walk. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Please note that the swimming pool will be closed for maintenance from the 1 till the 23 of December.

name: Urban Flats Vallirana
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Attractively situated in the Sarrià-St. Gervasi district of Barcelona, Urban Flats Vallirana is situated 1.6 km from La Pedrera, 2.6 km from Casa Batllo and 1.7 km from Park Güell. The property is around 3 km from Passeig de Gracia, 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 3.2 km from Plaça Catalunya. The apartment features family rooms.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchen has a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while certain rooms have a terrace. All units at the apartment complex have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Tivoli Theatre is 3.7 km from the apartment, while Sants Railway Station is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Urban Flats Vallirana.

name: Petit Palace Museum
description:
This stylish design hotel is situated in the centre of Barcelona, less than 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. The chic rooms include free WiFi.

Rooms at the Petit Palace Museum feature a contemporary bathroom with a hydromassage shower and hairdryer.

Bicycles can be hired for free at the Petit Palace, subject to availability. Bus tours can be organised for guests. The exclusive Paseo de Gracia Boulevard is 200 metres away with its many shops, restaurants and bars.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant. There is also a bar where guests can enjoy cocktails.

name: Eixmaple Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 50m²
description:
Offering city views, Eixmaple Apartments is an accommodation located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.7 km from Casa Batllo. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.2 km away.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. The units at the apartment complex include air conditioning and a desk.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Eixmaple Apartments.

name: Sweet Inn - Avenida Roma
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Sweet Inn - Avenida Roma has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station, 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Casa Batllo is 1.2 km away.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, La Pedrera and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Sweet Inn - Avenida Roma.

name: Spatious luxe apartment Paseo de Gracia Diagonal
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 69m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 400 metres from La Pedrera and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo, Spatious luxe apartment Paseo de Gracia Diagonal features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation offers private check-in and check-out and a tour desk for guests.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Spatious luxe apartment Paseo de Gracia Diagonal.

name: Comfort Home Playa Poblenou
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
