Located in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Mar Bella Beach and a 11-minute walk from Bogatell Beach, Comfort Home Playa Poblenou provides spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is situated 3.1 km from Port Olimpic, 3.7 km from Sagrada Familia and 4 km from Santa Maria del Mar. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach.

The apartment is equipped with 3 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Picasso Museum is 4.6 km from Comfort Home Playa Poblenou, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: numa I Seda Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
numa I Seda Apartments is located in Barcelona’s trendy Born district, just 250 metres from Ciutadella Park. It offers stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TV.

The apartments at numa I Seda Apartments feature modern décor with traditional elements such as original vaulted ceilings. Each one has an open-plan lounge area and views of Rec Street.

The apartments have a well-equipped kitchen with a vitroceramic hob, microwave and coffee maker, as well as a washing machine. The stylish bathroom features tiles in a mosaic. Bed linen, towels and ironing equipment are provided. Guests have access to a shared terrace.

There are many bars, restaurants and boutique shops in the streets around numa I Seda Apartments, and the Chocolate and Picasso Museums are within 250 metres. França Station is 3 minutes’ walk away, and you can walk to the beach at Barceloneta in 15 minutes.

name: Apartamentos Calvet
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Less than 15 minutes on foot from Hospital Clinic Metro Station and a 20-minute metro ride to Barcelona city centre, Apartamentos Calvet features free WiFi, air conditioning, and heating. The building has a new lift, installed in February 2015.

All apartments have a seating area with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a sofa, and a dining table. The kitchen is equipped with a washing machine, hob, and microwave.

The apartments have a private bathroom with a bath tub or a shower, and towels and bed linen are provided. Some apartments include a furnished terrace with city views.

Sants Estación Train Station, where you can catch a train to El Prat Airport, is 2 km from the property.

name: Casa Balmes
description:
Casa Balmes is a bed and breakfast located in the very centre of Barcelona, 400 metres from the well-known Passeig de Gràcia Avenue and monuments like Casa Batlló. Free WiFi access is available.

Each air-conditioned room at Casa Balmes is soundproof and has elegant décor, as well as a full HD flat-screen TV and a minibar. There is also a free safe and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are included. Some rooms have street views.

At Casa Balmes you will find a terrace and a shared lounge with vending machines. A daily breakfast consisting of fruit juices, coffee, tea, toast, jams, cereals and a selection of pastries is included.

Other services offered at the property include tourist information, luggage storage and laundry. Guests can find a sports centre with gym and spa just 80 metres away from the b&b.

Casa Balmes is 8 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is less than 20 minutes by car.

name: Apartments Sixtyfour
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Apartments Sixtyfour are situated on Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, opposite the famous Gaudi building, Casa Batlló. These design apartments have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

Apartments Sixtyfour are a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Square and Las Ramblas. The apartments are next to Passeig de Gracia Station. This Metro and train station offers direct links to Barcelona Airport. The property offers information on other touristic options in the city.

Each apartment has wooden floors and elegant modern décor. Living areas come with a double sofa bed. The stylish kitchens include an oven, ceramic hob and dishwasher.

A continental breakfast is served in a cafeteria nearby.

Bed linen and towels are included in all apartments. Basic cleaning products and cooking items are also provided. Several supermarkets can be found within 800 metres of the apartments.

name: Rocafort in Eixample
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Offering city views, Rocafort in Eixample is an accommodation located in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Sants Railway Station and 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.2 km away.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Plaça Catalunya and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 11 km from Rocafort in Eixample, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Stay Barcelona Borne Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 95m²
description:
Offering stylish apartments with balconies and free WiFi, Stay Barcelona Borne Apartment is located in Barcelona’s El Born district. The apartments are within 5 minutes’ walk of Ciutadella Park.

The spacious apartments have minimalist décor with wooden furnishings. The spacious living area has a sofa and a flat-screen TV, while kitchen facilities include a microwave and washing machine. Some apartments come with air conditioning.

You can find shops, bars and cafés in the streets surrounding the apartments. The lively Port Olímpic, including bars and nightclubs, can be reached in 20 minutes on foot.

Arc del Triomf metro and train stations are within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments. Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter are approximately 1.5 km from the property.

name: ChicStays Apartment Vila Olímpica
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
ChicStays Apartment Vila Olímpica features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Nova Icaria Beach, a 13-minute walk from Somorrostro Beach and 1.3 km from Bogatell Beach. Complimentary WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Port Olimpic, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from ChicStays Apartment Vila Olímpica.

name: The White Flats Sant Antoni
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Welcome to White Flats Sant Antoni, your centrally located oasis in the heart of Barcelona. Just a delightful 10-minute stroll from both La Rambla and Plaza de España, our property offers beautifully designed apartments carefully decorated.

Each apartment boasts a twin room, complemented by a double bed in the living room, separated by curtains. The living room itself is a cozy haven, complete with a smart TV, a plush sofa, and a dining table. While the living room is equipped with refreshing air conditioning, the twin rooms are equipped with fans to keep you cool. Additionally, we've provided a washing machine, an oven, and a microwave in the kitchen for your convenience. The bathroom features a comfortable shower and a hairdryer to enhance your stay.

For those seeking something extra special, we have a premium apartment that will exceed your expectations. This remarkable unit offers two balconies facing the bustling street and a terrace at the back. Inside, you'll discover three separate bedrooms, two bathrooms, and an open, fully equipped kitchen that seamlessly connects to the spacious living room.

Exploring the city couldn't be easier, as Sant Antoni Metro Station is just a 5-minute walk away. From there, you'll have convenient access to iconic attractions like the Sagrada Familia and numerous other must-visit destinations. Poble Sec metro station is also within easy reach of our apartments. And fear not, transportation to and from the airport is a breeze, thanks to a nearby bus stop, a mere 150 meters from our property.

Discover the allure of Barcelona from the comfort of White Flats Sant Antoni, the best location for an unforgettable experience.

name: Beautiful bright apartment at plaza Urquinaona
description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach and 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Beautiful bright apartment at plaza Urquinaona offers air conditioning. The property is close to Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Passeig de Gracia and Picasso Museum. The property is 2.3 km from Somorrostro Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and fridge. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Beautiful bright apartment at plaza Urquinaona.

name: Hostal Sans
description:
Set on Plaza de Sants, Hostal Sans is a 5-minute walk from Sants Railway Station and just over 1 km from Plaza de Espanya. It offers rooms with TVs, and a 24-hour reception.

Each simply decorated room at Hostal Sans has air conditioning and heating.

Free WiFi is available in public areas, where there are vending machines. Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found in the surrounding Sants district.

Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter can be reached in just 10 minutes by Metro. The nearest beaches are a 30-minute bus journey away.

name: Apartamento soleado en Barcelona city
description:
Offering city views, Apartamento soleado en Barcelona city is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, 7 km from La Pedrera and 7.1 km from Casa Batllo. The property has inner courtyard views and is 7.4 km from Park Güell and 7.5 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 5.4 km away.

This apartment has 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 7.6 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 7.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 22 km from Apartamento soleado en Barcelona city.

name: Hotel Glòries
description:
This modern hotel is located 200 metres from Barcelona’s Monumental Bull Ring and 12 minutes from the Sagrada Familia. The rooms all have air conditioning and heating, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Monumental Metro Station is just 3 minutes’ walk away from Hotel Glòries, and offers a direct service to Plaza Catalunya in around 5 minutes.

The hotel is well located for the 22@ high-tech area, as well as the Agbar Tower. The National Theatre of Catalunya and the Auditori Concert Hall are just 400 metres away.

The Hotel Glòries’s 24-hour front desk offers car and bike hire. They can also exchange currency and reserve tickets.

name: LB Nice Apartment Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, LB Nice Apartment Sagrada Familia features a patio. It is set 2.8 km from La Pedrera and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 1.2 km away.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Park Güell is 2 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from LB Nice Apartment Sagrada Familia.

name: Sweet Inn - Sepulveda
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 68m²
description:
Ideally located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Sweet Inn - Sepulveda is located 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.3 km from Boqueria Market. It is set 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km away.

Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Casa Batllo and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Sweet Inn - Sepulveda.

name: Catalonia La Maquinista
description:
Catalonia La Maquinista is ideally located next to the La Maquinista Shopping Centre in Barcelona’s Sant Andreu District. Plaza de Catalunya is just a 15-minute Metro journey away.

The Maquinista’s bright rooms have air conditioning and flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. All rooms have a work desk and safe. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

The hotel restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for lunch and dinner. The neighbouring Maquinista Shopping Centre has a selection of cinemas, a bowling alley, as well as cafés and bars.

Catalonia La Maquinista is 500 metres from Barcelona’s ring road, the B10 Ronda del Litoral, connecting guests to the beach in 10 minutes.

Sant Andreu Metro and Railway Station is just a 10-minute walk from Catalonia La Maquinista and has direct trains to Passeig de Gràcia and to El Prat Airport. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 8 Metro stops away.

As with reservations of more than 4 rooms, special conditions and supplements will apply to those of more than 8 nights.

name: numa I Brio
description:
A 5-minute walk from Diagonal and Fontana Metro stations, Numa I Brio is set in Barcelona’s bohemian Gràcia district. It features modern rooms with rain-effect showers.

Numa I Brio's simply decorated, air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed. Each room has a TV and private bathroom. A safe is available.

Restaurants and bars can be found in the surrounding streets. Popular Plaza del Sol is just 500 metres away.

There is a garden patio and guests can also enjoy a working space with high-speed free WiFi.

Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel. Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya are just 2 Metro stops from Diagonal station.

name: Calm Terrace Barcelona
description:
Located in Barcelona, 3.1 km from Sagrada Familia and 3.9 km from Park Güell, Calm Terrace Barcelona provides air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This recently renovated apartment is located 4.4 km from La Pedrera and 4.9 km from Casa Batllo. Outdoor dining is also possible at the apartment.

The spacious apartment is located on the ground floor and is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a toaster and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Sightseeing tours are available nearby.

Passeig de Gracia is 5.3 km from Calm Terrace Barcelona, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 5.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Barcelona4Seasons - Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
This great selection of comfortable and cosy apartments has various locations in the area around Barcelona's Sagrada Família, each with convenient access to the excellent public transport network.

Each of the Barcelona4Seasons’ apartments is tastefully decorated and well-equipped with stylish furnishings. They provide the ideal setting for those who prefer the privacy and independence of apartment accommodation.

The apartments are located in different points of Barcelona – all a maximum of 10-15 minutes from the city centre. Each one enjoys easy access to public transport, allowing you to explore this cosmopolitan city.

Check availability for the exact location of each apartment.

name: BCN Rambla Catalunya Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 50m²
description:
Address: Rambla Catalunya, 101-103/ Carrer Aragó, 250.
Air-conditioned apartment with a double bedroom, a twin room and free Wi-Fi. It has a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom, dishwasher and washing machine. The well-equipped kitchen includes a fridge and microwave. Please note that the photos are of a selection of different apartments, all with similar characteristics. The apartments will be allocated according to availability

name: Casa familiar con piscina
description_short: Entire holiday home • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 35m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Casa familiar con piscina has a terrace and pool views. Boasting mountain views, a garden and a private pool, this holiday home also comes with free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 30 km from Sagrada Familia.

The air-conditioned holiday home consists of 4 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer, a seating area, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are available in the holiday home. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Barbecue facilities are provided.

La Pedrera is 32 km from the holiday home, while Casa Batllo is 32 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 47 km from Casa familiar con piscina.

name: Sant Pau Ramblas Apartments Serennia
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Sant Pau Ramblas Apartments Serennia provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is located 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and features a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with city views and an outdoor dining area. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Sant Pau Ramblas Apartments Serennia.

name: Monrooms Barcelona
description:
Located on the edge of the trendy Gracia neighbourhood, Monrooms Barcelona offers modern rooms with free WiFi and a TV. A communal kitchen and living areas are provided.

Each bright room has a private bathroom with a shower. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Monrooms Barcelona has a communal kitchen with a hob, microwave and fridge. There is also a dining area and a lounge for guests to use.

You can find a variety of bars and restaurants within a 10-minute walk. Gaudi’s Park Guell is 500 metres away. Lesseps Metro Station is 5 minutes´ walking from the guest house. Barcelona Airport is 20 km away.

name: Barcelona - Poble Nou
description:
Set in Barcelona, 700 metres from Mar Bella Beach and 800 metres from Bogatell Beach, Barcelona - Poble Nou offers air conditioning. The property is around 2.4 km from Port Olimpic, 3.2 km from Santa Maria del Mar and 3.4 km from Sagrada Familia. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include fruits.

Picasso Museum is 3.8 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Barcelona - Poble Nou.

name: Elegant apartment Rambla Badal
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Elegant apartment Rambla Badal has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.4 km of Sants Railway Station and 1.9 km of Camp Nou. It is set 2.9 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and features a lift. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau Sant Jordi is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Montjuïc is 4.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 9 km from Elegant apartment Rambla Badal.

name: Modern and bright apartment in Eixample 1-2
description:
Modern and bright apartment in Eixample 1-2 features a patio and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.2 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2 km of Casa Batllo. It is situated 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Modern and bright apartment in Eixample 1-2.

name: Lodging Apartments Illa Diagonal
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Lodging Apartments Camp Nou offers a modern apartment with free Wi-Fi. The apartment is between Las Tres Torres and La Bonanova Railway Stations, in the Sarría District.

This apartment offers a double bedroom and a bedroom with 2 single beds; and a modern bathroom with shower. The living-dining area has a sofa, a flat-screen TV; while the kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, oven and coffee machine. Kitchenware, bed linen and towels are also provided.

A range of shops and supermarkets can be found within a 5-minute walk; and the Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 1 km away.

You can reach Barcelona City Centre in around 30 minutes by public transports.

name: The Vintage Rentals
description:
These stylish apartments are located in central Barcelona, just on the corner of the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. They have free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a private balcony.

These air-conditioned Vintage Rentals apartments feature parquet floors and modern décor. The kitchen includes an electric hob, microwave, washing machine and dishwasher.

You can walk to Diagonal Metro Station in 3 minutes from the apartments. Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera is 5 minutes’ walk from The Vintage Rentals, and Casa Batlló is a 10-minute walk away. The property offers a shuttle service to Barcelona Airport, located 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: numa I Colmena Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 44m²
description:
Attractively situated in the Sarrià-St. Gervasi district of Barcelona, numa I Colmena Apartments is a sustainable apartment situated 1.8 km from La Pedrera and 1.3 km from Park Güell. The property invites guests to reconnect with nature and encourages them to make eco-friendly travel choices. Private parking is available on site at this recently renovated property. The apartment has family rooms.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, fridge and a stovetop. Every unit is fitted with a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms have a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Casa Batllo is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from numa I Colmena Apartments.

name: Enjoybcn Patio de Gracia
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Offering free Wi-Fi and a shared outdoor pool, these modern apartments are located between Gracia and Sant Gervasi Districts. Diagonal and Passeig de Gracia avenues are 10 minutes’ walk away.

Each air-conditioned apartment offers modern-style furniture and has a living-dining area with sofa and flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

name: Hotel Market
description:
Hotel Market is located next to Barcelona’s San Antonio Market, 10 minutes' walk from MACBA Gallery. Its chic rooms have rain showers and free Wi-Fi, and there is a popular restaurant.

The Market Hotel’s modern rooms have dark wood beams, white walls and large windows. Each one has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from both Plaza Espanya and Plaza Catalunya. Sant Antoni Metro Station is about 200 metres away, and an airport shuttle bus stop can be found 2 minutes’ away.

The Market Hotel’s elegant restaurant offers a range of modern Catalan dishes, and specializes in rice.

name: Catalonia Park Putxet
description:
Featuring a sunroof terrace with a pool and views over Barcelona, Catalonia Park Putxet offers tranquil rooms and a modern fitness centre onsite. There is free WiFi available throughout.

The Park Putxet has simple, bright décor. Each air-conditioned room comes with a mini fridge with complimentary water, a satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom with a hairdryer.

You can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with Show Cooking. Light meals are prepared at the hotel snack bar; and room service, including sushi room service, is available.

The hotel is located in a residential area. There is a wide selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the neighbouring district of Gràcia, which is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Gaudi's famous Park Guell is just 600 metres away. The closest metro station is Lesseps, 600 metres away.

name: La Casa Gran B&B
description:
La Casa Gran is a traditional bed and breakfast set 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Gaudi's La Pedrera. It offers suites with free Wi-Fi.

Set in a historic building declared Heritage of Barcelona, La Casa Gran Bed & Breakfast features rooms with private bathroom, private balcony with street views and plenty of natural light. They also have a ceiling fan.

There is a communal living-dining area with tea and coffee facilities. Breakfast is served in the dining room. The owners live on site and can provide assistance for guests 24 hours a day.

You will also find numerous bars, shops and restaurants nearby. The tourist bus stops within 50 metres of the property, and there is a bus with direct connections with the airport. Diagonal and Hospital Clinic Metro stations are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the property.

name: Silken Sant Gervasi
description:
Located in the quiet San Gervasi district of Barcelona, this elegant hotel offers modern rooms with free internet connection. The Silken is just 8 minutes by train from Plaza Catalunya.

The restaurant at Silken San Gervasi offers traditional cuisine with modern influences. A breakfast buffet is served in the cafeteria, and drinks and snacks are also available throughout the day.

Functional rooms include a free safe and central heating and air conditioning. The marble bathroom is complete with a hairdryer.

Silken St. Gervasi is a 15-minute walk from Park Guell, with impressive structures, mosaics and architecture by Antoni Gaudí. El Putxet Station can be found 50 metres from the hotel with direct access to the city centre.

name: Arcelon Hotel! New Opening! Nueva apertura 2023!
description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.8 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, Arcelon Hotel! New Opening! Nueva apertura 2023! offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service, a tour desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.9 km from Mar Bella Beach.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Arcelon Hotel! New Opening! Nueva apertura 2023! all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak Catalan, German, English and Spanish.

Llevant is 3 km from the accommodation, while Sagrada Familia is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Arcelon Hotel! New Opening! Nueva apertura 2023!.

name: Hostal Muntaner
description:
A 5-minute walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station and Avinguda Diagonal, Hostal Muntaner features a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi. You can reach central Barcelona, including Las Ramblas, in just 15 minutes by public transport.

Each bright room at Hostal Muntaner has simple décor. All rooms have heating, a flat-screen TV, and access to a shared or private bathroom. There is a fridge on each floor of the guest house.

Cafés and bars can be found in the streets surrounding the Muntaner. There are restaurants around Plaça Francesc Macià Square, 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Hostal Felipe 2
description:
Hostal Felipe 2 is located in a Modernista building just off Diagonal Avenue, less than 5 minutes’ walk from Verdaguer Metro Station. This guest house offers free Wi-Fi in all areas.

The Felipe’s rooms have a TV and either a private, or shared bathroom. All rooms are bright and have wooden flooring. The majority of the rooms have air conditioning and heating, and some have a balcony. Bed linen and towels are included.

The property has an area with computers which are available in the afternoon. You can also leave your luggage at reception, and safes are available.

There is a selection of restaurants and shops in the streets surrounding the Felipe 2. The famous Sagrada Familia is just a 10-minute walk away, while Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudí’s La Pedrera are less than 1 km from the apartments.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 20 minutes by Metro, while Sants Railway Station and Nord Bus Station are less than 3 km away.

name: Private room By BCN Center
description:
In a prime location in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Private room By BCN Center is set 1.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 1.3 km from Barceloneta Beach and 300 metres from Santa Maria del Mar. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Port Olimpic, Palau de la Musica Catalana, and Tivoli Theatre. The property is 1.2 km from Somorrostro Beach, and within 1.2 km of the city centre.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Picasso Museum, Cathedral of Barcelona and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Private room By BCN Center.

name: Habitación doble en Eixample
description:
Conveniently located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Habitación doble en Eixample is set 1.2 km from Casa Batllo, 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is situated 2.3 km from Portal de l'Angel, 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya and 4.2 km from Park Güell. The property is 1.6 km from the city centre and 700 metres from La Pedrera.

With a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also have free WiFi. At Habitación doble en Eixample all rooms have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sagrada Familia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Habitación doble en Eixample.

name: Hostal Argo
description:
Hostal Argo is a modern guest house located Barcelona, 4 minutes' walk from Diagonal Avenue and 450 metres away from Passeig de Gràcia. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

Air-conditioned rooms at Argo feature stylish Minimalist décor in neutral tones. They feature parquet floors, a TV and a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are included.

At Hostal Argo you will find a 24-hour front desk where luggage storage can be provided for free. An exclusive roof-top terrace with limited access is featured during summer season.

Modernist buildings like La Pedrera or Casa Batlló are 8 minutes on foot. Sagrada Familia Temple is 1 km away. The nearest metro station is Girona, 400 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes by car.

name: Durlet Beach Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 54m²
description:
Located 200 metres from Bogatell and Mar Bella Beaches, Durlet Beach Apartments is set in Barcelona’s Poblenou district. It offers free high-speed WiFi and access to the shared roof terrace and pool.

Featuring modern décor and floor-to-ceiling windows, the air-conditioned apartments include a living-dining area with a sofa bed, a flat-screen TV and DVD player. There are international TV channels. The kitchenette is equipped with an oven, microwave, dishwasher and washing machine.

There are many restaurants, bars and shops in the area surrounding Durlet Beach Apartments. The buzzing, tree-lined street Rambla de Poblenou is just round the corner.

The Port Olimpic is a 15-minute walk away and offers elegant beach bars and popular night clubs. Poblenou Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk from the apartments and connects you with the city centre in around 20 minutes.

name: Chic & Basic Tallers Hostal
description:
Set in the lively neighbourhood of the Raval, this trendy guesthouse is the perfect place to stay to explore the city centre and make the most of the nightlife in this area.

Chic & Basic Tallers Hostal boast a sleek and modern design throughout the property, and has plenty of natural light. The guesthouse has a Chill&Basic area, where you can enjoy complimentary coffee, or prepare a sandwich, while listening to the guesthouse's relaxing selection of music.

From this guesthouse you can easily walk to the majority of the principal monuments in the city, including the stunning Guadí buildings of Casa Batllò and La Pedrera, on Passeig de Gracia.

name: Valencia habitaciones
description:
Well set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Valencia habitaciones is located less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station, a 16-minute walk from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.1 km from Casa Batllo. The property is situated 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia, 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The accommodation provides a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

The units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a kettle. With a shared bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also provide guests with free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

La Pedrera is 2.7 km from the bed and breakfast, while Boqueria Market is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Valencia habitaciones.

name: Hostal Parisien Las Ramblas
description:
Offering free WiFi and city views, Hostal Parisien Las Ramblas is an accommodation set in Barcelona, just 500 metres from Plaça Catalunya and less than 1 km from Tivoli Theatre. This sustainable guest house is located 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 2.4 km from Barceloneta Beach. The property is 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

At the guest house, the units are equipped with a desk and a TV. At the guest house, the units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Hostal Parisien Las Ramblas.

name: By Paseo de Gracia Rooms
description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 300 metres from Casa Batllo, By Paseo de Gracia Rooms offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. Popular points of interest nearby include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

All rooms are fitted with a shared bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At the hostel all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near By Paseo de Gracia Rooms include Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Private Room Gothic Quarter
description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Private Room Gothic Quarter provides air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Plaça Reial, Santa Maria del Mar, and Picasso Museum. Certain rooms at the property include a balcony with a city view.

At the hostel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Private Room Gothic Quarter include Sant Sebastian Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Primavera Hostel
description:
Primavera hostel is set in Barcelona’s Eixample district, 8 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia Basilica. It offers free Wi-Fi and private rooms with a balcony, 200 metres from Verdaguer Metro Station.

Rooms at Primavera hostel are bright and feature smart, functional décor and original features. All include a fan and central heating, while bathrooms are shared.

The property has a communal kitchen where you can prepare meals, snacks and drinks and you can relax in the lounge area with big sofas and a selection of books.

Primavera is 5 minutes’ walk from the bohemian Gracia area and 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudi monuments.

Luggage storage is available and you can walk to the Arc de Triomf, Ciutadella Park and Estació del Nord Bus Station in 15 minutes.

name: Private rooms in Born
description:
Situated in Barcelona, within 1.4 km of Barceloneta Beach and 1.5 km of Sant Miquel Beach, Private rooms in Born features accommodation with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.1 km from Plaça Reial, less than 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and a 16-minute walk from Tivoli Theatre. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 1.3 km from Somorrostro Beach.

At the hostel, rooms include a shared bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Private rooms in Born include Picasso Museum, Cathedral of Barcelona and Santa Maria del Mar. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel SB Glow Sup
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel SB Glow Sup features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can use the sauna and the hammam, or enjoy city views.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Hotel SB Glow Sup rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Grill Bbq cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel SB Glow Sup.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Nova Icaria Beach is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Mar Bella Beach is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Hotel SB Glow Sup.

name: Hotel Roger de Llúria
description:
This boutique hotel offers comfortable rooms with 42-inch (101 cm) flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. The Roger de Lluria is set in an elegant area, 2 streets from Plaça Catalunya.

The Roger de Llúria is a 10-minute walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, on Passeig de Gràcia and around 700 metres from Las Ramblas.

Rooms at the Roger de Lluria are spacious and well-equipped. Each room has a marble bathroom with a bath, bathrobe and hairdryer. There is a daily turn-down service.

The Roger de Lluria offers a transfer service from the airport, at an additional cost. There is also a ticket service and business centre.

A large buffet breakfast is served every morning.  There is also a lounge bar.

name: Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar Affiliated by Meliá
description:
The contemporary Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar, managed by Meliá is set in a circular building, 10 minutes’ walk from Mar Bella Beach. It offers a 24-hour gym, and the rooftop pool offers impressive views of Barcelona.

The bright soundproofed rooms at the Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar are spacious and feature air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Each stylish room has a private bathroom and minibar. There are 2 phone lines.

The Barcelona Condal Mar lobby bar offers a range of cocktails. The bright snack lounge features modern armchairs. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the poolside bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the restaurant.

A special late check-out service, locker and transfer is available during the summer months for an extra cost.

The Barcelona Condal Mar is an 8-minute walk from Maresme Forum Metro Station and  a 2-minute walk from the nearest bus stop. The centre of Barcelona can be reached in around 15 minutes by Metro, Bus or Tram.

name: Hotel El Call
description:
Hotel Call Barcelona is located right in the centre of Barcelona’s historic Barri Gótic, 10 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas. It is close to Plaça Sant Jaume and not far from the Cathedral.

The rooms in the Hotel Call are spacious and practical. It offers air conditioned or heated accommodation, depending on the season. There is free Wi-Fi and a safe. The bathrooms have a shower.

The nearest Metro stops are Jaume I and Liceu, both about 10 minutes’ away. The famous Ramblas are also about 10 minutes’ walk away.

Hotel Call is also close to central Barcelona’s main shopping areas such as Portaferrisa and Portal de L'Àngel. The trendy Born area is also close by – here you will find plenty of restaurants and bars.

name: Hostal Radio Barcelona
description:
Hostal Radio Barcelona is in central Barcelona, just 3 minutes’ walk from the MACBA and CCCB Modern Art Museums. It offers a 24-hour reception and rooms with a flat-screen TV. Free WiFi is provided.

The rooms at the Radio feature heating and each one has a private bathroom.

Guests at Hostal Radio Barcelona are welcome to enjoy a free walking tour service, available on request.

Hostal Radio Barcelona offers coffee, capuccino, chocolate and cold drinks for sale at their waiting room. There are numerous bars, restaurants and shops within 2 minutes’ walk and both Universitat square and Catalunya square are just 5 minutes away.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya and paid parking near the hotel is offered to our guests.

name: Nice room By Eixample
description:
Located in Barcelona, within less than 1 km of Casa Batllo and a 15-minute walk of Passeig de Gracia, Nice room By Eixample provides accommodation with free WiFi throughout the property. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Portal de l'Angel, Sagrada Familia, and Plaça Catalunya. The property is 1.4 km from the city centre and 500 metres from La Pedrera.

At the hostel, every room is equipped with a shared bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Nice room By Eixample include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Nuevo Balmes Habitaciones
description:
Nuevo Balmes Habitaciones is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and a 7-minute walk from La Pedrera. It is situated less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a shared kitchen. The property is 500 metres from Casa Batllo, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

All units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a kettle. With a shared bathroom fitted with a bidet and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Nuevo Balmes Habitaciones.

name: Rooms Nueva Valencia
description:
Well set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Rooms Nueva Valencia is located 800 metres from Sants Railway Station, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.2 km from Casa Batllo. This bed and breakfast provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi. Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km from the bed and breakfast and La Pedrera is 2.8 km away.

A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. The units include a shared bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the bed and breakfast, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Rooms Nueva Valencia.

name: Hotel Monegal
description:
Situated right on the corner of Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas, Hotel Monegal boasts a fantastic central location. It offers good-value rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

Staff at Hotel Monegal’s  can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.
From the Monegal you can walk to Barcelona’s Gothic Cathedral and the modernist Palau de la Musica Auditorium in around 7 minutes. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are both within 20 minutes’ walk.

Buses to and from the airport leave from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, 200 metres away from the hotel.

name: Coronado
description:
Coronado is conveniently situated 200 metres from Paral•lel Metro Station and 15 minutes’ from Barcelona’s famous Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi throughout and reception is open 24 hours a day.

Rooms at Coronado feature a simple design and come with a private bathroom. They also include air conditioning and heating.

Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks at the bar-cafeteria in the lobby area. There are also many bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

The Magic Fountains in the Montjuic area are 15 minutes’ walk from Coronado while Barcelona’s port is 10 minutes away.

name: Habitaciones acogedoras
description:
Attractively set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Habitaciones acogedoras is located less than 1 km from Plaça Catalunya, a 7-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.4 km from Boqueria Market. It is situated 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia and features a shared kitchen. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and a 3-minute walk from Casa Batllo.

All units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a kettle. With a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Habitaciones acogedoras.

name: Hostal Hera
description:
Offering city views, Hostal Hera is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Barceloneta Beach and 1.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach. This 1-star guest house offers luggage storage space and a housekeeping service. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 1.2 km from Somorrostro Beach.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower, units at the guest house also feature free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a balcony. At the guest house, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Hostal Hera.

name: Urquinaona Rooms
description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, Urquinaona Rooms provides air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. The property is situated 2.6 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 500 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Barceloneta Beach.

All units include bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Urquinaona Rooms.

name: Hotel Alguer Camp Nou
description:
Hotel L’Alguer Nou is situated just 500 metres from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium and 220 metres from Collblanc Metro Station. This family-run hotel offers a bar, lounge and 24-hour reception.

Rooms at the L’Alguer Nou Hotel are simple and functional, with tiled floors. Each room comes with a TV and a private bathroom. The rooms have air conditioning in summer and central heating in winter.

Hotel L’Alguer Nou serves a daily breakfast consisting of a buffet of cold and hot dishes.

Collblanc Metro Station takes you to Barcelona Aiport in 30 minutes. L'Alguer Nou is a 20-minute walk from the campus of Barcelona University. Sants Train Station is a 10-minute bus ride away, and regular bus services stop within 200 metres of the hotel.

name: SANT ANTONI BREAK BCN, Sustanaible Tourism
description:
Situated conveniently in Barcelona, SANT ANTONI BREAK BCN, Sustanaible Tourism offers express check-in and check-out and private parking. This sustainable guest house is located 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The units are fitted with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony and some have city views. The units at the guest house feature air conditioning and a wardrobe.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is served for the continental breakfast.

A bicycle rental service is available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near SANT ANTONI BREAK BCN, Sustanaible Tourism include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 12 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bcn Centric Rooms
description:
Ideally situated in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Bcn Centric Rooms is situated 3 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 500 metres from Plaça Catalunya. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 2.9 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

At the hostel the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Bcn Centric Rooms include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Rooms Nuevo Roger
description:
Attractively set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Rooms Nuevo Roger is situated 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.8 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The air-conditioned accommodation is less than 1 km from Casa Batllo. The property is 500 metres from La Pedrera, and within 1.4 km of the city centre.

All units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a kettle. Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Tivoli Theatre, Portal de l'Angel and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Rooms Nuevo Roger.

name: By Port Vell Rooms
description:
Well located in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, By Port Vell Rooms is located 1.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2 km from Barceloneta Beach and less than 1 km from Santa Maria del Mar. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 800 metres from Boqueria Market. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 1.9 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also offer free WiFi. Guest rooms at By Port Vell Rooms include air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Picasso Museum, Cathedral of Barcelona and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from By Port Vell Rooms.

name: Fashion House
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 26m²
description:
Fashion House is within 10 minutes' walk of Plaza de Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Urquinaona Metro Station. This former Eixample fashion house has an open-air terrace.

Rooms at the Fashion House feature high ceilings and traditional décor.  All come with air conditioning and heating. The studios have a private bathroom, and bedrooms share a bathroom with just one other room.

Other facilities at Fashion House include a communal living room and a large terrace, where there are complimentary coffee and tea, common fridge, microwave, kettle and cold drinks vending machine. The hotel is situated close to many restaurants, bars and cafés.

Fashion House is just 550 metres from Passeig de Gràcia. It offers easy access to the Gothic Quarter and Born districts.

name: Hotel Palermo
description:
Hotel Palermo is located in central Barcelona, on the famous Las Ramblas. This hotel features rooms with private bathrooms and free Wi-Fi access throughout.

Rooms at the Hotel Palermo are simple and functional. All rooms feature heating and air conditioning.

Facilities at the Hotel Palermo include a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and vending machine. Guests have easy access to many of Barcelona’s restaurants, bars and nightclubs, within 5 minutes’ walk of the guest house.

The Palermo is just 300 metres from Plaza de Catalunya and approximately 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral. The city’s Old Port is less than 1 kilometre away and the nearest Metro Station, Liceu, is a 2-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Casp Green House
description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, Casp Green House features air-conditioning. Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the house.

The bedrooms have a safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided. Some rooms come with city view.

Passeig de Gracia shopping street is 650 meters from the property. Arco del Triunfo is an 8-minute walk away. Urquinaona metro station is within 4 minutes’ walk.

RECEPTION and KEY COLLECTION are in situated at street Via Laietana 71, 2º, which is just 7 min walk.

name: Hostal Oliveta
description:
Set at the bottom of Montjuïc and a 5-minute walk from Parallel Metro and Funicular Station, Hostal Oliveta features a restaurant serving traditional Spanish cuisine.

Each simply decorated, air-conditioned room at the Hostal Oliveta has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Set just off Avinguda Parallel, Hostal Oliveta is a 15-minute walk from Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter. Barcelona Port is just over 1 km away.

The city’s Olympic Village and cable car can be reached in just 15 minutes by the funicular railway. Airport buses leave from Plaza de Espanya, just over 1 km from the guest house.

name: By Liceu Rooms
description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 2.3 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, By Liceu Rooms offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 700 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona, 500 metres from Plaça Reial and 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The units feature bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from By Liceu Rooms.

name: Pol & Grace Hotel
description:
Pol & Grace Hotel is located just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaça Molina and Sant Gervasi Train Stations. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access.

This modern hotel features a library and an area displaying works by local artists, as well as a free work area. A free coffee and tea service is offered from mid-morning onwards.

Each soundproofed room at Pol & Grace Hotel has functional, modern décor and includes a small fridge, a free safe and a welcome gift. The fully equipped bathrooms come with toiletries.

A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning. Room service is also available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception with car rental service and a tour desk. Private parking is available on site.

Fontana Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Parc Güell. The popular Gràcia district is within a 2-minute walk of the property and has a range of shops, restaurants and lively bars.

name: BCN Condal Hostal
description:
Located just a 2-minute walk from Gaudi’s iconic Sagrada Familia basilica, BCN Condal hostal is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district. It offers free Wi-Fi, free coffee and hot drinks, and is 300 metres from Sagrada Familia Metro Station.

BCN Condal hostal offers simple and comfortable accommodation. Each room has central heating, and is equipped with a TV, wardrobe and desk. The rooms all have a shower and sink and some have a private bathroom.

The property offers free free tourist information, maps and discounts.

The guest house is situated in a quiet area, ideal if you want to be out of the city centre, but have the city’s famous landmarks within easy reach.

The spectacular Hospital Sant Pau is just an 5-minute walk away, while the city centre can be reached by metro in 5 minutes from Sagrada Familia station.

name: Hostal LK Barcelona
description:
Just 500 metres from Barcelona’s AVE Train Station, Sants Estació, Hostal LK Barcelona offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Espanya, Hostafrancs and Tarragona Metro Stations are within 5 minutes’ walk.

Chic, modern rooms feature wooden floors and air conditioning. They are also heated and have flat-screen  TV and a work desk. The private bathroom comes with toiletries.

The property has a fridge, microwaves and kettle which guests can use.

Luggage storage is offered at the LK Barcelona. Just 3 minutes’ walk away is Plaza Espanya, with Las Arenas Shopping Centre, the Magic Fountain and Airport Bus stop.

name: Cathedral Barcelona Rooms
description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Cathedral Barcelona Rooms offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Picasso Museum, Palau de la Musica Catalana, and Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach.

At the hostel, all rooms include a wardrobe. At Cathedral Barcelona Rooms every room includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cathedral of Barcelona, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Cathedral Barcelona Rooms.

name: Nice room close to Sagrada Familia
description:
Set in Barcelona, within 1.3 km of Casa Batllo and 1.6 km of Passeig de Gracia, Nice room close to Sagrada Familia offers free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre, 2.2 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2.4 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 1.5 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from La Pedrera.

At the hostel, the rooms are equipped with a shared bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Nice room close to Sagrada Familia include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sagrada Familia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82
description:
3.5 km from La Pedrera, limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82 is set in Barcelona and provides free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. The property is around 3.6 km from Casa Batllo, 4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 4.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Sagrada Familia.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82 have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.4 km from limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82, while Tivoli Theatre is 4.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Arya Stadium Hotel
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Camp Nou, Arya Stadium Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature city views. At Arya Stadium Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Non-stop assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Catalan, English, Spanish and French.

Sants Railway Station is 1.8 km from Arya Stadium Hotel, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 11 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Rooms Tetuan
description:
Situated right in the heart of Barcelona, 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach and 2.7 km from Somorrostro Beach, Rooms Tetuan features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2.8 km from Nova Icaria Beach and provides a shared kitchen. The bed and breakfast has family rooms.

All units are fitted with a microwave, toaster, a kettle, a shower, a hair dryer and a desk. Each unit is equipped with a shared bathroom. At the bed and breakfast, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Rooms Tetuan.

name: Flor Habitaciones
description:
In a prime location in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Flor Habitaciones is located 1.3 km from Casa Batllo, 800 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.1 km from La Pedrera. Portal de l'Angel is 2.2 km from the bed and breakfast and Cathedral of Barcelona is 2.4 km away.

The units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a kettle. Featuring a shared bathroom with a a bath or shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also provide guests with free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, all units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Flor Habitaciones.

name: Rooms Sepulveda
description:
Ideally set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Rooms Sepulveda is situated 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.2 km from Plaça Catalunya. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation features a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle. All units have a shared bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Casa Batllo, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Rooms Sepulveda.

name: París Habitaciones
description:
París Habitaciones is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.5 km from Casa Batllo, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.1 km from Plaça Catalunya. It is set 1.2 km from La Pedrera and offers a shared kitchen. The bed and breakfast features family rooms.

The units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a kettle. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also provide guests with free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the bed and breakfast.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.9 km from París Habitaciones, while Sants Railway Station is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Rooms in the center of Barcelona
description:
Attractively set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Rooms in the center of Barcelona is situated 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.8 km from Sants Railway Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Casa Batllo is 1.1 km away.

At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a kettle. All units have a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include La Pedrera, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Rooms in the center of Barcelona.

name: Hotel del Mar
description:
Hotel del Mar is set in a listed building just 800 metres from the seafront and Barceloneta Metro Station. It is a 5-minute walk from the trendy Born neighbourhood and Ciutadella Park.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel del Mar have flat-screen satellite TV. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities, and some rooms have a private balcony. A safe is also available with a surcharge.

Hotel del Mar has a 24-hour front desk. Barcelona’s França Train Station is a 5-minute walk away, and you can walk to Barcelona Cathedral and Maremagnum Shopping Centre in 10 minutes. Parking is available 5 minutes' walk from the property.

name: Hotel Travessera
description:
Hotel Travessera is situated just 600 metres from Gaudí’s Parc Güell, in a quiet area of Barcelona. Each air-conditioned room and includes free Wi-Fi.

The Travessera is located on the edge of Gràcia, a popular neighbourhood full of shops, bars and restaurants. Alfons X Metro Station is only 500 metres away. Regular buses to the city centre also stop outside the hotel.

Each bright, functional room includes a TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries.

A daily breakfast buffet is served in the hotel's dining room. There is a 24-hour reception, and a tour desk with information about the city.

name: Barcelona Apartment Republica
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Located 150 metres from Llacuna Metro Station, Derby Republica offers modern loft-style apartments featuring exposed brick walls. Guests have access to a rooftop pool and sun terrace with views over Barcelona.

The air-conditioned apartments at Derby include a kitchen equipped with a microwave, hob, fridge and dishwasher. There is also a washing machine, and bedding and towels are provided.

The Republica has a concierge service that can help organise activities such as tours and water sports. Guests can also enjoy free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

Glories Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away from Derby Republica. The beach and Poble Nou Park are also just 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: Fisa Rentals Les Corts Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
These stylish modern apartments offer free Wi-Fi and well-equipped kitchens. Sants Train Station is just a 10-minute walk away, while Entença Metro Station is 450 metres away.

Offering minimalist décor, each bright, air-conditioned Fisa Rentals apartment has a living room with flat-screen cable TV. Kitchens include a washing machine, microwave and coffee maker. Some apartments have terraces with city views, available on request and subject to availability.

A range of bars and supermarkets can be found in the streets around the Fisa Rentals Les Corts Apartments. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is around 600 metres away.

Buses to the city centre stop within a 5-minute walk of the apartments. FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium can be reached in 20 minutes on foot, or in 5 minutes by bus or Metro.

name: Studio Hostel
description:
Studio Hostel is set in the residential district of Sarrià, 50 metres from Reina Elisenda Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, free breakfast, a roof terrace and rooms with private bathrooms.

Rooms at the Studio are brightly decorated. Each has heating and a desk.

The Albergue has a communal lounge with a TV and there is also a reading area. There are vending machines in the reception and guests can make use of the fridge, microwave and kettle in the shared area.

Set just off Passeig de la Bonanova, the hostel is within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of restaurants, cafés and bars. The popular Gràcia district is just 5 train stops away.

Staff at the Studio’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many tourist attractions. The city centre is 20 minutes from Reina Elisenda Station, and free on-street parking is available nearby.

name: No Limit Barcelona Central
description:
Set next to Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gracia, No Limit Barcelona Central is a stylish modern hostel offering private rooms and dormitories. It features free Wi-Fi and a communal kitchen.

All the private rooms and dormitories at No Limit Barcelona Central have air conditioning and either a wardrobe or lockers. Some rooms include a private bathroom and the others have access to modern shared bathrooms.

No Limit Barcelona Central offers a large modern kitchen area with hobs, microwaves and a fridge. There is a lounge with sofas and a flat-screen TV. You can find many bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the hostel.

Las Ramblas is within 10 minutes’ walk of No Limit Barcelona Central. Barcelona Airport is 16 km away and you can catch a bus to the airport from Plaza Catalunya, 500 metres from the hostel.

name: HG City Suites Barcelona
description:
HG City Suites Barcelona is situated on the edge of Barcelona’s popular Gràcia district, 300 metres from Fontana Metro Station. Its spacious, modern rooms feature climate control, minibar and flat-screen satellite TV.

All accommodation at HG City Suites Barcelona includes a safe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi in all rooms and public areas.

Gràcia FGC Train Station is just 200 metres from the HG City Suites Barcelona and the number 24 bus also stops nearby. Both connect guests to Plaza de Catalunya in less than 20 minutes. Passeig de Gràcia is within a 15-minute walk of the HG City Suites Barcelona.

Public parking is available near the hotel, with special discounts available for guests.

name: Hostal BCN Ramblas
description:
Hostal BCN Ramblas is located on Las Ramblas, facing the colourful Boquería Market and 50 metres from Liceu Metro Station. This guest house offers free Wi-Fi.

Set on the edge of the Gothic Quarter, Hostal BCN Ramblas is around 400 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. Plaza Catalunya and the MACBA Contemporary Art Museum are within a 7-minute walk.

All air-conditioned rooms at the BCN Ramblas feature cable TV and a safe. Each one comes with a private bathroom with toiletries.

name: By Plaza Universidad Rooms
description:
Situated in Barcelona, within 2.9 km of Somorrostro Beach and 3 km of Barceloneta Beach, By Plaza Universidad Rooms features free WiFi throughout the property. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is 2.8 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

At the hostel, rooms have a wardrobe. The rooms have bed linen.

Popular points of interest near By Plaza Universidad Rooms include Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Hostal Martinval
description:
Set 5 minutes’ walk from the avenues of Diagonal and Passeig de Gracia, this guest house is located in the central Eixample neighbourhood of Barcelona. Verdaguer metro station is 350 metres away.

Hostal Martinval offers both apartments or modern rooms, most of which have a private bathroom. All rooms have a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi, while some of them have a balcony.

The Martinval also features a luggage storage. There is a wide offer of restaurants and bars in the surrounding area.

This accommodation is well connected to public transport and within walking distance from Barcelona’s most important buildings. La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes’ walk, and Sagrada Familia Temple is about the same distance.

name: Wow Hostel Barcelona
description:
Located in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Diagonal Metro Station, Wow Hostel Barcelona offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

Wow Hostel Barcelona offers dormitories and private rooms. Dormitories have shared bathroom facilities. Double and triple rooms can have private or shared bathrooms. There is a TV lounge with a pool table and vending machines.

You will find many bars and restaurants in the surrounding area. Staff can also provide tourist information, a party guide and discounts for night clubs. You can access the hostel 24 hours a day.

You can reach Barcelona city centre in 15 minutes by bus. Private parking is possible 150 metres away.

name: Casa Boutique Barcelona
description:
Situated in the heart of modernist Barcelona, this modern house is just a short walk from Gaudi’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló monuments.

Housed in a modernist-style building, the Casa Boutique Barcelona is located in the city centre, in the Eixample neighbourhood. Stroll to nearby Passeig de Gracia, a wide continental-style avenue where you will find numerous designer shops, eateries and spectacular architecture. The house is also ideally placed so you can enjoy the lively nightlife of the nearby Gothic Quarter and El Borne area.

Located in the heart of the city, you can walk to Plaça Catalunya in 3 minutes from the hotel. It also enjoys excellent transport connections to the rest of the city, by metro or bus.

name: By La Pedrera - Diagonal Rooms
description:
Well located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, By La Pedrera - Diagonal Rooms is located 200 metres from La Pedrera, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and a 9-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is close to Cathedral of Barcelona, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 500 metres from Casa Batllo.

With a shared bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also offer free WiFi. Guest rooms at By La Pedrera - Diagonal Rooms include air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from By La Pedrera - Diagonal Rooms.

name: BacHome Gallery B&B
description:
BacHome Barcelona B&B offers free Wi-Fi and features elegant rooms with street views. Paseo de Gracia, with its high end shops, restaurants and Gaudi's La Pedrera and Casa Batló, is just 200 metres from this bed and breakfast.

Featuring plenty of natural light and stylish décor, each air-conditioned bedroom comes with a seating area, flat-screen TV and a wardrobe. Fitted with parquet flooring, the spacious bedrooms also have heating. The modern bathrooms have a shower and they include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

BacHome Barcelona B&B has 24 hour coffee machine.

Gaudi's famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral can be reached by foot and it is 1.3 km away. Girona Metro Station, line 4, is a short 3 minutes' walk away. Plaza Cataluña Square and Las Ramblas Boulevard are about a 15-minute walk from the accommodation.
