Barcelona Airport is a 25-minute drive away. Buses run regularly between Plaza Cataluña Square and the airport.

name: Lovly Rooms
description:
Lovly Rooms is situated in the Horta-Guinardó district of Barcelona, 5.3 km from Park Güell, 5.7 km from Sagrada Familia and 6 km from La Pedrera. The property is around 6.3 km from Casa Batllo, 6.7 km from Passeig de Gracia and 6.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Tibidabo Amusement Park is 7.2 km away and Tivoli Theatre is 7.4 km from the apartment.

Featuring a shared bathroom, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi.

Camp Nou is 7.6 km from the apartment, while Sants Railway Station is 7.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from Lovly Rooms.

name: By Universitat Rooms
description:
Situated in Barcelona, within 400 metres of Plaça Catalunya and less than 1 km of Boqueria Market, By Universitat Rooms features accommodation with free WiFi throughout the property. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The rooms at the hostel are fitted with a shared bathroom fitted with a shower.

Popular points of interest near By Universitat Rooms include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Hostal Goya
description:
Hostal Goya has an ideal setting, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It features stylish rooms and apartments with free Wi-Fi access.

The Goya offers comfortable accommodation with contemporary décor and wooden floors. Each room has air conditioning and heating. Some rooms also have a balcony.

Apartments are bright and feature chic design. Each has a kitchen, dining area and a spacious living room with a balcony.

Hostal Goya has a lounge with a computer which has internet access, as well as free tea and coffee making facilities.

The guest house is 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where there are a range of shops, cafés and restaurants. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within 15 minutes’ walk of the property.

name: By Plaza Catalunya Rooms
description:
Offering air-conditioned rooms in the Eixample district of Barcelona, By Plaza Catalunya Rooms is 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Casa Batllo, and Portal de l'Angel. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach.

With a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also feature free WiFi. At By Plaza Catalunya Rooms the rooms include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from By Plaza Catalunya Rooms.

name: By La Rambla Rooms
description:
Conveniently situated in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, By La Rambla Rooms is located 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach and 300 metres from Plaça Catalunya. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel, and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

Free WiFi is available to all guests, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the hostel each room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near By La Rambla Rooms include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Urgel habitaciones
description:
Well set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Urgel habitaciones is set 1.5 km from La Pedrera, 1.9 km from Casa Batllo and 2.5 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is located 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and provides a shared kitchen. Plaça Catalunya is 2.6 km from the bed and breakfast and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km away.

The units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a kettle. With a shared bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also provide guests with free WiFi, while selected rooms include a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the bed and breakfast.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2.7 km from Urgel habitaciones, while Boqueria Market is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Casa Natura Gava Beach
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 100m²
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Casa Natura Gava Beach is set in Barcelona. This apartment features a private pool, a garden, barbecue facilities, free WiFi and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Gava Beach.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with pool views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the garden views. The property offers quiet street views.

Viladecans Beach is 2 km from the apartment, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Casa Natura Gava Beach.

name: Alojamiento Diputacion
description:
Boasting city views, Alojamiento Diputacion features accommodation with balcony, around 1.3 km from Sants Railway Station. It is situated 2.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and provides a shared kitchen. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

At the homestay, units include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. All units will provide guests with kitchenware.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2 km from the homestay, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Alojamiento Diputacion.

name: Apartamentos Laforja
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, these modern décor apartments are located in Sant Gervasi District, less than 15 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig the Gracia Avenue and the Modernist buildings.

Apartamentos Laforja features air-conditioned 1-bedroom apartments. They all include 1 double room, a seating area with sofa bed, a modern and well equipped kitchenette and a private bathroom.

Numerous bars and restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found nearby. You can also visit the charming Gracia District, less than 15 minutes’ walk from the apartments.

Muntaner Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments while Diagonal Metro Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Apartments are well connected to the city centre, only 10 minutes away by public transport.

name: Fira Guest House
description:
Enzo Fira Guest House offers accommodation in Barcelona, 5 minutes from the convention center Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre and Plaza España. Free WiFi is provided.

Each modern, bright room is fitted with a TV.

You will find a shared fully equipped kitchen and a shared lounge area at the property. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The Gran Vía 2 shopping center is 1.1 km and the port of Barcelona 3.9 km.
Palau Sant Jordi is 1.6 km from Enzo Fira Guest House, while Camp Nou is 1.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 9 km away.

name: Eco Boutique Hostal Grau
description:
This family-run, eco-friendly hotel is within 200 metres of Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. All rooms are made of natural, organic materials and painted with PVC-free paint.

All rooms at Hostal Grau have a private bathroom with free toiletries made from natural sources such as lavender. Some rooms have a balcony; while others face a vertical garden.

The hotel also has one OFF room with a reduction of electromagnetic radiation; and the whole building boasts environmentally friendly design, energy efficient lighting and a water recycling system, as well as using renewable or clean energy.

As well as free natural teas and infusions, are available from the on-site lounge.

The MACBA Modern Art Museum is just 350 metres from the guest house, and Port Vell Harbour is a 15-minute walk away. Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop in nearby Plaza Universitat.

name: Diamond Rooftop & private terrace sea views
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Featuring a furnished private terrace with views over central Barcelona and the Mediterranean sea, Luxury & Magic Apartment is a self-catering apartment located 700 metres from both Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro and Train Station. Free WiFi is available

There is a living room and a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher and washing machine. The bedroom comes with a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a shower and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There is a lift in the building and the apartment is next to shops, bars and restaurants.

name: Limonaia
description:
Boasting a garden and free WiFi, Limonaia is set in Barcelona, 100 metres from La Pedrera and 600 metres from Casa Batllo. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

All rooms have a contemporary décor and come with air conditioning, free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries.

Popular points of interest near Limonaia include Passeig de Gracia, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: chic&basic Habana Hoose
description:
Situated conveniently in Barcelona, chic&basic Habana Hoose offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from Somorrostro Beach.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms include a safety deposit box, while selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony. The units feature a wardrobe.

Around-the-clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Catalan, English and Spanish.

Popular points of interest near chic&basic Habana Hoose include Sant Miquel Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 12 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Stay U-nique Apartments Est
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.3 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 1 km from the centre, Stay U-nique Apartments Est provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. It is situated 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach and features a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Est.

name: Hostal Colkida
description:
Situated in central Barcelona, 350 metres from Girona Metro Station, Hostal Colkida features a furnished terrace overlooking a private courtyard. It offers rooms with air conditioning and heating.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and wardrobe. Each has a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are also provided.

Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and the property includes a luggage storage room and vending machine. Public parking is available on site and it carries a surcharge.

You will find shops and restaurants within 100 metres of the guest house. Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, with its exclusive boutiques and Gaudi’s buildings, is a 5-minute walk away.

Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 1.6 km from the property and Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 25 minutes by metro.

name: Casa Gracia Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Casa Gracia Apartments features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 300 metres from La Pedrera, less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and a 14-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Casa Gracia Apartments include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Chic Apartments Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Located in Barcelona within 2.9 km of Somorrostro Beach and 2.9 km of Nova Icaria Beach, Chic Apartments Barcelona provides accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, an oven, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, La Pedrera and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Chic Apartments Barcelona.

name: Meeting Point Hostels
description:
Meeting Point Hostels is located just behind Barcelona Sants train station and offers free WiFi.

Both private and shared rooms are offered. The rooms have air conditioning and heating, and all beds have an individual reading light, a small shelf and a power socket. Free lockers secured with keycard locks are available. A luggage storage room is available on request.

Central Barcelona can be reached in around 10 minutes by train. Plaça d'Espanya and Fira de Barcelona are a 20-minute walk away from Meeting Point Hostels.

Sagrada Familia is a 20-minute metro ride from Meeting Point Hostels, while Camp Nou Stadium is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Rooms Arago
description:
Rooms Arago is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.7 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station. La Pedrera is 1.8 km away and Portal de l'Angel is 2.8 km from the bed and breakfast.

The units have a fully equipped kitchen with dining area, a microwave, coffee machine, and a toaster. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also offer free WiFi, while certain rooms include a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Casa Batllo, Plaça Catalunya and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Rooms Arago.

name: Private rooms in Gothic
description:
Situated conveniently in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Private rooms in Gothic is set 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.2 km from Barceloneta Beach and 200 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona. Popular points of interest nearby include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The property is 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Reial and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Private rooms in Gothic.

name: Rooms Aribau
description:
Attractively situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Rooms Aribau is set 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and less than 1 km from La Pedrera. It is situated 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a shared kitchen. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a microwave, a toaster, a coffee machine, a bidet, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bath and free toiletries, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Rooms Aribau.

name: Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup
description:
The 19th-century Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup, opposite Barcelona’s marina in the Gothic Quarter, is 600 metres from the Ramblas and has free Wi-Fi. Its rooftop terrace offers panoramic city views and includes 2 plunge pools and a bar. Property also features a Gym.

Duquesa de Cardona has spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers.

The hotel’s restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. During summer, the snack bar serves creative tapas, BBQ dishes and cocktails.

The famous Sagrada Familia is 2.5 km away, and Barceloneta Metro Station is only 300 metres away. The Maremagnum Shopping Centre and Barcelona Aquarium are 500 metres from Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup.

name: Duquesa Suites Barcelona
description:
Set the centre of Barcelona, 400 metres from Picasso Museum and Barceloneta Metro Station, Duquesa Suites Barcelona features a year-round outdoor plunge pool, sun terrace and free WiFi. It is housed in a building from the 18th century with the Speciality Monument status.

Rooms at this hotel come with 1 extra large double bed, a sofa bed and a bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and capsule coffee machine.

Please note that the hotel reserves the right to pre-authorise credit cards prior to arrival. When booking more than 3 rooms, different policies and additional charges may apply. Buffet breakfast is served at Hotel Duquesa de Cardona. Local City Tax pending to be paid at Front Desk.

Plaza Reial is 500 metres from Duquesa Suites Barcelona, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Duquesa Suites Barcelona.

name: The Hipstel Parallel
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 900 metres from Montjuïc, The Hipstel Parallel features a sun terrace and views of the city.

Each room has lockers and padlocks are available at reception at an extra cost. The common area comes with a kettle, a coffee machine and a fridge, as well as a microwave, cookware and a vending machine can be found at the property. Bed linen is included.

There are bars and restaurants in the surrounding areas.

A 20-minute metro ride will take you to the Sagrada Familia; and regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located in Plaza España, 1 km away.

name: Best Western Premier Hotel Dante
description:
The Best Western Premier Dante is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, a few minutes walking from the elegant Paseo de Gracia, Plaza de Catalunya and the famous Pedrera and Casa Batlló. With a functional design, the Hotel has a Lobby Bar, meeting rooms, internet corner and private parking.

The rooms are spacious and daylight. They have free WI-FI connection, coffee maker, electronic safe, LCD satellite TV and air conditioning, as well as a complete bathroom. The Suites are located on the 7th floor and have a large terrace with views of Barcelona.

The Buffet Breakfast offers a wide variety of milk and vegetable drinks, juices, coffees, infusions, pastries and salty. Many of the products served are gluten free. The Hotel's Lobby Bar, serves Mediterranean cuisine, both for lunch and dinner. It is also possible to taste an aperitif.
The Hotel also has 4 fully equipped meeting rooms and private parking, as well as free Wi-Fi in rooms and common areas.

It is about 20 minutes away by car from Barcelona airport and 10 from the AVE station.

name: Hotel Lyon
description:
Set in the traditional, fishing district of Barceloneta, next to the central city beach. This hotel provides value and practical accommodation, ideal for those travelling on a budget.

After a hearty breakfast, head out along the impressive Barcelona beachfront. Stop for a morning coffee or a bite to eat, next to the waterfront. Here you can spend the day strolling around this charming neighbourhood, or you can walk into the Gothic Quarter, or the popular Born neighbourhood – 5 minutes’ walk away.

This hotel has a small social lounge, where you can sit and read, or chat with friends or fellow guests.

name: Casa Vaganto
description:
2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Casa Vaganto is set in Barcelona and offers free WiFi, concierge services and express check-in and check-out. The property is close to Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The property is allergy-free and is located 1.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Casa Vaganto every room has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Catalunya and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Casa Vaganto.

name: Romantic In Trendy Gracia
description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from La Pedrera and 1.6 km from Casa Batllo, Romantic In Trendy Gracia offers air conditioning. The property is around 2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.9 km from Park Güell. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.5 km from Passeig de Gracia.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Romantic In Trendy Gracia.

name: Habitaciones luminosas
description:
Habitaciones luminosas has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 1.7 km from Sants Railway Station, 1.4 km from La Pedrera and 1.8 km from Casa Batllo. It is situated 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a shared kitchen. Boqueria Market is 2.9 km from the bed and breakfast and Tivoli Theatre is 3 km away.

Featuring free WiFi, the units have a washing machine and a flat-screen TV. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a kettle. All units have a shared bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.5 km from the bed and breakfast, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Habitaciones luminosas.

name: Rooms Balmes
description:
Attractively situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Rooms Balmes is situated 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and a 7-minute walk from La Pedrera. The air-conditioned accommodation is less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is 500 metres from Casa Batllo, and within 1 km of the city centre.

All units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a kettle. Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Rooms Balmes.

name: Sonder Los Arcos
description:
Sonder Los Arcos features accommodation with free WiFi in Barcelona, ideally set less than 1 km from Plaça Catalunya and a 15-minute walk from Tivoli Theatre. Popular points of interest nearby include Cathedral of Barcelona, Boqueria Market and Picasso Museum. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a coffee machine, a bath or shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Sonder Los Arcos.

name: Habitat Apartments Ribes
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 100m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.1 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.3 km from Barceloneta Beach, Habitat Apartments Ribes offers air conditioning. It is situated 1.1 km from Picasso Museum and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Somorrostro Beach is 2 km away.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from Habitat Apartments Ribes, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Well and Come
description:
Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views, Well and Come Hotel is located right beside Verdaguer Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia.

This boutique hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and laptop safe. There is also a Nespresso coffee machine, kettle and minibar with free water in all rooms.

Rooms have individually controlled air conditioning and heating. They also come with a private bathroom which includes a rain shower, free toiletries, hairdryer and vanity mirror.

Some rooms come with a balcony, terrace or city views.

Hotel Well and Come features a 24-hour reception, a lounge area with a fireplace, an on-site bar and a fitness area.

The famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard is 5 minutes’ walk from Well and Come hotel. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached within a 15-minute walk.

name: Chi
description:
Located in Barcelona’s Eixample District, beside Rocafort Metro Station and 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya,  Chi Hotel offers rooms with air-conditioning and heating (depending on the season) and free WiFi.

The modern rooms include a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Staff can help with tourist information and car hire.

You will find many shops, restaurants and bars in the surrounding area.

name: Citytrip Poble Nou Beach
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Citytrip Poble Nou Beach features 2 stylish apartments in different locations in Barcelona’s Poblenou district. Each modern apartment has free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV.

The air-conditioned Citytrip apartments feature a lounge with a sofa and DVD player. Each one has a kitchen with an oven, microwave, coffee maker and washing machine. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer.

The apartments are all under 900 metres from Bogatell Beach. Each one has Llacuna or Poblenou Metro Station within 500 metres, connecting you with the city centre in 3 or 4 stops.

name: BacHome Terrace B&B
description:
BacHome Terrace B&B is located in central Barcelona, 500 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia. This modern bed and breakfast has a spacious decked terrace with sofas and offers free coffee and tea 24h.

The air-conditioned rooms at BacHome Terrace B&B feature modern décor and free WiFi. Each one comes with a desk, a private bathroom and views of the street or the terrace area. Their bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

BacHome Terrace B&B. Located 500 metres away, Portal de l’Àngel Street is full of shops, and there are numerous charming cafes and restaurants in the Gothic Quarter, 5 minutes’ walk away. The beautiful Palau de la Música Auditorium is also 400 metres away.

Located 150 metres away, Urquinaona Metro Station connects you with the rest of the city with ease. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 7 minutes’ walk away.

name: Stay U-nique Apartments Torre Damians
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Ideally located in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, Stay U-nique Apartments Torre Damians is set less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station, 3 km from Casa Batllo and 3.1 km from Palau Sant Jordi. The property is around 3.3 km from Camp Nou, 3.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.5 km from Plaça Catalunya. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units at the apartment complex feature air conditioning and a desk.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Boqueria Market is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Torre Damians.

name: AB North Barcelona Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 64m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona, AB North Barcelona Apartments is a sustainable accommodation, 6.9 km from Sagrada Familia and 8.2 km from Casa Batllo. This apartment features free private parking and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation offers a lift, full-day security and organising tours for guests.

With a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also boast free WiFi, while some rooms include a terrace.

La Pedrera is 8.3 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 8.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 22 km from AB North Barcelona Apartments.

name: By Plaza Real Rooms
description:
Ideally set in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, By Plaza Real Rooms is set 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2.1 km from Barceloneta Beach and 60 metres from Plaça Reial. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel, and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 1.9 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, and within 800 metres of the city centre.

Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also feature free WiFi. All guest rooms at By Plaza Real Rooms feature air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plaça Catalunya, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from By Plaza Real Rooms.

name: Barcelona Apartment Val
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 47m²
description:
These modern décor apartments are located in Barcelona city centre, next to Passeig de Gracia Avenue and within walking distance of Gaudi’s most famous Modernist buildings.

Barcelona Apartment Val features air-conditioned 1, 2 or 3 bedroom apartments. Each one offers plenty of natural light and views of the city.

Apartments also include a comfortable seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom.

Guests have free access to an outdoor pool located in Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, 300 metres away.

Set in Barcelona’s main shopping district, the apartments are well connected by public transport to all main tourist attractions in Barcelona. Apartments are situated 10 minutes’ walk from both the Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas.

name: NH Collection Barcelona Podium
description:
NH Collection Barcelona Pódium offers stylish, modern accommodation in a quiet area of central Barcelona. It has free WiFi, a sauna, gym and roof terrace with swimming pool and city views.

Bedrooms at the hotel are spacious and air conditioned. They all have a choice of pillows, a minibar and satellite TV. Each room comes with a Barcelona city guidebook.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium combines a 19th-Century façade with modern interior design. It is surrounded by other Modernist buildings in Barcelona’s Eixample district.

The hotel is set 800 metres from Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas, near the city’s Gothic Quarter. Ciutadella Park and the Olympic Port are also within walking distance.

The NH Collection Podium Hotel has good access to all parts of the city by public transport. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and there is also a lounge bar. A healthy breakfast is available in the mornings. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

name: Barcelona Central Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach and less than 1 km from the centre, Barcelona Central Apartments offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a shared lounge. It is located 2.8 km from Somorrostro Beach and provides a shared kitchen. Palau de la Musica Catalana is less than 1 km away and Tivoli Theatre is a 8-minute walk from the apartment.

The units have a private bathroom with a shower, while selected rooms will provide you with a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Barcelona Central Apartments.

name: Izaila Plaza Catalunya
description:
Izaila Plaza Catalunya features free WiFi, air conditioning and heating. Located in the centre of Barcelona, this hotel is 50 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square.

The bright rooms at Izaila Plaza Catalunya include a flat-screen TV and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony with city views.

Guests have access to a shared lounge and a library. The hotel offers tourist information and free storage luggage.

The hotel is a 2 minute walk from Plaza Catalunya metro and train stations. The famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 2.5 km away. Passeig de Gracia, with its high end shops and Gaudi's La Pedrera and Casa Batlló, is within 5 minutes' walk from Izaila Plaza Catalunya.

Barcelona Airport is 20 minutes away by car. Buses run regularly between the airport and Plaza Catalunya Square.

name: 08028 Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 38m²
description:
08028 Apartments are situated next to Les Corts Metro Station and 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Camp Nou Football Stadium. The modern apartments share a rooftop pool with views of Barcelona.

Apartments and suites at the 08028 feature contemporary design and free Wi-Fi. Apartments include a balcony, lounge area and a fitted kitchen.

The Taberna Lizarran at the 08028 Apartments serves traditional Spanish cuisine, including tapas.

The 08028 Apartments are a 15-minute walk from Sants Train Station. Plaza Catalunya and the famous Las Ramblas can be reached in around 20 minutes, by Metro.

name: EasySleep Eixample
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Situated just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia in the stylish Eixample District, EasySleep Eixample offers air conditioning and free WiFi.

EasySleep Eixample´s apartments include a kitchen equipped with a microwave, fridge and washing machine. There is also a tea and coffee maker.

The chic lounge in the Sicilia features a dining table and chairs as well as a large sofa. Each apartment also includes a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer.

Monumental Metro Station is just 200 metres from the apartments. Barcelona’s famous Diagonal Avenue is less than 5 minutes’ walk away with many shops, restaurants and bars.

name: Ola Living MACBA
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 38m²
description:
Centrally located in Barcelona’s Raval District, just 300 metres from Universitat Metro Station, Ola Living MACBA offers modern accommodation with free WiFi and a balcony. Plaza Catalunya is 8 minutes’ walk away.

These apartments feature exposed brick walls and some come with vaulted ceilings or exposed wooden beams. They come with a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, oven and coffee machine. Their living areas include a flat-screen TV with cable channels, DVD player and sofa.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Sant Antoni is a 5-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 2.5 km from the property. Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ metro ride from Ola Living MACBA and Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

name: Magic Apartment with Private Terrace
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 85m²
description:
Located within a 5-minute walk of Monumental and Sagrada Famila metro stations, Magic Apartment with Private Terrace features a large furnished terrace. Free WiFi and air conditioning are also available.

The living room comes with a flat-screen TV and a sofa bed. Equipped with an oven, the modern kitchen includes a toaster and microwave. A washing machine and iron are available.

Magic Apartment with Private Terrace has 2 double bedrooms and 1 private bathroom comes with a bath and hairdryer.

The apartment is surrounded by bars and restaurants, and there is a park right in front. Plaza Cataluña is just 2 stops on the metro and Barceloneta Beach is 10 minutes by car. Barcelona-El Prat Airport is 17 km away.

name: Aya House
description:
Offering city views, Aya House in Barcelona offers accommodation, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre, a garden, a terrace and a restaurant. The lodge features both WiFi and private parking free of charge.

There is a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries in each unit, along with a hairdryer.

Guests at Aya House can enjoy an American breakfast.

Tibidabo Amusement Park is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Park Güell is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 22 km from Aya House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hostal Bcn 46
description:
A 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Metro and Railway Station, Hostal Bcn 46 has an excellent location, less than 500 metres from Las Ramblas. Its simple, stylish rooms have free Wi-Fi.

Hostal Bcn 46 offers accommodation with private or shared bathrooms. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and heating.

Guests can enjoy breakfast at a café near Hostal Bcn 46, and there are many more bars and restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk of the guest house.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within 1 km of the Hostal. Airport buses stop at Plaza de Catalunya, a 10-minute walk away.

name: By Born & Gothic Rooms
description:
Ideally located in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, By Born & Gothic Rooms is set 2.1 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2.2 km from Barceloneta Beach and 300 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona. Popular points of interest nearby include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The property is 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also feature free WiFi, while some rooms also feature a city view. At By Born & Gothic Rooms the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Reial and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from By Born & Gothic Rooms.

name: 01 Apartamento 2 ,3
description:
Set in a central area of Barcelona, 2 km from Barceloneta Beach, 01 Apartamento 2,3 offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property is around 2 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.1 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 200 metres from Palau de la Musica Catalana. Tivoli Theatre is 700 metres away and Portal de l'Angel is 600 metres from the apartment.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Cathedral of Barcelona, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from 01 Apartamento 2,3.

name: Arrivo Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Situated conveniently in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Arrivo Apartments is a sustainable apartment set 700 metres from Sants Railway Station and 2.9 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property invites guests to reconnect with nature and encourages them to make eco-friendly travel choices. It is located 3 km from Palau Sant Jordi and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Arrivo Apartments.

name: BYPILLOW Twenty
description:
This design hotel has an excellent location in a quiet side street only 20 metres from the famous Las Ramblas. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel and there is an on-site cafeteria for breakfasts, salads and sandwiches for lunch and dinner.

The Arai is set in an 18th-century building and features stunning frescos on the façades, which are part of the architectural Heritage, historical and artistic of Barcelona, which gives it the Speciality Monument status.

Rooms feature a stylish, rustic décor with exposed stone walls and large windows. The air-conditioned rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. They have a sofa and a small kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Private bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Aparthotel Arai features Restaurant Palosanto, a classic tavern offering  tapas and Kokka, the first Peruvian bar in Barcelona.

Las Ramblas Avenue and Liceu Metro Station are just 5 minutes’ walk away. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 950 metres away. Barcelona’s Port Vell is 10 minutes’ walk from Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior.

name: Hotel Neri – Relais & Chateaux
description:
This chic, exclusive hotel is set in an 18th-century aristocratic house overlooking a secluded square in the heart of the Gothic Quarter. Its contemporary style contrasts with the impressive historic surroundings.

Set right beside the city’s Cathedral, the Hotel Neri lies just a short distance from the bustling Las Ramblas. The building’s original period charm has been preserved and enhanced by the hotel’s sophisticated interior design. This design blends with relaxing music and sensual aromas to create a unique setting in this ancient, atmospheric area of central Barcelona.

Dine on delicious specialities in the hotel restaurant or enjoy a drink at the terrace bar. You can also spend a relaxing moment in the tranquil library or on the pretty rooftop garden terrace.

Hotel Neri Relais & Châteaux preserves its impressive façade to Sant Felip Neri square as well as a 17th-century stone wall, which separates the lounge bar area of the restaurant. It has the status of Specialty Monument.

Hotel Neri also offers apartments housed in a restored classic building located few metres away. Please see the individual apartment description for more details.

Situated in Barcelona, 1 km from Casa Batllo and 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia, Casa Cosi - Eixample 4 offers free WiFi and air conditioning. This sustainable apartment is located 1.4 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.2 km from La Pedrera.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 4 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Casa Cosi - Eixample 4.

name: Tendency Rambla Catalunya
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 100m²
description:
Located in central Barcelona, just 450 metres from Plaza Catalunya, Tendency Rambla Catalunya offers modern apartments with free WiFi and air conditioning.

All apartments feature a living room with a flat-screen TV and a kitchen with a dishwasher, oven and washing machine. Some of the apartments include a furnished balcony.

In the area you will find many shops, bars and restaurants. Passeig de Gracia Avenue is just 250 metres away.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in a 5-minute walk and Las Ramblas in 10 minutes’ walk.

Passeig de Gracia Train Station is 3 minutes away and has direct trains to Barcelona Airport.

name: Modern Penthouse with VIEWS Near Paseo De Gracia by MyRentalHost
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Well set in the centre of Barcelona, Modern Penthouse with VIEWS Near Paseo De Gracia by MyRentalHost offers a terrace, air conditioning, free WiFi and TV. This sustainable apartment is located 400 metres from Casa Batllo and 800 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Modern Penthouse with VIEWS Near Paseo De Gracia by MyRentalHost include La Pedrera, Plaça Catalunya and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Casa PILAR Central By MyRentalHost
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 kitchen • 85m²
description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Casa PILAR Central By MyRentalHost offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and coffee machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a terrace. There is private parking and the property provides an electric vehicle charging station.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Casa PILAR Central By MyRentalHost.

name: Motor Yacht Dandy
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 200m²
description:
Moored at Barcelona’s Port Forum, Motor Yacht Dandy offers spacious accommodation 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Forum Beach. Free WiFi is featured.

Each luxury cabin has an en-suite bathroom, and one has a hot tub. An extra bed is available in two of the single bed cabins.

This air-conditioned yacht also features some sun decks with loungers, a bar, ice maker and barbecue.

name: 7 bedrooms villa with private pool enclosed garden and wifi at Castellet i la Gornal 9 km away from the beach
description_short: Entire villa • 7 bedrooms • 1 kitchen • 450m²
description:
Boasting a year-round outdoor pool and pool views, 7 bedrooms villa with private pool enclosed garden and wifi at Castellet i la Gornal 9 km away from the beach is situated in Barcelona. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 45 km from Marina Tarragona.

The spacious villa has 7 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

For those times when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to cook on the barbecue.

The nearest airport is Reus Airport, 51 km from the villa.

name: Hostel New York
description_short: Bed in dormitory • 16m²
description:
Hostel New York is a youth hostel located in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 5 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and free WiFi, 500 metres from Jaume and Drassanes Metro Stations.

The hostel’s simple dormitory rooms feature modest décor, bunk beds and individual lockers. They include access to a shared bathroom; and free bed linen are provided.

There is a kitchen available for guests in the evenings and a TV lounge with vending machines selling drinks and snacks. There are also 2 computers.

New York is ideally located for visiting many of Barcelona’s sights by foot. Ciutadella Park is a 10-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 15 minutes's walk away.

The ferry port bus is a 10-minute walk from the hostel and you can catch a bus to the airport from Plaza Catalunya Square, 20 minutes’ walk away.

name: Casa Barcelo Hostel Barcelona
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
Set in Barcelona’s stylish Eixample district, Barcelo Hostel offers air-conditioned dormitory rooms with free Wi-Fi. Located 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia, the hostel features a terrace, 24-hour reception and shared kitchens.

Each bright dormitory has bunk beds and lockers. There is access to shared bathrooms with showers and hairdryers. Bicycles are not allowed

Barcelo Hostel offers 2 shared kitchens, including a microwave, fridge and kitchenware. There are also 2 air-conditioned lounge areas with sofas and a TV. You can find a variety of shops, restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk of the hostel.

Diagonal Metro Station is 500 metres from Barcelo Hostel and Plaza Catalunya is 2 stops away, on Line 3. Staff at the hostel can give you tourist information about the area.

name: Jacobs Inn Barcelona
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
Located in Barcelona and with Mar Bella Beach reachable within 700 metres, Jacobs Inn Barcelona provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is situated 700 metres from Bogatell Beach, less than 1 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach and 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests.

Guest rooms include bed linen.

Speaking Catalan, Czech, Greek and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Barceloneta Beach is 2.8 km from the hostel, while Port Olimpic is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Jacobs Inn Barcelona.

name: Sant Jordi Hostels Rock Palace
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
Situated in Barcelona’s Eixample District, a 5-minute walk from Passieg de Gràcia Metro Station, Sant Jordi Hostels Rock Palace features a rooftop terrace with an outdoor pool.

All the rooms and dormitories have air conditioning and lockers. Bathrooms are shared and located either inside the room or outside. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Guests can use a shared kitchen with a microwave and fridge. There is also a shared lounge with a flat-screen TV. Laundry service is available for a surcharge.

Rambla de Cataluña Avenue, lined with shops and bars, is a 3-minute walk from the hostel. Plaza Cataluña Square, a popular meeting point for both tourists and locals, can be reached in less than 15 minutes on foot.

There are a number of metro stations within a 10-minute walk of the property. A 30-minute ride takes you to Barceloneta Beach and Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 15 minutes away.

name: Ideal Youth Hostel
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
Offering a roof terrace with chill-out area, Ideal Youth Hostel is located 50 metres from Las Ramblas in Barcelona.

Some rooms have a private bathroom. Extras include a desk, bed linen and a fan.

At Ideal Youth Hostel you will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered include a shared lounge, a games room and a tour desk. Computers are available for use free of charge.

The hostel is 800 metres from Plaça Catalunya, and Liceu Metro Station is a 2-minute walk away. You can walk to Barceloneta Beach in 25 minutes.

name: Room018BCN
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
Room018BCN is located 450 metres from FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium. This modern hostel offers rooms with free WiFi and individual lockers.

The air-conditioned dormitory rooms feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each bed has an LED reading light. Bed linen is provided, and towels can be rented on site. Some rooms have a private bathroom.

The reception is open 24 hours.

Staff at reception can arrange tickets for FC Barcelona matches, as well as other events or public transport tickets. There is a shared kitchen where you can prepare meals and there are vending machines on site.

Room018BCN is located next to Les Corts Metro Station, taking you to Drassanes at the bottom of the Rambla in around 15 minutes. You can walk to L'Illa Shopping Centre in around 10 minutes.
